GSP33brssgo3u:340: kecittāvadāhuḥ - svargārthasya karmaṇo bhuktaphalasyāvaśeṣaḥ kaścidanuśayo nāma bhāṇḍānusārisnehavat /
GSP33brssgo3u:341: yathāhi snehabhāṇḍaṃ ricyamānaṃ na sarvātmanā ricyate bhāṇḍānusāryeva kaścitsnehaśeṣo 'vatiṣṭhate tathānuśayo 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:348: yathā kila kaścitsevakaḥ sakalaiḥ sevopakaraṇai rājakulamupasṛpaścirapravāsātparikṣīṇavahūpakaraṇaśchatrapādukādimātrāvaśeṣo na rājakule 'vasthātuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:353: na svargaphalasya karmaṇo nikhilasya bhuktaphalatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:355: svargārthaṃ kila karma svargasthasyaiva svargaphalaṃ nikhilaṃ na janayati svagracyutasyāpi kañcitphalaleśaṃ janayatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:359: natviha tathā svargaphalasya karmaṇo leśānuvṛttirdṛśyate nāpi kalpayituṃ śakyate svargaphalatvaśāstravirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:362: yadihi yena sukṛtena karmaṇeṣṭādinā svargamanvabhūvaṃstasyaiva kaścidekadeśo 'nuśayaḥ kalpyeta tato ramaṇīya evaiko 'nuśayaḥ syānna viparītaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:366: yaduktaṃ yatkiñcetyaviśeṣaparāmarśātsarvasyeha kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalopabhogenāntaṃ prāpya niranuśayā avarohantīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:369: yatkiñcidiha kṛtamāmuṣmikaphalaṃ karmārabdhabhogaṃ tatsarvaṃ phalopabhogena kṣapayitveti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:370: yadapyuktaṃ prāyaṇamaviśeṣādanārabdhaphalaṃ kṛtsnameva karmābhivyanakti tatra kenacitkarmaṇāmuṣmiṃlloke phalamārabhyate kenacidasminnityatvaṃ pratyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:371: apicakena hetunā prāyaṇamanārabdhaphalasya karmaṇo 'bhivyañjakaṃ pratijñāyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:372_0: yathaiva tarhi prākprayāṇādārabdhaphalena karmaṇā pratibaddhasyetarasya vṛttyudbhavānupapattirityevaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:373: nahyanārabdhaphalatvasāmānyena jātyantaropabhogyaphalamapyanekaṃ karmaikasminprāyaṇe yugapadabhivyaktaṃ sadekāṃ jātimārabhata iti śakyaṃ vaktuṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:375: nāpi kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ prāyaṇe 'bhivyaktiḥ kasyaciduccheda iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:378: smṛtirapi viruddhaphalena karmaṇā pratibaddhasya karmāntarasya ciramavasthānaṃ darśayati- 'kadācitsukṛtaṃ karma kūcasthamiha tiṣṭhati //
GSP33brssgo3u:380_0: yadi ca kṛtsnamanārabdhaphalaṃ karmaikasminprāyaṇe 'bhivyaktaṃ sadekāṃ jātimārabheta
GSP33brssgo3u:382: naca dharmādharmayoḥ svarūpaphalasādhanādisamadhigame śāstrādatiriktaṃ kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayatum /
GSP33brssgo3u:383: naca dṛṣṭaphalasya karmaṇaḥ kārīryādeḥ prāyaṇamabhivyañjakaṃ saṃbhavatītyavyāpikāpīyaṃ prāyaṇasyābhivyañjakatvakalpanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:386: yathāhi pradīpaḥ samāne 'pi saṃnidhāne sthūlaṃ rūpamabhivyanakti na sūkṣmam /
GSP33brssgo3u:387: evaṃ prāyaṇaṃ samāne 'pyanārabdhaphalasya karmajātasya prāptāvasaratve balavataḥ karmaṇo vṛttimudbhāvayati na durbalasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:402: tat tatrāvarohatāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye iha karmabhūmau ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ puṇyakarmaṇaḥ iti yat tat ābhyāśoha avaśyaṃ hītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:407: yathetamityārabhya śvādiyonimityantaṃ vākyaṃ yāvattāvadāmnāyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:408: atra yāvatsaṃpātamiti viśeṣaṇādramaṇīyacaraṇā iti vākyācca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:412: teṣāmiṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yadā tatkarma paryavaiti viparikṣīṇaṃ bhavati tadā punarāvartanta iti śrutyantareṇāpi kṛtsrakarmaṇaścandraloke bhuktatvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:414: ayaṃ naro yatkiñcidiha loke karma karoti tasyāntaṃ phalaṃ paraloke prāpya karmārthaṃ punarāyātīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:419: tat tatrāvarohatāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye ye kecidiha karmabhūmau ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ puṇyayonibhāja iti yat tat abhyāśo ha avaśyaṃ hītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:422: 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karma bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena'ityādiśāstreṇa sukhaduḥkhayordharmārdharmahetukatvamavagatam /
GSP33brssgo3u:423: tataśca janmārabya dṛṣṭo bhogaḥ karmahetukaḥ bhogatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:426: smṛtavāśramāḥ āśramiṇaḥ pretya mṛtvā lokāntare karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā tataḥ śeṣeṇa bhuktādanyena karmaṇā anuśayākhyena punarjanma pratipadyante iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:427: viśiṣṭā deśādayo medhāntā daśa guṇā yeṣu te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:431: kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svarge bhoge sati bhuktasya karmaṇo leśo 'nuśayastadvānavarohati bhāṇḍe snehaleśasya dṛṣṭatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:434: nanu bhoganāśyatvāt karmaṇo leśo na yuktaḥ iti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:445: kṣapayitvā punarāgacchantīti prāpyantamiti vākyena gamyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:447: yatkiñceti yāvatsaṃpātamiti ca sāmānyaśabdayorāmuṣmikaviṣayatvena saṅkoco nyāyya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:453: ārabdhavadanārabdhasyāpi balavataḥ pratibandhakatvānna sarvakarmaṇaḥ phaladānāyābhivyaktiriti samādhatte-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:455: astu tarhi durbalasya karmaṇo nāśa ityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:456: nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmetyekānta utsargaḥ sa ca prāyaścitabrahmajñānadhyānairbādhyate na maraṇamātraṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:466: kiñca vyañjakatve 'pi maraṇasya kiṃ sarvakarmavyañjakatvaṃ kalpyate uta yatkiñcitkarmavyañjakatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:470: maraṇaṃ na kasyacidapi karmaṇo vayañjakaṃ kintu prabalakarmapratibandhābhāve durbalaṃ vyajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:474: evaṃ sarvakarmasaṅgha ekajanmārambhaka ityaikabhavikaḥ karmāśaya iti matanirāsamupasaṃharati-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:478_0: avarohamārga itthaṃ śrūyate-'tasmin yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvā athaitamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante
GSP33brssgo3u:478_1: yathetamākāśamākaśādvāyuṃ vāyurbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhūtvā megho
GSP33brssgo3u:478_2: bhavati bhūtvā pravarṣati ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante
GSP33brssgo3u:478_3: ato vai khalu durniṣprapataraṃ yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati
GSP33brssgo3u:479_0: dhūmādyadhvanā yathetaṃ yathāgataṃ tathetamadhvānaṃ punarāyantītyuktvā dhūmādirūpapitṛmārgastharātryādikaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:479_1: noktamadhikaṃ cābhrādikamuktamiti matvā sūtrakṛtoktaṃ yathetamanevaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:484: caraṇād iti cen nopalakṣaṇārtheti kārṣṇājiniḥ / BBs_3,1.9 /
GSP33brssgo3u:491: śrutiśca karmācaraṇe bhedena vyapadiśati- 'yathākārī yathācārī tathā bhavati' (bṛ. 4.4.5)
GSP33brssgo3u:492: iti, 'yānyanavadyāni karmāṇi tāni sevitavyāni no itarāṇi,
GSP33brssgo3u:493: yānyasmākaṃ sucaritāni tāni tvayopasyāni' (tai. 1.11.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:499: anugrahaśca jñānaṃ ca śīlametadvidurbudhāḥ'iti smṛtāvuktāvadrohādayaḥ śāstrārthajñānarūpaṃ śīlaṃ sarvakarmāṅgamuktaṃ tadbodhakaṃ caraṇapadamaṅginaḥ śrautādikarmaṇo lakṣakaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:500: karmaṇa evottarāvasthā dharmādharmākhyāpūrvamiti karmalakṣaṇayaiva tadabhinnāpūrvākhyānuśayasiddhiriti kārṣṇājinimatam //9//
GSP33brssgo3u:504: ānarthakyam iti cen na tadapekṣatvāt / BBs_3,1.10 /
GSP33brssgo3u:506: kasmātpunaścaraṇaśabdena śrautaṃ śīlaṃ vihāya lākṣaṇiko 'nuśayaḥ pratyāyyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:507: nanu śīlasyaiva śrautasya vihitapratiṣddhasya sādhvasādhurūpasya śubhāśubhayonyāpattiḥ phalaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:513: nahi sadācārahīnaḥ kaścidadhikṛtaḥ syāt- 'ācārahīnaṃ na punanti vedāḥ' ityādismṛtibhyaḥ puruṣārthatve 'pyācārasya nānarthakyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:514: iṣṭādau hi karmajāte phalamārabhamāṇe tadapekṣa evācārastatraiva kañcidatiśayamārapsyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:518: nahi padbhyāṃ palāyituṃ pārayamāṇo jānubhyāṃ raṃhitumarhatīti // 10 //
GSP33brssgo3u:520: caraṇaśabdavācyasyaiva grahaṇasaṃbhavānna lakṣaṇā yukteti śaṅkitvaiva brūte-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:522: kiñca śīlasya niṣphalatvāyogācchrutayonyāpattistasyaiva phalaṃ nānuśayasyetyāha-avaśyaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:523: vedāstadarthakarmāṇyācāraṃ vinā na phalantīti smṛtyā śīlasya karmāṅgatvānna pṛthakphalāpekṣā,
GSP33brssgo3u:526: aṅgasya phalāsaṃbhavena mukhyārthasyācārasya grahaṇāyogāllakṣaṇā yukteti samādhānārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:527: yadyācārasya snānādivat puruṣasaṃskāratayā puruṣārthatvaṃ tadāpyavirodha ityāha-puruṣārthatve 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:529: astu tarhi śīlakhyācārādeva yonyāpattirityāśaṅkya 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā'ityādi śrutyā virodhānnaivamityāha-karma ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:535: bādaristvācāryaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte eva caraṇaśabdena pratyāyyete iti manyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:537: tathāhi- aviśeṣeṇa karmamātre caratiḥ prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:538: yo hīṣṭādilakṣaṇaṃ puṇyaṃ karma karoti taṃ laukikā ācakṣate dharmaṃ caratyeṣa mahātmeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:541: tasmādramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ praśastakarmaṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ninditakarmāṇa iti nirṇayaḥ // 11 //
GSP33brssgo3u:544_0: yadyapyakrodhādirūpaṃ śīlaṃ sādhāraṇadharmātmakaṃ viśeṣarūpāt karmaṇo 'bhinnaṃ tathāpi
GSP33brssgo3u:544_1: caraṇācāraśabdau karmavācināveva na śīlavācakāviti na lakṣaṇāvasara iti bādarimataṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:546: karmaṇa evācāratve yathākārītyādibhedoktiḥ kathamityata āha-bhedavyapadeśa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:548: atastatsamabhivyāhṛtaḥ karmasāmānyavācako yathākārīti śabdastaditaraviśeṣaparaḥ evamanavadyāni karmāṇīti sāmānyataḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:557: ye tvitare 'niṣṭādikāriṇaste 'pi kiṃ candramasaṃ gacchantyuta na gacchantīti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:558: tatra tāvadāhuḥ - iṣṭādikāriṇa eva candramasaṃ gacchantītyetanna /
GSP33brssgo3u:561: ethāhyaviśeṣeṇa kauṣītakinaḥ samāmananti- 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti' (kauṣī. 1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:564: iṣṭādikāriṇāmitareṣāṃ ca samānagatitvaṃ na yuktamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:567: evaṃ puṇyātmanāṃ gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyaṃ nirūpya pāpināṃ taccintayā tannirūpayati-aniṣṭādikāriṇāmapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:569: 'vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānām'iti śruteśca saṃśaye prathamādhikaraṇena siddhaniyamākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tatretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:572: pūrvapakṣe puṇyavatāmeva candragatiriti niyamābhāvāt puṇyavaiyarthyaṃ pāpādvairāgyādārḍhyaṃ ceti phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:573: siddhānte pāpināṃ candralokadarśanamapi nāstīti puṇyārthavattvaṃ vairāgyadārḍhyaṃ ceti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:579: saṃyamane tv anubhūyetareṣāmārohāv arohau tadgatidarśanāt / BBs_3,1.13 /
GSP33brssgo3u:585: yathā kaścidvṛkṣamārohati puṣpaphalopādānāyaiva na niṣprayojanaṃ nāpi patanāyaiva /
GSP33brssgo3u:588: te tu saṃyamanaṃ yamālayamavagāhya svaduṣkṛtānurūpā yāmīryātanā anubhūya punarevemaṃ lokaṃ pratyavaronti /
GSP33brssgo3u:591: tathāhi yamavacanasarūpā śrutiḥ prayatāmaniṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yamavaśyatāṃ darśayati- 'na sāṃparāyaḥ pratibhāti bālaṃ pramādyantaṃ vittamohena mūḍham /
GSP33brssgo3u:592: ayaṃ loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punarvaśamāpadyate me' (kaṭha. 2.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:593: 'vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānām' ityevañjātīyakaṃ ca bahveva yamavaśyatāprāptiliṅgaṃ bhavati // 13 //
GSP33brssgo3u:595: saṃyamane yamaloke yamakṛtā yātanā anubhūyāvarohantītyevamārohāvarohāviti yojanā sūtrasya jñeyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:597: samyak parastātprāpyata iti saṃparāyaḥ paralokaḥ tadupāyaḥ sāṃparāyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:599: viśeṣato vittarāgeṇa mūḍhaṃ mohātpramādaṃ kurvantaṃ prati na bhāti /
GSP33brssgo3u:600: sa ca bālo 'yaṃ strīvittādiloko 'sti na paraloko 'stīti mānī /
GSP33brssgo3u:602: pāpināṃ yamavaśyatāvādiviśeṣaśrutismṛtibalāt'ye vai ke ca'ityaviśeṣaśrutiriṣṭādikāriviṣayatvena vyākhyeyeti bhāvaḥ //13//
GSP33brssgo3u:607: apica manuvyāsaprabhṛtayaḥ śiṣṭāḥ saṃyamane pure yamāyattaṃ kapūyakarmavipākaṃ smaranti nāciketopākhyānādiṣu // 14 //
GSP33brssgo3u:616: apica sapta narakā rauravapramukhā duṣkṛtaphalopabhogabhūmitvena smaryante paurāṇikaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:623: yāvatā teṣu rauravādiṣvanye citraguptādayo nānādhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:627: yamaprayuktā eva hi te citraguptādayo 'dhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryante // 16 //
GSP33brssgo3u:633: ityasya praśnasya prativacanāvasare śrūyate- 'athaitayoḥ pathorna katareṇacana tānīmāni kṣudrāṇyasakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:634: jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:638: vidyākarmaṇī hi devayānapitṛyāṇayoḥ pathoḥ pratipattau prakṛte /
GSP33brssgo3u:639: 'tadya itthaṃ viduḥ' iti vidyā tayā pratipattavyo devayānaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:641: iti karma tena pratipattavyaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:643: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ye na vidyāsādhanena devayāne patyadhikṛtā nāpi karmaṇā pitṛyāṇe teṣāmeṣa kṣudrajantulakṣaṇo 'sakṛdāvartī tṛtīyaḥ panthā bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:646: te 'pi candrabimbamāruhya tato 'varuhya kṣudrajantutvaṃ pratipatsyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:649: apica sarveṣu prayatsu candralokaṃ prāpnuvatsvasau lokaḥ prayadbhiḥ saṃpūryetetyataḥ praśnaviruddhaṃ prativacanaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:650: tathāhi prativacanaṃ dātavyaṃ yathāsau loko na saṃpūryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:655: śrutistu tṛtīyasthānasaṃkīrtanenāsaṃpūraṇaṃ darśayati- 'etattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:660: ye vai kecidadhikṛtā asmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchantīti // 17 //
GSP33brssgo3u:665: etayorvidyākarmaṇoḥ pathidvayasādhanayoranyatareṇāpi sādhanena ye narā na yuktāste janmamaraṇāvṛttirūpatṛtīyamārgasthāni bhūtāni bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo3u:667: tena pāpināṃ candragatyabhāvāccandraloko na saṃpūryata iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:670: apica pāpināṃ candragatau asau lokaḥ saṃpūryeta 'ataśca na saṃpūryate'ityetatprativacanaṃ viruddhaṃ prasajyetetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:672: avaroha eva tṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ śrutyuktamityata āha-avarohasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:682: na tṛtīye sthāne dehalābhāya pañcasaṃkhyāniyama āhutīnāmādartavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:684: tathāhyantareṇaivāhutisaṃkhyāniyamaṃ varṇitena prakāreṇa tṛtīyasthānaprāptirupalabhyate 'jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānam' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:688: apica pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvamupadiśyate nāpañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:690: tatra yeṣāmārohāvarohau saṃbhavatasteṣāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau deha udbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:704: dhṛṣṭadyumnādīnāṃ tu yoṣitpuruṣaviṣaye dve apyāhutī na staḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:706: balākāpyantareṇaiva retaḥsekaṃ garbhaṃ dhatta iti lokarūḍhiḥ // 19 //
GSP33brssgo3u:713: apica caturvidhe bhūtagrāme jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjalakṣaṇe svedajodbhijjayorantareṇaiva grāmyadharmamutpattidarśanādāhutisaṃkhyānādaro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:718: 'aṇḍajāni ca jarāyujāni ca svedajāni codbhijjāni ca 'itiśrutyavaṣṭambhena sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:723: nanu 'teṣāṃ khalveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ trīṇyeva bījāni bhavanti aṇḍajaṃ jīvajamudbhijjam' (chā. 6.3.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:724: atra trividha eva bhūtagrāmaḥ śrūyate kathaṃ caturvidhatvaṃ bhūtagrāmasya pratijñātamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:730: sthāvarodbhedāttu vilakṣaṇo jaṅgamodbheda ityanyatra svedajodbhijjayorbhedavāda ityavirodhaḥ // 21 //
GSP33brssgo3u:733: anayā śrutyā cāturvidhyaṃ kathamuktaṃ śrutyantare trīṇyevetyavadhāraṇavirodhāditi śaṅkottaratvena sūtramādatte-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:736: udakaṃ bhittvā jāyate yūkādi jaṅgamamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:745_1: vāyirbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavatyabhraṃ bhūtvā megho bhūtvā pravarṣati' (chā. 5.10.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:753: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ākāśādisāmyaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:754: candramaṇḍale yadaṃmayaṃ śarīramupabhogārthamārabdhaṃ tadupabhogakṣaye sati pravilīyamānaṃ sūkṣmamākāśasamaṃ bhavati tato vāyorvaśameti tato dhūmādibhiḥ saṃpṛcyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:766: evaṃ pāpināṃ gatyāgatī vicārya saṃpratīṣṭādikāriṇāmavarohe viśeṣamāha-sābhāvyāpattirūpapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:768: nivṛttāścānuśayinaḥ karmānte drutadehā ākāśaṃ gatā ākāśasadṛśā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:769: ākāśasādṛśyānantaraṃ piṇḍīkṛtā atisūkṣmaliṅgopahitāḥ vāyunetastataśca nīyamānā vāyusamā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:770: so 'nuśayī saṃgho vāyusamo bhūtvā dhūmasaṃgatastatsamo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo3u:773: mehati siñcatīti vṛṣṭikartā meghastatsamo bhūtvā varṣadhārādvārā pṛthivīṃ praviśya vrīhiyavādirūpo bhavatīti siddhāntagatyā śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:775_1: tu dugdhaṃ dadhi bhavatītyādiprayoge bhavatiśrutervikārasvarūpāpattau mukhyatvāt
GSP33brssgo3u:778: samāno bhāvo dharmo yasya tadbhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sāmyamiti sūtrapadārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:796: tathāhi vrīhyādibhāvāpatteranantaraṃ viśinaṣṭi- 'ato vai khalu durniṣprapataram'
GSP33brssgo3u:800: tadatra duḥkhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ pradarśayanpūrveṣu sukhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:805: uktaṃ sādṛśyamupajīvya loke gantṛṇāṃ cirāciragatidarśanātsaṃśayaṃ vadan pūrvapakṣayati-tatretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:807: siddhānte tu vrīhīyavādibhāvādanuśayināṃ vilambena nirgamanamiti viśeṣādākāśādibhāvācchīghraṃ nirgama ityavilambena yonyāpattirityanusaṃdhānādvairāgyadārḍhyamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:808: nanvākāśādiṣvanuśayināṃ sukhaṃ vrīhiyavādiṣu duḥkhamiti duḥśabdādbhāti na cirāciranirgamanamityata āha-sukhaduḥkhatāviśeṣaścāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:815: tasminnevārohe pravarṣaṇānantaraṃ paṭhyate- 'ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante' (chā. 5.10.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:817: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimasminnavadhau sthāvarajātyāpannāḥ sthāvarasukhaduḥkhabhājo 'nuśāyino bhavatyāhosvitkṣetrajñāntarādhiṣṭhiteṣu sthāvaraśarīreṣu saṃśleṣamātraṃ gacchantīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:825: yathā śvayoniṃ vā sūkarayoniṃ vā camḍālayoniṃ veti mukhyamevānuśayināṃ śvādijanma tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:826: evaṃ vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:828: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ anyairjīvairadhiṣṭhiteṣu vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhabhājo bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:836: yathākāśādiṣu pravarṣaṇānteṣu na kañcitkarmavyāpāraṃ parāmṛśatyevaṃ vrīhyādijanmanyapi /
GSP33brssgo3u:838: yatra tu sukhaduḥkhabhāktvamabhipraiti parāmṛśati tatra karmavyāpāraṃ ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:839: apica mukhye 'nuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmani vrīhyādiṣu lūyamāneṣu kaṇḍyamāneṣu pacyamāneṣu bhakṣyamāṇeṣu ca tadabhimānino 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:840: yo hi jīvo yaccharīramabhimanyate sa tasminpīḍyamāne pravasatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:849: iha bhūmau varṣadhārādvārā patitāste 'nuśayino vrīhyādisāmyena jāyanta iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:850: atra jāyanta iti śruteḥ pūrvatrākāśādivarṣāntasādṛśyokteśca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:855: siddhānte vrīhyādisaṃśleṣamātraṃ parihartuṃ yatnalāghavaṃ vairāgyadārḍhyaṃ ceti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:856: nanu dehotpattyā jīvānāṃ janma syānna svataḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:863: kratvarthahiṃsāderapi hiṃsātvādisāmānyena pravṛtterna hiṃsyādityādiśāstraniṣiddhatvākāreṇa duritāpūrvakāritvamaviruddhamiti sāṅkhyā āhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:864: śruto 'tra vrīhyādibhāvo 'nuśayināṃ na janyarūpaḥ karmaviśeṣaparāmarśaṃ vinātroktatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:866: pūrvavaditi padaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvena hetvaṃśatvena ca vyākhyātaṃ yadatra prakaraṇe karmaviśeṣaparāmarśakamucyate tajjanmeti vyatirekadṛṣṭāntamapyāha-yatra tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:867_0: apica 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ striyāṃ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati'iti vākyaśeṣe
GSP33brssgo3u:876: aśuddham iti cen na śabdāt / BBs_3,1.25 /
GSP33brssgo3u:877: yatpunaruktaṃ paśuhiṃsādiyogādaśuddhamādhvarikaṃ karma tasyāniṣṭamapi phalamavakalpata ityato mukhyamevānuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmāstu tatra gauṇī kalpanānarthiketi tatparihriyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:879: ayaṃ dharmo 'yamadharma iti śāstrameva vijñāne kāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:881: yasmindeśe kāle nimitte ca yo dharmo 'nuṣṭhīyate sa eva deśakālanimittāntareṣvadharmo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:882: tena śāstrādṛte dharmādharmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ na kasyacidasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:883: śāstrācca hiṃsānugrahādyātmako jyotiṣṭomo dharma ityavadhāritaḥ sa kathamaśuddha iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:884: nanu 'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti śāstrameva bhūtaviṣayāṃ hiṃsāmadharma ityavagamayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:891: tena na tasya pratirūpaṃ phalaṃ jātisthāvaratvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:895: vaidikaṃ karmāśuddhaṃ na bhavati śāstravihitatvāditi sūtrārthaṃ prapañcayati-ayaṃ dharma ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:896_0: śucau deśe prātaḥ sāyaṅkāle jīvanādinimitte kṛtamagnihotraṃ dharmo bhavati sa evāśucideśe
GSP33brssgo3u:896_1: madhyarātre maraṇādinimitte kṛtaḥ sannadharmo bhavatīti nirṇayaḥ śāstraikasādhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:898: nanu yā hiṃsā so 'dharma ityutsargasya viśeṣavidhinā bādho 'tra na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:901: ayamarthaḥ-kāmye karmaṇi sarvatra karaṇāṃśe rāgataḥ pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:903: tathāca śyenākhye karmaṇi niṣedhe 'pi rāgaprābalyāt pravṛttiḥ syāt kratvaṅgahiṃsādau tu vidhita eva pravṛttirvācyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:904: sa ca vidhiryadyutsargaprāptamanarthahetutvaṃ na bādheta tarhi pravartako na syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:909: pratirūpaṃ duḥkharūpaṃ tasya phalaṃ neti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:915_1: retaḥsigbhāva āmnāyate - 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati' (chā. 5.10.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:922: tatrānnasthānuśayino retaḥ sekakartṛtvāyogādyogamātraṃ vācyaṃ tadvadupakrame 'pi yoga evāstheyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:928: atha retaḥsigbhāvasyānantaraṃ yonau niṣikte retasi yoneradhikaśarīramanuśayināmanuśayaphalopabhogāya jāyata ityāha śāstram - ''tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ' (chāya 5.10.7) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:929: tasmādapyavagamyate nāvarohe vrīhyādibhāvāvasare taccharīrameva sukhaduḥkānvitaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:933: evaṃ karmiṇāṃ gatyāgatisaṃsāro durvāra ityanusandhānāt karmaphalādvairāgyaṃ tattvajñānasādhanaṃ siddhamiti pādārthamupasaṃharati-iti siddhamiti //27//
GSP33brssgo3u:934: iti śrīmadparamahaṃsaparivrājakācārya śrīmadgovindabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:945: atikrīnte pāde pañcāgnividyāmudāhṛtya jīvasya saṃsāragatiprabhedaḥ prapañcitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:948: ityupakramya 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavantyatha rathānrathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' (bṛ. 4.3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:949: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:955: kutaḥ - yataḥ pramāṇabhūtā śrutirevamāha 'atha rathānnathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' (bṛ. 4,3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:958: uktavairāgyasādhyastattvaṃpadārthaviveko vākyārthajñānasādhanamasmin pāde nirūpyata iti pādayorhetusādhyabhāvasaṃgatimāha-atikrānta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:960: asmin pāde 'na sthānato 'pi'ityataḥ prāguddeśyatvena prathamaṃ jijñāsitatvaṃpadārtho 'vasthādvārā vivicyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:962_0: tatra pūrvaṃ gatyāgaticintayā jāgradavasthā nirūpitā tadanantarabhāvinīṃ svapnāvasthāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:962_1: śrutyuktāṃ viṣayīkṛtya tatra svapne rathādisṛṣṭyuktestadabhāvokteśca saṃśayaṃ vadan
GSP33brssgo3u:963: svapnarathādayo jāgradrathādivat vyāvahārikasattākā uta śuktirajatavat prātītikā iti saṃśayārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:967: mumūrṣoḥ sarvendriyopasaṃhārādetallokānanubhavo sati vāsanāmātreṇa imaṃ lokaṃ smarataḥ karmabalādhṛdaye manasā paralokasphūrtirūpaḥ svapno bhavati,
GSP33brssgo3u:969: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tasmin saṃdhye sthāne tiṣṭhannete ubhe sthāne paśyati idaṃ ca paralokasthānaṃ ca'iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:970: ayaṃ svapnaḥ kādācitka ityarucyā nityasvapnasya prabodhasaṃprasādasaṃdhibhavatvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:972_0: daivacakṣurādyajanyatadvattvaṃ martyalokalakṣaṇaṃ ca svapne 'stīti lakṣaṇato lokadvayasparśitvāt
GSP33brssgo3u:973: na kevalaṃ śrutyā svapnārthānāṃ vyāvahārikasatyatvaṃ kintu sakartṛkatvādapītyāha-sa hi karteti //1//
GSP33brssgo3u:978: apicaike śākhino 'sminneva saṃdhye sthāne kāmānāṃ nirmātāramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:979: putrādayaśca tatra kāmā abhipreyante kāmyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:984: iti prakṛteṣu tatra tatra putrādiṣu kāmaśabdasya prayuktatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:987: ityādi, tadviṣaya eva ca vākyaśeṣo 'pi- 'tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahma tadevāmṛtamucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:988: tasmiṃllokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana'' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:989: prājñakartṛkā ca sṛṣṭistathyarūpā samadhigatā jāgaritāśrayā tathā svapnāśrayāpi sṛṣṭirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:990: tathāca śrutiḥ - atho khalvāhurjāgaritadeśa evāsyaiṣa iti yāni hyeva jāgratpaśyati tāni suptaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:997: yaḥ supteṣu nirvyāpāreṣu karaṇeṣu jāgarti tadeva śukraṃ svaprakāśaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1020: nahi suptasya jantoḥ kṣaṇamātreṇa yojanaśatāntaritaṃ deśaṃ paryetuṃ viparyetuṃ ca tataḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1021: kvacicca pratyāgamanavarjitaṃ svapnaṃ śrāvayati kuruṣvahamadya śayāno nidrayābhiplutaḥ svapne pañcālānabhigataścāsminpratibuddhaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1022: dehāccedapeyātpañcāleṣu pratihudhyeta na tānasāvabhigata iti kuruṣveva tu pratibudhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1023: yena cāyaṃ dehena deśāntaramaśnuvāno manyate tamanye pārśvasthāḥ śayanadeśa eva paśyanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1024: yathābhūtāni cāyaṃ deśāntarāṇi svapne paśyati na tāni tathābhūtānyeva bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1026: darśayati ca śrutirantareva dehe svapnam- 'sa yatraitatsvapnyayā carati' ityupakramya 'sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate' (bṛ. 2.1.18) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1028: yo hi vasannapi śarīre na tena prayojanaṃ karoti sa bahiriva śarīrādbhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1030: kālavisaṃvādo 'pi ca svapne bhavati rajanyāṃ supto vāsaraṃ bhārate varṣe manyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1032: nimittānyapi ca svapne na buddhaye karmaṇe vocitāni vidyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:1034: rathādinirvartane 'pi kuto 'sya nimeṣamātreṇa sāmarthyaṃ dāruṇī vā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1038: ratho 'yamiti hi kadācitsvapne nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena manuṣyaḥ saṃpadyate manuṣyo 'yamiti nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena vṛkṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1039: spaṣṭaṃ cābhāvaṃ rathādīnāṃ svapne śrāvayati śāstram - ''na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti' (bṛ. 4.3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:1045: svapnarathādayaḥ prātītikā jāgradrathādau kḷptasāmagrīṃ vinā dṛṣṭatvācchuktirūpyādivaditi siddhāntayati-tuśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1046_0: cinmātraniṣṭhāvidyā cittvāvacchedena jīve 'pi sthitā rathādyākārā māyeti sūtrabhāṣyayoruktā
GSP33brssgo3u:1046_1: māyāvidyayorabhedajñāpanāya mātrapadena tu sati pramātaryabādhyatvarūpasya vyāvahārikasatyatvasya nirāsa uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1056: yatra kāle svapnyayā vṛttyā carati tathā svaśarīre yatheṣṭaṃ caratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1058: kulāyāddehāt bahirivāmṛta ātmā caritvā yatra kāmaṃ yatheṣṭamīyate viharatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1061: evaṃ sati śrutiyuktibhyāṃ antareva svapne satītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1063: atra rātrisamaye 'pi ketumālādivarṣāntare vāsaro bhavati iti bhārata ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1068: sūcakaśca hi śruter ācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ / BBs_3,2.4 /
GSP33brssgo3u:1072: tathāhi śrūyate - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1074: tathā puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti ityevamādibhiḥ svapnairacirajīvitvamāvedyata iti śrāvayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1075: ācakṣate ca svapnādhyāyavidaḥ - 'kuñjarārohaṇādīni svapne dhanyāni kharayānādīnyadhanyāni' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1077: tatrāpi bhavatu nāma sūcyamānasya vastunaḥ satyatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1080: yaduktam 'āha hi' iti tadevaṃ sati bhāktaṃ vyākhyātavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1083: evaṃ nimittamātratvādevātsupto rathādīnsṛjate sa hi karteti cocyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:1086: apica jāgarite viṣayendriyasaṃyogādādityādijyotirvyatikarāccātmanaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ durvivecanamiti tadvivecanāya svapna upanyastaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1087: tatra yadi rathādisṛṣcivacanaṃ śrutyā nīyeta tadā svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ na nirṇītaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1088: tasmādrathādyabhāvavacanaṃ śrutyā rathādisṛṣṭivacanaṃ tu bhaktyeti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1092: śrutyantare 'svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā jyotiṣā prasvapiti' (bṛ. 4.3.9)
GSP33brssgo3u:1095: iti prasiddhānuvajjīva evāyaṃ kāmānāṃ nirmātā saṃkīrtyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1096: tasya tu vākyaśeṣeṇa tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahmeti jīvabhāvaṃ vyāvartya brahmabhāva upadiśyate - 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.9.4)
GSP33brssgo3u:1107: svapnasya bhrāntimātratve tatsūcito 'pyarthaḥ satyo na syāditi śaṅkottaratvena sūtrāntaraṃ vyācaṣṭe-māyetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1108: mantreṇa devatānugraheṇauṣadhisevayā vā svapnaḥ satyasūcakāścet satyāḥ syurityata āha-tatrāpi bhavatu nāmeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1110_0: yathā kṛṣidvārā lāṅgalasya gavādijīvananimittatvaṃ tathā svapnabhokturadṛṣṭadvārā
GSP33brssgo3u:1110_1: svapnasṛṣṭinimittatvaṃ na tu kumbhaṃ prati kumbhakārasyeva sākṣād svapnakartṛtvaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:1111: tathāca svapnasya sakartṛkatvaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstīti hetvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1119: dvitīyasūtroktaprājñakartṛkatvaheturapi svapnasya kiṃ śrutisiddha uta prājñasya sarveśvaratvāt siddhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1123: svena bhāsā svīyabuddhivṛttyā svena jyotiṣā svarūpacaitanyena ca svapnamanubhavatītyarthathaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1124: na kevalaṃ bṛhadāraṇyake jīvasya svapnakartṛtvaṃ śrutaṃ kintu kāṭhake 'pītyāha-ihāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1126: evaṃ hetoḥ śrutisiddhatvaṃ nirasya dvitīyamaṅgīkaroti-na cāsmābhiriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1127: tarhi hetusiddheḥ svapnasya satyatvamityāśaṅkya satyatvaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ veti vikalpya vyavahārakāle bādhadarśanāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:1130: kastarhi svapnasya jāgrato viśeṣo 'tra kathyata ityāśaṅkya prātibhāsikatvamityāha-prāgiti //4//
GSP33brssgo3u:1134: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau / BBs_3,2.5 /
GSP33brssgo3u:1136: tatraivaṃ sati yathāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ samāne dahanaprakāśanaśaktī bhavata evaṃ jīveśvarayorapi jñānaiśvaryaśaktī,
GSP33brssgo3u:1143: kutaḥ - tato hīśvarāddhetorasya jīvasya bandhamokṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1145: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'jñātvā devaṃ sarvapāśāpahāniḥ kṣīṇaiḥ kleśairjanmamṛtyuprahāṇiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1148: pūrvaṃ kḷptasāmagryabhāvāt svapno māyetyuktamayuktaṃ satyasaṅkalpamātreṇāpi satyasṛṣṭisaṃbhavāditi śaṅkāṃ kṛtvā pariharan sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-athapi syādityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1149: satyasaṃkalpasya hi saṃkalpātsṛṣṭiḥ satyā bhavati jīvasya tvasatyasaṃkalpatvaṃ pratyakṣamiti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1151: nāstīti na kintvāvṛtamasti tatpunarīśvaraprasādākasyacidvyajyata ityāha-na nāstīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1156_1: vā tṛtīyaṃ viśvaiśvaryamaṇimādirūpaṃ martyadehapāte sati siddhe dehe bhavati tadabhogānantaramātmajñānātkevalo
GSP33brssgo3u:1166: asti cātropamā yathāgnerdahanaprakāśanasaṃpannasyāpyaraṇitasya dahanaprakāśane tirohite bhavato yathā vā bhasmacchannasya /
GSP33brssgo3u:1169: nanvasya eva jīva īśvarādastu tiraskṛtajñānaiśvaryatvātkiṃ dehayogakalpanayā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1177: ataśca na sāṃkalpikī jīvasya svapne rathādisṛṣṭirghaṭate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1178: yadi ca sāṃkalpikī svapne rathādisṛṣṭiḥ syānnaivāniṣṭaṃ kaścitsvapnaṃ paśyet /
GSP33brssgo3u:1180: yatpunaruktaṃ jāgaritadeśaśrutiḥ svapnasya satyatvaṃ sthāpayatīti na tatsāmyavacanaṃ satyatvābhiprāyaṃ svayañjyotiṣṭvavirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1195: tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruter ātmani ca / BBs_3,2.7 /
GSP33brssgo3u:1198: kvacicchrūyate- 'tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyāsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpo bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1199: anyatra tu nāḍīrevānukramya śrūyate - 'tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śete' (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1200: tathānyatra nāḍīrevānukramya 'tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' (kauṣī. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1202: tathānyatra 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1203: 'prājñenātmanā saṃpariśvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' (bṛ. 4.3.21) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:1204: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimetāni nāḍyādīni parasparanirapekṣāṇi bhinnāni suṣuptisthānānyāhosvitparasparāpekṣayaikaṃ suṣuptisthānamasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1208: nāḍyādīnāṃ tvekārthatā suṣuptau dṛśyate - 'nāḍīśu sṛpto bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:1210: (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti ca tatra tatra saptamīnirdeśasya tulyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1211: nanu naivaṃ sati saptamīnirdeśo dṛśyate - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1214: vākyaśeṣo hi tatrāyatanaiṣī jīvaḥ sadupasarpatītyāha - 'anyatrāyatanamalabdhvā prāṇamevopaśrayate' (chā. 6.8.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:1215: iti prāṇaśabdena tatra prakṛtasya sata upādanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1217: saptamīnirdeśo 'pi tatra vākyaśeṣe dṛśyate - 'sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyāmahe' (chā. 6.9.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1218: sarvatra ca viśeṣavijñānoparamalakṣaṇaṃ suṣuptaṃ na viśiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1220: evaṃ prāpte pratipādyate - tadabhāvo nāḍīṣvātni ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1221: tadabhāva iti tasya prakṛtasya svapnadarśanasyābhāvaḥ suṣuptamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1222: nāḍīṣvātmani ceti samuccayenaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1224: tathāhi - sarveṣāmeva nāḍyādīnāṃ tatra tatra suṣuptisthānatvaṃ śrūyate tacca masuccaye saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1230: tathehāpi nāḍīṣu purītati brahmaṇi ca svapitītyetadupapadyate samuccayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1231: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' (kauṣī. 4.19)
GSP33brssgo3u:1232: iti samuccayaṃ nāḍīnāṃ prāṇasya ca suṣuptau śrāvayatyekavākyopādānāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1234: yatrāpi nirapekṣā iva nāḍīḥ suptisthānatvena śrāvayati - 'āsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpto bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1235: tatrāpi pradeśāntaraprasiddhasya brahmaṇo 'pratiṣedhānnāḍīdvāreṇaiva brahmaṇyevāvatiṣṭhata iti pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1238: yo hi gaṅgayā sāgaraṃ gacchati gata eva sa gaṅgāyāṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1243: bravīti ca pāpmasparśābhāve hetum - tejasā nāḍīgatena pittākhyenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1247: brahmaṇā hi tadā saṃpanno bhavati nāḍīdvāreṇātastaṃ na kaścana pāpmāna spṛśatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1248: brahmasamapattiśca pāpmasparśābhāve hetuḥ samadhigataḥ - 'sarve pāpmāno 'ta nivartante 'pahatapāpmā hyeṣa brahmalokaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssgo3u:1250: evañca sati pradeśāntaraprasiddhena brahmaṇā suṣuptisthānenānugato nāḍīnāṃ samuccayaḥ samadhigato bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1251: tathā purītato 'pi brahmaprakriyāyāṃ saṃkīrtanāttadanuguṇameva suptisthānatvaṃ vijñāyate - 'ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmiñchete' (bṛ. 2.1.17)
GSP33brssgo3u:1252: iti hṛdayākāśe suptisthāne prakṛta idamucyate 'purītati śete' (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1254: tadantarvartinyāpi hṛdayākāśe śayānaḥ śakyate purītati śeta iti vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:1255: prākāraparikṣipte 'pi pure vartamānaḥ prākāre vartata ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1256: hṛdayākāśasya ca brahmatvaṃ samadhigatam - 'dahara uttarebhyaḥ' (bra.sū. 1.3.14) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:1260: evametāsu śrutiṣu trīṇyeva suṣuptisthānāni saṃkīrtitāni nāḍyaḥ purītadbrahma ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1263: apica nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhyādhāra eva bhavati tatrāsya karaṇāni vartanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1266: brahmādhāratvamapyasya suṣupte naivādhārādheyabhedābhiprāyeṇocyate kathaṃ tarhi tādātmyābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssgo3u:1267: yata āha - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1270: apica na kadācijjīvasya brahmaṇā saṃpattirnāsti svarūpasyānapāyitvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1272: ataśca suptāvasthāyāṃ kadācitsatāṃ saṃpadyate kadācinna saṃpadyata ityayuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1273: apica sthānavikalpābhyupagame 'pi viśeṣavijñānopalakṣaṇaṃ tāvatsuṣuptaṃ na kvacidviśiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1276: nāḍīṣu puratīti ca śayānasya na kiñcidavijñāne kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vijñātuṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1277: bhedaviṣayatvāt 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet' (bṛ. 4.3.31) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1281: yathā viṣṇumitraḥ pravāsī svagṛhaṃ na paśyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1283: upādhigatamevātidūrādikāraṇamavijñāna iti yadyucyeta tathāpyupādherupaśāntatvātsatyeva saṃpanno na vijānatīti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1285: nahi nāḍyaḥ suptisthānaṃ purītadvetyanena vijñānena kiñcitprayojanamasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1289: tena tu vijñānena prayojanamasti jīvasya brahmātmatvāvadhāraṇaṃ svapnajāgaritavyavahāravimuktatvāvadhāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:1293: yatra kāle suptaḥ suṣuptaḥ samasto nirastabāhyakaraṇo manolayātsamyakprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1298: siddhānte nāḍībhiḥ purītataṃ gatvāntarhṛdi brahmaṇyeva śeta iti samuccyāt tannirṇaya iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1299: ekapuroḍāśārthatvaṃ vrīhiyavayordṛṣṭaṃ nāḍyādīnāmekasmin svāparūpārthe nirapekṣasthānatvaṃ tu kuta ityata āha-nāḍyādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1301: āyatanaśabdātsaptamyartha ādhāratvaṃ gamyata ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1302: anyatrāvasthādvaye śrānto jīvo viśrāntisthānaṃ prāṇākhyaṃ sadbrahmopasarpati suṣuptāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1303: saptamīśrutyā nirapekṣādhāratvabhānādvikalpa āstheyaḥ kadācitsamuccityāpi nāḍyādīnāṃ sthānatvamiti na samuccayaśrutivirodha iti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1306: yadā nāḍyaḥ suṣuptisthānaṃ tadā purītatsthānaṃ na bhavatīti śrutasthānatvasya pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:1314: tathehāpi nāḍīpurītatorjīvasya saṃcāradvārā brahmaṇyeva suptiriti samuccaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1315: nāḍīnāṃ prāṇasya ca ekena vākyenopādānānmithaḥ samuccaya ityāha-ekavākyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1316: ādhāratvamātraṃ saptamyartho na nirapekṣatvamato na samuccayasya saptamyā bādha ityāha-na caivamapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1318: atra nāḍīśrutau nāḍīṣu bhoktuḥ suptirna vivakṣitā raśmisaṃbandhanāḍīrūpamārgastutyarthatvādityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1322: 'tāsu tadā bhavatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śruteḥ samuccaya āśrito bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1324: ākāśe brahmaṇi śeta ityupakramya tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītamiti śeta ityuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1325: tathāca nāḍīdvārā purītataṃ gatvā brahmaṇi śeta iti samuccayaḥ siddha ityāha-tathā nāḍīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1326: satā saṃpanno bhavati prājñena saṃpariṣvakta iti satprājñayoḥ śruteḥ pañca suptisthānānītyata āha-satprājñayoriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1328: nāḍyādīnāṃ tu brahmanirapekṣatayā suṣuptajīvādhāratvāsāmarthyānna vikalpa ityāha-apica nāḍya iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1332: nanu brahmāpi jīvasya na mukhyaṃ sthānaṃ abhedādityata āha-brahmādhāratvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1333: jīvasya brahmaṇyabhedenāvasthānaṃ nāḍīpurītatostu līnopādherjīvasya sthitireva na saṃbhavatītyekārthasāmarthyābhāvānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1334: suṣuptau jīvasya bhedakopādhilayāccautsargikabrahmābhedasya vikalpo na yukta ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1335: kiñca nāḍyādīnāmanyatamasthāne kvacitsuptivādināpi suṣuptaṃ na viśiṣyata iti vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:1336: tacca vaktuṃ na śakyata ityāha-apica sthāneti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1338: nāḍīpūritadratasya tu jīvasya bhedāvasthatvādbhedāvijñāne karaṇaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1343: upādhisaṃbhinnasyaiva nāḍyādau svāpe katipayasaṃnikṛṣṭārthajñānaprasaṅgāt suṣuptivyāghātaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1344: upādhilaye tvanyatra jīvasya sthityayogādbrahmaṇyeva svāpa āstheya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1345: evaṃ vikalpaṃ nirasya nāḍīpurītatorbrahmaṇā saha tulyavatsamuccayamaphalatvena dūṣayan guṇapradhānatvena samuccayamupasaṃharati-naca vayamityādinā //7//
GSP33brssgo3u:1350: yasmāccātmaiva suptisthānamata eva ca kāraṇānnityavadevāsmādātmanaḥ prabodhaḥ svāpādhikāre śiṣyate - 'kuta etadāgāt' (bṛ. 2.1.16)
GSP33brssgo3u:1351: ityasya praśnasya prativacanāvasare 'yathāgneḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccārantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' (bṛ. 2.1.20) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:1352: 'sata āgamya na viduḥ sata āgacchāmahe' (chā. 6.10.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:1353: vikalpyamāneṣu tu suṣuptisthāneṣu kadācinnāḍībhyaḥ pratibudhyate kadācitpurītataḥ kadācidātmana ityaśāsiṣyat /
GSP33brssgo3u:1355: kiñca brahmaṇaḥ sakāśājjīvasyotthānaśruterbrahmaiva suṣuptisthānamityāha-sūtrakāraḥ-ataḥ prabodha iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:1357: tasmādupādhilaye jīvasya brahmābhedādaupādhika eva bheda iti vivekadvākyārthābhedasiddhiriti sthitam //8//
GSP33brssgo3u:1363: tasyāḥ punaḥ satsaṃpatteḥ pratibudhyamānaḥ kiṃ ya eva satasaṃpannaḥ sa eva pratibudhyata uta sa vānyo veti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1365: kutaḥ - yadā hi jalarāśau kaścijjalabinduḥ prakṣipyate jalarāśireva sa tadā bhavati punaruddharaṇe ca sa eva jalabindurbhavatīti duḥsaṃpādam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1366: tadvatsuptaḥ pareṇaikatmāpannaḥ saṃprasīdatatīti na sa eva punarutthātumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:1367: tasmātsa eveśvaro vānyo vā jīvaḥ pratibudhyata ityevaṃ prāpta idamāha - sa eva tu jīvaḥ luptaḥ svāsthyaṃ gataḥ punaruttiṣṭhati nānyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1375: tasmādeka eva pūrvedyuraparedyuścaikasya karmaṇaḥ karteti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1376: itaśca sa evottiṣṭhati yatkāraṇamatīte 'hanyahamado 'drākṣamiti pūrvānubhūtasya paścātsmaraṇamanyasyotthāne nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:1381: 'sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti' (chā. 8.3.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:1382: 'ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako vā yadyadbhavanti tadābhavanti'
GSP33brssgo3u:1383: (chā. 6.9.3) ityevamādayaḥ śabdāḥ svāpaprabodhādhikāre paṭhitā nātmāntarotthāne sāmañjasyamīyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:1387: evaṃ cetsyādvada kiṃ kālāntaraphalena karmaṇā vidyayā vā kṛtaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1388: apicānyotthānapakṣe yadi tāvaccharīrāntare vyavaharaṇamāṇo jīva uttiṣṭhettatratyavyavahāralopaprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1390: yohi yasmiñśarīre suptaḥ sa tasminnotiṣṭhatyanyasmiñśarīre supto 'nyasminnuttiṣṭhatīti ko 'syāṃ kalpanāyāṃ lābhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:1397: yatpunaruktaṃ yathā jalarāśau prakṣipto jalabindurnoddhartuṃ śakyata evaṃ sati saṃpanno jīvo notpatpatitumarhatīti,
GSP33brssgo3u:1400: iha tu vidyate vivekakāraṇaṃ karma cāvidyā ceti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1401: dṛśyate ca durvivecayorapyasmajjātīyaiḥ kṣīrodakayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayorhaṃsena vivecanam /
GSP33brssgo3u:1402: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanyo vidyate yo jalabinduriva jalarāśeḥ sato vivicyeta /

GSP33brssgo3u:2046: adhiṣṭhānasattvaṃ vinā bhrāntiniṣedhayorayogācchūnyavādo na yukta ityuktvā pūrvavādinaḥ pakṣāntaraṃ dūṣayati-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2047: dehātmābhimānavallaukikamānaprāptadvaitasya niṣedho yukto na vedāntapramitabrahmaṇa iti bhāvaḥ yaduktaṃ vāṅmanasātītvāt niṣedhārhaṃ brahma iti tatrāha-vāṅmanaseti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2048: brahmaṇo vāgādyatītatvaṃ niṣedhārthaṃ na cet kimarthaṃ taduktirityata āha-pratipādaneti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2050: 'dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe'iti rūpadvayasyaiva prādhānyena prakṛtatvānnetīti niṣedha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2051: nanu 'ādityamaṇḍale puruṣa'iti brahmāpyatra prādhānyenoktamityāśaṅkya puruṣo liṅgātmā amūrtarasatvaśrutyā bhūtajanitatvabhānāt svapnarūpatvaśruteścetyāha-tajjanitameveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2052: rūparūpiṇorabheda uktaḥ nanu vāsanāmayaṃ rūpameva kimityupamīyate prasiddharūpameva kiṃ na syādityata āha-amūrtarasasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2055: na cārthataḥ pradhānyadbrahmaṇo niṣedhaḥ rājño bhṛtyo nāstītyatra rājaniṣedhaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2056: kiñcaitra brahmaṇaḥ pratipādyatvāt na niṣedha ityāha-prapañcite ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2057: nanu brahmaṇi niṣiddhasyāpyanyatra sthitisaṃbhavāt kathaṃ kalpitatvamityata āha-tadāspadamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2061: sthāpitaṃ hi ārambhaṇādhikaraṇe pratyakṣādervyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na tatvāvedakamiti,
GSP33brssgo3u:2067: yaccoktaṃ niṣedhābhyāṃ rūpaṃ rūpi brahma ca niṣidhyata iti,
GSP33brssgo3u:2069: uddeśyavidheyārthānāṃ saṃkhyāsāmye yathākramaṃ saṃbandha iti nyāyaḥ 'yathāsaṅkhyamanudeśaḥ samānām'iti pāṇinisūtrasiddhastenātra rūpadvayoddeśena niṣedhadvayavidhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2071: mūrtaṃ nāmūrtaṃ netyevaṃ viśiṣyaniṣedhe jijñāsā na śāmyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2073: pratiṣedhānupapattyā brahmāstītyavagataṃ bhūyaḥ punaḥ paramastīti śrutiḥ sākṣādapi bravītītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2081: yatpratiṣiddhātprapañcajātādanyatparaṃ brahma tadasti cetkasmānna gṛhyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2083: āha hyevaṃ śrutiḥ 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā nānyairdevaistapasā karmaṇā vā' (muṇḍa. 3.1.8)
GSP33brssgo3u:2099: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'parāñci khāni vyatṛṇatsvayaṃ bhūtasmātparāṅpaśyati nāntarātman /
GSP33brssgo3u:2105: yoginastaṃ prapaśyanti bhagavantaṃ sanātanam' iti caivamādyā // 24 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2107: FN: svayaṃbhūrīśvaraḥ khānīndriyāṇi parāñci anātmagrāhakāṇi kṛtvā vyatṛmat nāsitavān /
GSP33brssgo3u:2112: tarhi kadā grāhyamiti śaṅkottaraṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyāti-api cainamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2114: indriyairna gṛhyate api tu saṃrādhanena śāstrasaṃskṛtamanasetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2115: bhaktidhyānābhyāṃ pratyagātmanaścitte prakarṣeṇa nidhānaṃ sthāpanaṃ praṇidhānaṃ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2120: sa hi teṣāṃ nāśo yadasadarthagrāhitayā sarjanaṃ tasmātteṣāṃ tayā sṛṣṭatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:2122: kaścittu dhīro dhīmānāvṛttacakṣurniruddhendriyaḥ śuddhe cetasi pratyagātmanaṃ śāstreṇa paśyati mokṣārthītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2123: tataḥ karmaṇā viśuddhacitto jñānākhyasattvotkarṣeṇa saṃdhyāyaṃstaṃ niṣkalaṃ paśyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2137: yathā prakāśādaya upādhiṣu bhidyante na svataḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2138: evaṃ prakāśaścidātmāpi dhyānādikarmaṇyupādho bhidyate svatastasyāvaiśeṣyamekarasatvameva tattvamasītyabhyāsāditi sūtrayojanā //25//
GSP33brssgo3u:2143: ataśca svābhāvikatvādabhedasyāvidyākṛtatvācca bhedasya vidyayāvidyāṃ vidhūya jīvaḥ pareṇānantena prājñenātmanekatāṃ gacchati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2144: tathāhi liṅgam - 'sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' (mu. 3.2.9)
GSP33brssgo3u:2146: jīvasya brahmātmatvaphalaśrutirūpaliṅgādapi bheda aupādhika evetyāha sūtrakāraḥ-ato 'nanteneti //26//
GSP33brssgo3u:2152: kvacijjīvaprājñayorbhedo vyapadiśyate 'tatastu taṃ paśyate niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ' (muṇḍa. 3.1.8)
GSP33brssgo3u:2160: tatraivamubhayavyapadeśe sati yadyabheda evaikāntato gṛhyate bhedavyapadeśo nirālambana eva syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2165: yathā prakāśaḥ savitrastadāśrayaśca savitā nātyantabhinnāvubhayorapi tejastvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2171: yadvā sūryaprakāśayorekatejastvadharmāvacchedena bhedābhedavajjīvaparayorapi ekenaivātmatvadharmeṇa bhedābhedau śrutibalātsvīkāryāviti sūtradvayārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2182_0: yadi punaḥ paramārthata eva baddhaḥ kaścidātmāhikuṇḍalanyāyena parasyātmanaḥ saṃsthānabhūtaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2184: abhedameva hi pratipādyatvena nirdiśati bhedaṃ tu pūrvaprasiddhamevānuvadatyarthāntaravivakṣayā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2188: yatkāraṇaṃ parasmādātmano 'nyaṃ cetanaṃ pratiṣedhati śāstram - 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' (bṛ. 3.7.23)
GSP33brssgo3u:2192: iti ca brahmavyatiriktaprapañcanirākaraṇādbrahmamātrapariśeṣāccaiva eva siddhānta iti gamyate // 30 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2194: dharmabhedanaikadharmeṇa vā bhedābhedasvīkāre bhedasya satyatvādabhedavadanivṛttiḥ syāt ekatraiva bhedābhedasvīkāre loke virodhakathoccheda ityapi draṣṭavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2195: tasmāt niṣprapañcaṃ cidekarasaṃ brahma tatpadalakṣyamastīti siddham //
GSP33brssgo3u:2202: yadetannirastasamastaprapañcaṃ brahma nirdharitamasmātparamanyattattvamasti nāstīti śrutivipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2203: kāniciddhi vākyānyāpātenaiva pratibhāsamānāni brahmaṇo 'pi paramanyattattvaṃ pratipādayantīva /
GSP33brssgo3u:2209: setuśabdaśca hi loke jalasaṃtānavicchedakare mṛddārvādipracaye prasiddhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2210: iha tu setuśabda ātmani prayukta iti laukikasetorivātmasetoranyasya vastuno 'stitvaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2213: yathā laukikaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā jāṅgalamasetuṃ prāpnotyevamātmānaṃ setuṃ tīrtvānātmānamasetuṃ prāpnotīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2215: yacca loke unmitametāvadidamiti pariccinnaṃ kārṣāpaṇādi tato 'nyadvastvastīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:2217: tathā saṃbandhavyapadeśo 'pi bhavati - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:2220: mitānāṃ ca mitena saṃndho dṛṣṭo yathā narāṇāṃ nagareṇa /
GSP33brssgo3u:2221: jīvānāṃ ca brahmaṇā saṃbandhaṃ vyapadiśati suṣuptau /
GSP33brssgo3u:2224: tathāhi - 'atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā.
GSP33brssgo3u:2225: 1.6.6) ityādityādhāramīśvaraṃ vyapadiśyatato bhedenākṣyādhāramīśvaraṃ vyapadiśati - 'atha ya eṣo 'ntikṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā. 1.7.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2226: atideśaṃ cāsyāmunā rūpādiṣu karoti - 'tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yadamuṣya rūpaṃ yāvamuṣya geṣṇau yannāma tannāma' (chā. 1.7.5)
GSP33brssgo3u:2228: sāvadhikaṃ ceśvaratvamubhayorvyapadiśati - 'ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca' (chā. 1.6.8) ityekasya /
GSP33brssgo3u:2229: 'ye caitasmādarvāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyakāmānāṃ ca' (chā. 1.7.6) ityekasya /
GSP33brssgo3u:2233: yaduktaṃ neti netītyādiśrutibhiḥ brahmātiriktaṃ vastu niṣidhyata iti,
GSP33brssgo3u:2236: yadyapi dyubhvādyadhikaraṇe setuśabdo vidhārakatvena gauṇo vyākhyātastathāpyunmānādiśrutīnāṃ gatimajānato 'yaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2238: sadvayaṃ brahmeti phalaṃ siddhānte tūktādvitīyatatpadalakṣyasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2243: jāṅgalaṃ vātabhūyiṣṭhamiti vaidyokteḥ vātapracuro deśo jāṅgalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2248: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāṅmana ityāyatanavānnāma pāda iti catuṣpādbrahmeti pādānāmardhāni aṣṭau śaphā asyetyaṣṭāśaphaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2249: pādeṣu caturṣu pratyekaṃ catasraḥ kalā iti ṣoḍaśakalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2250: ṣoḍaśapaṇaparimitaṃ tāmraṃ kārṣāpaṇasaṃjñaṃ bhavati tadvatsadvayaṃ brahma,
GSP33brssgo3u:2261: evametebhyaḥ setvādivyapadeśebhyo brahmaṇaḥ paramastītyevaṃ prāpte pratipādyate -
GSP33brssgo3u:2266: sarvasya hi janimato vastujātasya janmādi brahmaṇo bhavatīti nirdhāritam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2268: 'naca brahmavyatiriktaṃ kiñcidajaṃ saṃbhavati sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' (chā. 6.2.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:2273: setuvyapadeśastāvanna brahmaṇo bāhyasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ kṣamate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2275: tatra parasminnasati setutvaṃ nāvakalpata iti paraṃ kimapi kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2278: setusāmānyāttu setuśabda ātmani prayukta iti ś liṣyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2280: ataḥ seturiva seturiti prakṛta ātmā stūyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2282: yathā vyākaraṇaṃ tīrṇa iti prāpta idamucyate nātikrāntastadvat // 32 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2285: nādyaḥ mānābhāvāt kāryasya brahmananyatvanirguṇayāccetyuktvā na dvitīyaḥ prāgutpatteradvayatvāvadhāraṇādityāha-naca brahmavyatiriktamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2292: vidhārakatvaṃ tu kalpitadvitīyāpekṣayāpi yujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2302: catuṣpādaṣṭāśaphaṃ ṣoḍaśakalamityevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ kataṃ nu nāma brahmaṇi sthirā syāditi vikāradvāreṇa brahmaṇa unmānakalpanaiva kriyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2303: nahyavikāre 'nante brahmaṇi sarvaiḥ puṃbhiḥ śakyā bujaddhiḥ sthāpayituṃ mandamadhyamottamabuddhitvātpuṃsāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2305: yathā mana ākāśayoradhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca brahmapratīkayorāmnātayoścatvāro vāgādayo manaḥsaṃbandhinaḥ pādāḥ kalpyante catvāraścāgnyādaya ākāśasaṃbandhinaḥ ādhyānāya tadvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:2306: athavā pādavaditi yathā kārṣāpaṇe pādavibhāgo vyavahāraprācuryāya kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2307: nahi sakalenaiva kārṣāpaṇena sarvadā sarve janā vyavahartumīśate krayavikraye parimāṇāniyamāttadvadityarthaḥ // 33 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2309: FN: brahmaṇa unmānakalpanaṃ mandadhiyāṃ dhyānavyavahārāya kārṣāpamasya pādavyavahārāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2311: vākprāṇacakṣuḥśrotrāṇi manasaḥ pādā agnivāyvādityadiśa ākāśasya pādā dhyānārthaṃ kalpitāstadvadbrahmaṇa unmānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2313: pādakalpanāṃ vināpi vyavahāraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2314: kārṣāpaṇasya vyavahārāya pādakalpanāvat mandadhiyāṃ dhyānavyavahārāya brahmaṇa unmānakalpanetyarthaḥ //33//
GSP33brssgo3u:2319: iha sūtre dvayorapi saṃbandhabhedavyadeśayoḥ parihāro vidīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2323: buddyādyupādhisthānaviśeṣayogādudbhūtasya viśeṣavijñānasyopādyupaśame ya upaśamaḥ sa paramātmanā samabandha ityupādhyapekṣayaivopacaryate na parimititvāpekṣayā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2324: tathā bhedavyapadeśo 'pi brahmaṇa upādhibhedāpekṣayopacaryate na svarūpabhedāpekṣayā prakāśādivadityupamopādānāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2325: yathaikasya prakāśasya sauryasya cāndramasasya vopādhiyogādupajātaviśeṣasyopādhyupaśamātsaṃbandhavyapadeśo bhavatyupādhibhedācca bhedavyapadeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2328: sthānamupādhibuddhyādiḥ ekasyaivopādhinā bhinnasyopādhiśāntau satyāṃ saṃbandha upacaryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2329: yathā saurālokāderaṅgulyādyupādhinā bhinnasyopādhiviyoge mahālokādyātmanā saṃbandhopacārastadvat tathāditya cakṣuṣoḥ sthānayorbhedāddhiraṇmayapuruṣabhedakalpanetyarthaḥ //34//
GSP33brssgo3u:2334: upapadyate cātredṛśa eva saṃbandho nānyādṛśaḥ 'svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:2341: tathāca śrutirekasyāpyākāśasya stānakṛtaṃ bhedavyapadeśamupapādayati - 'yo 'yaṃ bahirdhā puruṣādākāśaḥ' (chā. 3.12.8)
GSP33brssgo3u:2343: mukhyāveva saṃbandhabhedau kiṃ na syātamityatra sūtram-upapatteśceti //35//
GSP33brssgo3u:2349: tathānyapratiṣedhāpi na brahmaṇaḥ paraṃ vastvantaramastīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2358: ityevamādivākyāni svaprakaraṇastānyanyārthatvena pariṇetumaśakyāni brahmavyatiriktaṃ vastvantaraṃ vārayanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2360: svarūpeṇa brahmaṇā jīvasya saṃbandho bhedanivṛttirūpo yujyate na mukhyaḥ saṃyogādiḥ vastudvayāsattvāt tathā bhedo 'pi na svata ekatvaśruterityarthaḥ //36//
GSP33brssgo3u:2367: setvādivyapadeśeṣu hi mukhyeṣvaṅgīkriyamāṇeṣu pariccheda ātmanaḥ prasajyeta setvādīnāmevātmakatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2368: tathānyapratiṣedhe 'pyasati vastu vastvantarādvyāvartata iti pariccheda evātmanaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2374: nanu dvitīyābhāve sarvagatatvaśrutivirodha ityata āha-anena sarvagatatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2375_2: iti bhāvaḥ adhiṣṭhānenādhyastaṃ jagadvyāptamadhyastatvāt rajjvā vyāptasarpavat, iti nyāyaḥ //37 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2382: yadtadiṣṭāniṣṭavyāmiśralakṣaṇaṃ karmaphalaṃ saṃsāragocaraṃ trividhaṃ prasiddhaṃ jantūnāṃ kimetatkarmaṇo bhavatyāhosvidīśvarāditi bhavati vicāraṇā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2385: sa hi sarvādhyakṣaḥ sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārānvicitrānvidadhaddeśakālaviśeṣābhijñatvātkarmiṇāṃ karmānurūpaṃ phalaṃ saṃpādayatītyupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2389: karma vinaśyatsvakālameva svānurūpaṃ phalaṃ janayitvā vinaśyati tatphalaṃ kālāntaritaṃ kartrā bhokṣyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2391: yatkālaṃ hi yatsukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vātmanā bhujyate tasyaiva loke phalatvaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:2392: nahyasaṃbaddhasyātmanā sukhasya duḥkhasya vā phalatvaṃ pratiyanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2407: nirviśeṣatvādanyaḥ svabhāvaḥ phalahetutvākhyaḥ iṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ devādīnāṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2410: saṃsāro janmamṛtipravāhaḥ gocaraḥ āśrayo yasya tatsaṃsāragocaram /
GSP33brssgo3u:2412: atra pūrvapakṣe phaladāturīśvarasya tatpadavācyasyāsiddherlakṣyāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2414_0: yadyapi sarvagatatvavatphaladātṛtvaṃ vyavahāradaśāyāṃ sidhyati yathāpi karmaṇa eva
GSP33brssgo3u:2418: yāgādikriyākhyaṃ karma tāvat kṣaṇikaṃ tatkiṃ svanāśāt phalaṃ janayatyuta phalamutpādya naśyati,
GSP33brssgo3u:2437: na kevalamupapattereveśvaraṃ phalahetuṃ kalpayāmaḥ kiṃ tarhi śrutatvādapīśvarameva phalahetuṃ manyāmahe /
GSP33brssgo3u:2438: tathāca śrutirbhavati - 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmānnādo vasudānaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.24)
GSP33brssgo3u:2446: karmaṇo 'pūrvasya vā jaḍatvenopakaraṇamātratvātsvatantra īśvara eva phaladāteti siddhānto darśitaḥ //39//
GSP33brssgo3u:2453: śrūyate tāvadayamarthaḥ svargakāmo yajeta ityevamādiṣu vākyeṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2454: tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2455: anyathā hyananuṣṭhātṛko yāga āpadyeta tatrāsyopadeśavaiyarthyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2456: nanvanukṣaṇavināśinaḥ sarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ nopapadyata iti parityakto 'yaṃ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2459: śrutiścetpramāṇaṃ yathāyaṃ karmaphalasamabandhaḥ śruta upapadyate tathā kalpayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2460: nacānutpādya kimapyapūrvaṃ karma vinaśyatkālāntaritaṃ phalaṃ dātuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2461: ataḥ karmaṇo vā sūkṣmā kāciduttarāvasthā phalasya vā pūrvāvasthāpūrvaṃ nāmāstīti tarkyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2468: tasya liṅarthasya preraṇātmano yāgo viṣayastadbhāvāvagamādyāgaḥ svargasādhanamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2470: apūrvadvārā karmaṇaḥ phalamupapadyata ityuktvā siddhāntaṃ dūṣayati-īśvarastviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2471: īśvaraḥ kiṃ karmānapekṣaḥ phalaṃ dadāti tatsāpekṣo vā,
GSP33brssgo3u:2473: dvitīye saṃveṣṭanasaṃskāramātrātkaṭādau veṣṭanavatkarmāpūrvādeva phalasiddheḥ kimīśvareṇeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2474: atra vayaṃ vadāmaḥ-candanakaṇḍakādidṛṣṭasaṃpattyaiva sukhādisaṃbhave kṛtaṃ dharmādharmābhyāmiti śrutismṛtibalāttadapekṣāyāmīśvareṇa kimaparāddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:2484: darmādharmayorapi hi kārayitṛtveneśvaro heturvyapadiśyate phalasya ca dātṛtvena 'eṣa hyeṣa sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2485: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2486: smaryate cāyamartho bhagavadgītāsu - 'yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitumicchati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2489: labhate ca tataḥ kāmānmayaiva vihitānhitān' (7.21) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2491: tadeva ceśvarasya phalahetutvaṃ yatsvakarmānurūpāḥ prajāḥ sṛjatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2496: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:2511: idānīṃ tu prativedāntaṃ vijñānāni bhidyante na veti vicāryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2512: nanu vijñeyaṃ brahma pūrvāparādibhedarahitamekarasaṃ saindhavaghanavadavadhāritaṃ tatra kuto vijñānabhedābhedacintāvatāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2513: nahi karmabahutvavadbrahmabahutvamapi vedānteṣu pratipipādayiṣitamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:2517: yadi punarekasminbrahmaṇi bahūni vijñānāni vedāntāntareṣu pratipipādayiṣitāni teṣāmekamabhrāntaṃ bhrāntānītarāṇītyanāśvāsaprasaṅgo vedānteṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2524: atra hi karmavadupāsanānāṃ bhedābhedau saṃbhavataḥ karmavadeva copāsanāni dṛṣṭaphalāni cocyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:2530: asti cātra vedāntāntaravihiteṣu vijñāneṣvanyadanyannāma taittirīyakaṃ vājasaneyakaṃ kauthumakaṃ śāṭyāyanakamityevamādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2531: tathā rūpabhedo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddho 'vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājina' mityevamādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2533: tadyathā - kecicchākhinaḥ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhamaparamagnimāmananyatpare punaḥ pañcaiva paṭhanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2535: tathā dharmaviśeṣo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādaka āśaṅkitaḥ kārīryādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2538: evaṃ punaruktyādayo 'pi bhedahetavo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vedāntāntareṣu yojayitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2540: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sarvavedāntapratyayāni vijñānāni tasmiṃstasminvedānte tāni tānyeva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2544: yathaikasminnagnihotre śākhābhede 'pi puruṣaprayatnastādṛśa eva codyate juhuyāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2545: evam 'yo ha vai jyoṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda' (bṛ.6.1.1, chā. 5.1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:2546: iti vājasaneyināṃ chandogānāṃ ca tādṛśyeva codanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2547: prayojanasaṃyogo 'pyaviśiṣṭa eva 'jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca svānāṃ bhavati'' (bṛ. 6.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2548: rūpamapyubhayatra tadeva vijñānasya yaduta jyeṣṭhaśreṣṭhādiguṇaviśeṣaṇānvitaṃ prāṇatattvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2549: yathā ca dravyadevate yāgasya rūpamevaṃ vijñeyaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānasya tena hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2553: ye tu nāmarūpādayo bhedahetvābhāsāste prathama eva kāṇḍe na nāmnā syādacodanābhidhānatvāt ityārabhya parihṛtāḥ // 1 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2555: FN: codyata iti codanā puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa hi puruṣavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2559: iha tatphalaṃ vākyārthajñānamānandādayaḥ pradhānasyeti sūtreṇāpunaruktāpekṣitatatpadadvācyārthopasaṃhāreṇa nirdhāryata iti phalaphalibhāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2560: saguṇavākyārthavidyācintā tu tadvidyānāṃ cittaikāgryadvārā nirguṇajñānasādhanatvātkriyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2563: vedyabhede vidyābhedacintā syāt brahmaṇastu vedyasyaikyānna cintāvasara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2567: pūrvapakṣe jñānabhedaśaṅkānupapattimuktvā codanādyabhedājjñānābheda iti siddhānto 'pyayukta ityāha-nāpyasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2569: saguṇavidyāsveva bhedābhedacintā kriyate nirguṇavidyāyāṃ tvaikyaṃ siddhamiti vācyārtharūpaguṇopasaṃhāramātraṃ kriyate vākyārthanirṇayāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2571: atra tu mithobhinnāstāḥ kiṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhidyānte na veti nāmādibhedāccodanādyaviśeṣācca saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2572: pūrvapakṣe vidyābhedādguṇānupasaṃhāraḥ siddhānte tvabhedādupasaṃhāra iti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2574_0: tatroktā hetavo nāmādayo vidyābhedārthamihocyante 'athaiṣa jyotirathaiṣa sarvajyotiretena
GSP33brssgo3u:2574_3: jyotiṣṭomātkarmāntaraṃ viśiṣṭadakṣiṇākaṃ vidhīyata iti nāmnaḥ karmabhedakatvamuktama /
GSP33brssgo3u:2578_0: 'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam'ityatra vaiśvadevyāmikṣāyāge
GSP33brssgo3u:2581: tathā retonyūnā vāgādayaśchāndogye tatsahitā vājināmiti prāṇavidyābhedaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2582: kārīrivākyādhyayane taittirīyakāṇāṃ bhūmau bhojanaṃ dharmaviśeṣo nānyeṣāṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2585: naca tānyeva kārīryādīni karmāṇi dharmaviśeṣamapekṣante nāpekṣante ceti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2586: ato dharmaviśeṣācchākhāntare karmabhedaḥ śaṅkitastathātrāpi muṇḍakādhyayena keṣāñcideva śirasyaṅgārapātradhāraṇarūpaṃ vrataṃ nānyeṣāmiti vidyābhedaḥ syāt punaruktirabhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2587: yathā 'samidho yajati tanūnapātaṃ yajati'iti yajatyabhyāsātprayājānāṃ bheda uktastathā śākhāntare 'bhyāsādvidyābhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2592: ete nindāprayaścitte vedāntavidyāsu na vidyete iti nodāhriyete /
GSP33brssgo3u:2593_0: yathā sarvaśākhāvihitasya karmaṇo jñātuṃ kartuṃ cāśakterbhedastathā sarvavedāntādhyayanajñānādyaśaktestattadvedāntavidyābhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2593_1: syāt tathā śākhānāṃ sarvāsāmekarūpā samāptirnocyate kintu kasyāścitkvacitkarmaṇi
GSP33brssgo3u:2595: anyārthadarśanamarthavādastadbhedātkarmabhedavadvidyābheda iti pūrvapakṣasūtroktā hetavo darśitāste kecitsiddhānte pūrvapakṣe cātropayuñjanta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2597: tatra nāmadheyaṃ guṇo rūpamabhyāsaśceti trayaṃ vyākhyātaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2599: 'tisra āhutīrjuhoti'iti saṃkhyayā karmabhedavat 'vāyuprāṇau'iti dvitvasaṃkhyayā saṃvargavidyābhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2600: nityāgnihotraprakaraṇātprakaraṇāntare kuṇḍapāyināmayane 'māsamagnihotraṃ juhvati'iti śrutamagnihotraṃ prakaraṇāntarasthatvātkarmāntaramiti siddhāntitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2604: uktanāmādibhiragnihotrādikarmaṇāṃ pratiśākhaṃ bhede prāpte śākhāntarādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtraṃ 'ekaṃ vā saṃyogarūpacodanākhyāviśeṣāt'iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2608: yathā jyeṣṭhatvādiguṇakaprāṇavidyā sarvaśākhāsvekā tathā pañcāgnividyāpyekā phalasaṃyogādyaviśeṣāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:2612: kutaḥ acodanābhidhānatvātkāṭhakādiśabdānāṃ granthanāmatayā karmavācitvābhāvādato bhinnanāmakaśākhāgranthabhede 'pi tādvihitaṃ karmaikameva,
GSP33brssgo3u:2614: dharmaviśeṣastvadhyayanāṅgaṃ na karmāṅgamato na karmabhedakaḥ śākhābhede punaruktirasiddhā,
GSP33brssgo3u:2617: evaṃ samāptivacanabhedo 'pyaprayojaka ityaivaṃ karmābhedapramāṇaprābalye bhedahetavaḥ parihṛtā ityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo3u:2622: bhedān neti cen naikasyām api / BBs_3,3.2 /
GSP33brssgo3u:2625: tathāhi vājasaneyinaḥ pañcāgnividyāṃ prastutyaḥ ṣṭhamaparamagnimāmananti - 'tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati' (bṛ. 6.2.14) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2626: chandogāstu taṃ nāmananti pañcasaṃkhyayaiva ca ta upasaṃharanti 'atha ha ya etānevaṃ pañcāgnīnveda' (chā. 5.10.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2627: yoṣāṃ ca sa guṇo 'sti yeṣāṃ ca nāsti kathamubhayeṣāmekā vidyopapadyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2630: tathā prāṇasaṃvāde śreṣṭhādanyāṃścaturaḥ prāṇānvākcakṣuḥ śrotamanāṃsi chandogā āmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2631: vājasaneyinastu pañcamamapyāmananti 'reto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāyate ha prajayā paśubhirya evaṃ veda' (bṛ. 6.1.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2632: āvāpodvāpabhedācca vedyabhedo bhavati vedyabhedācca vidyābhedo dravyadevatābhedādiva yāgasyeti cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:2635: yadyapi ṣaṣṭhasyāgnerupasaṃhāro na saṃbhavati tathāpi dyuprabhṛtīnāṃ pañcānāmagnīnāmubhayatra pratyabhijñāyāmānatvānna vidyābhedo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2637: paṭhyate 'pi ca ṣaṣṭho 'gniśchandogaiḥ - 'taṃ pretaṃ diṣṭamito 'gnaya evaṃ haranti'
GSP33brssgo3u:2639: vājasaneyinastu sāṃpādikeṣu pañcasvagniṣvanuvṛttāyāḥ samiddhūmādikalpanāyā nivṛttaye 'tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati samitsamit' (bṛ. 6.2.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:2641: athāpyupāsanārtha eṣa vādastathāpi sa guṇaḥ śakyatechandogairapyupasaṃhartum /
GSP33brssgo3u:2643: sāṃpādikāgnyabhiprāyā hyeṣā pañcasaṃkhyā nityānuvādabhūtā na vidhisamavāyinītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2649: FN: ito 'smāllokān diṣṭaṃ lokāntaraṃ pretaṃ gataṃ jñātayo 'gnaye harantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2653: asya pṛthakśāstratvātkarmanyāyānāṃ mānasavidyāsu vinā sūtraṃ duryojatvācca punaruktigandho 'pi nāstīti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2654: nanu tasya mṛtasya dāhārthamagnirantyeṣṭigataḥ ṣaṣṭho yaḥ prasiddhavadvājibhiruktaḥ sa chāndogye upasaṃhārya iti na rūpabhedaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2656: astu prajananaguṇavato retaso vājināmāvāpaśchandogānāṃ ca tasyodvāpastataḥ kimityata āha-āvāpeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2657: chāndogye ṣaṣṭhāgnyabhāvamaṅgīkṛtyālparūpabhedo na vidyaikyavirodhīti pariharati-naiṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2659: ito 'smāllokādiṣṭaṃ lokāntaraṃ pretaṃ gataṃ jñātayo 'gnaye harantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2660: nanu chāndogye 'gnimātraṃ śrutaṃ vājibhistu samidādiviśeṣaḥ paṭhyate iti rūpabhedastadavasthaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2662: ṣaṣṭhāgnestadviśeṣasya cānuvādamātratvenānupāsyatvātpañcāgnaya evopāsyā ubhayatreti na rūpabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2664: dyulokādīnāṃ pañcānāmanagnīnāmagnitvasaṃpattividhinaivārthātpañcatvaṃ saṃpattikalpitāgnīnāṃ siddhamanūdyate na dhyeyatvena vidhīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2665: chandogairvājiśākhāsthaṃ reta upasaṃhartavyamityuktvānupasaṃhāre 'pi na vidyābheda ityāha-na cāvāpeti //2//
GSP33brssgo3u:2669: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārāc ca savavac ca tanniyamaḥ / BBs_3,3.3 /
GSP33brssgo3u:2670: yadapyuktamātharvaṇikānāṃ vidyāṃ prati śirovratādyapekṣaṇādanyeṣāṃ ca tadanapekṣaṇādvadyābheda iti tatpratyucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2673: yatastathātvena svādyāyadharmatvena samācāre vedavratopadeśapare granta ātharvaṇikā idamapi vedavratatvena vyākyātamiti samāmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2675: iti cādikṛtaviṣayādecchabdādadhyayanaśabdācca svopaniṣadadhyayanadharma evaiṣa iti nirdāryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2676: nanu ca 'teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta śirovrataṃ vidhivadyaistu cīrṇam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.10)
GSP33brssgo3u:2677: iti brahmavidyāsaṃyogaśravaṇādekaiva sarvatra brahmavidyeti saṃkīryetaiṣa dharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2680: praka-tatvaṃ ca brahmavidyāyā granthaviśeṣāpekṣamiti granthaviśeṣasaṃyogyevaiṣa dharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2684: evaṃ rūpabhedo na vidyābhedaka ityuktvā dharmaviśeṣo 'pi na bhedaka ityāha-svādhyāyasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2685: godānavadadhyayanāṅgatvena śirovratamātharvaṇikānāṃ sūtre vihitaṃ na vidyāṅgamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2687: etatprakṛtaṃ muṇḍakamananuṣṭhitaśirovrato naro nādhīta iti śrutermuṇḍakādhyayanāṅgameva śirovratamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2688: nanu vidyāṅgatvenāpi idaṃ vrataṃ śrutamiti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2689: sarvaśākhāsu brahmavidyaikaiva cedvidyāsaṃyuktaṃ vratamapi sarvatra saṃbadhyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2692: tasya śirovratasya muṇḍakādhyayane niyama ityatra savavaditi nidarśananirdeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2694: atharvaṇaiḥ svasūtre udita eko 'gnirekarṣisaṃjñayā prasiddhastasminnagnau kāryā iti yathā niyamyante tathetyarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo3u:2699: darśayati ca vedo 'pi vidyaikatvaṃ sarvavedānteṣu vedyaikatvopadeśāt sarve vedā yatparamāmananti (ka. 2.15) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2700: tathā etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvarya etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ iti ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:2702: iti kāṭhaka uktasyeśvaraguṇasya bhayahetukasya taittirīyake bhedarśananindāyai parāmarśo dṛśyate 'yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnudaramantaraṃ kurute /
GSP33brssgo3u:2705: tathā vājasaneyake prādeśamātrasaṃpāditasya vaiśvānarasya chāndogye siddhavadupādānam 'yastvetamevaṃ prādeśamātramabhivimānamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaramupāste' (chā. 5.18.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2710: kiñca śākhāntaroktapādārthasya śākhāntare siddhavatparāmarśo vidyaikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-tathā mahadbhayamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2711: eṣa nara etasminnadvaye 'lpamapyantaraṃ bhedaṃ yadā paśyatyatha tadā tasya saṃsārabhayaṃ bhavatyeva,
GSP33brssgo3u:2712: yasmādviduṣo narasya bhedadarśinastadeva brahma bhayaṅkaraṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo3u:2715: kiñca sarveṣu vedānteṣūkthādīnāṃ pratīyamānatvena hetunaitadavagamyate-anyatroktānāṃ teṣāmanyatropāstyarthamupādānamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2724: sthite caivaṃ sarvavedāntapratyayatve sarvavijñānānāmanyatroditānāṃ vijñānaguṇānāmanyatrāpi samāne vijñāna upasaṃhāro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2726: ya eva hi teṣāṃ guṇānāmekatrārtho viśiṣṭavijñānopakārakaḥ sa evānyatrāpi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2730: yadi hi vijñānabhedo bhavettato vijñānāntaranibaddhatvādguṇānāṃ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvābhāvācca na syādupasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2732: asyaiva tu prayojanasūtrasya prapañcaḥ sarvābhedādityārabhya bhaviṣyati // 5 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2734_0: śākhābhede samānavidyāyāṃ śrutā guṇā yathāśruti vyavasthitā uta ekatrāśrutā itaraśākhāta
GSP33brssgo3u:2734_1: upasaṃhartavyā iti saṃdehe vidyaikye 'pi tatra tatroktaireva guṇairvidyopakārasiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2742: nanvāgneyayāgāvaruddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ tato 'bhinne saurye prāptivadvidyāntarasthaguṇānāṃ vidyāntare prāptiḥ kiṃ syādityata āha-prakṛtīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2743: prakṛtiguṇānāṃ vikāre prāptiryuktā vidyānāṃ tu prakṛtivikṛtibhāvāsiddherna tatprāptirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2751: anyathātvaṃ śabdād iti cen nāviśeṣāt / BBs_3,3.6 /
GSP33brssgo3u:2754_1: paṭhyate - 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhya eṣa prāṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:2756: iti prakramyetarānprāṇānasurapāpmaviddhatvena ninditvā tathaiva mukhyaprāṇaparigrahaḥ paṭhyate - 'atha ha ya evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ prāṇastamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire' (chā. 1.2.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2761: anyathā hi prakramante vājasaneyino 'nyathā chandogāḥ 'tvaṃ na udgāya' (bṛ. 1.3.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:2769: vājasaneyake 'picodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya śrutam - 'eṣa u vā udgīthaḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.23) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2777_0: 'te ha devāḥ sāttvikavṛttayaḥ prāṇā anyonyamucūrhantedānīmasminyajñe udgīthenaudgātreṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:2777_1: karmaṇā rajastamovṛttirūpānasurānatītya devatvaṃ gacchāmaḥ'iti te caivaṃ nirdeṣamudgīthakartāramupāsyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2777_2: nirdhārayituṃ kṛtasaṃvādāḥ prathamaṃ vācyaṃ parīkṣitavantastvamaudgātraṃ no 'smākaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2777_3: kurviti tayā tvanṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā ghrāṇacakṣuḥśrotramanāṃsyapi kāmenāsurapāpmanā
GSP33brssgo3u:2777_4: grastānīti ninditvā āsanyamāsye bhavaṃ mukhamadhyasthaṃ prāṇamupāsyaṃ nirdhāritavanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2780: atra pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenodgīthavidyeti saṃjñaikyena vidyaikyamiti pūrvapakṣe mitho guṇopasaṃhāraḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2782: evaṃ yatra pūrvanyāyena pūrvapakṣaḥ tatrāpavādikī saṃgatiriti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2789: alparūpabhedo na vidyaikyavirodhītyuktanyāyena pūrvapakṣī pariharati-naiṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2791: yathāśmānaṃ prāpya loṣṭo vidhvaṃsate tathā prāṇaṃ hantumāgatā asurāstasya vīryeṇa svayameva dhvastā iti śrutamubhayatretyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2793: udgīthakartṛrūpatvena prāṇasyobhayatra śrutatvādekatra śrutaṃ kartṛtvamapyubhayatra draṣṭavyamityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brssgo3u:2798: na vā vidyaikatvamātra nyāyyaṃ vidyābheda evātra nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2804: ityevamudgīthāvayavasyoṅkārasyopāsyatvaṃ prastutya rasatamādiguṇopavyākhyānaṃ tatra kṛtvā atha khalvetasyaivākṣarasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhavati (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssgo3u:2805: iti punarapi tamevodgīthāvayavamoṅkāramanuvartya devāsurākhyāyikādvāreṇa tam prāṇamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire (chā. 1.2.2) ityāha /
GSP33brssgo3u:2806: tatra yadyudgīthaśabdena sakalā bhaktirabhipreyeta tasyāśca kartodgātartviktata upakramaścoparapadhyeta lakṣaṇā ca psajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2811: ityapi tasyāḥ kartodgātartvikprāṇatvena nirūpyata iti prasthānāntaram /
GSP33brssgo3u:2812: yadapi tatrodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya tadapyudgātṛtvenaiva didarśayiṣitasya prāṇasya sarvātmatvapratipādanārthamiti na vidyaikatvamāvahati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2813: sakalabhaktiviṣaya eva ca tatrāpyudgīthaśabda iti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2816: tathāca tatraiva śrāvitam- vācā ca hyeva sa prāṇena codagāyat (bṛ. 1.3.24) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2818_0: tathāhyabhyudayavākye paśukāmavākye ca tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye
GSP33brssgo3u:2833: āptiḥ samṛddhiriti guṇānuktvā guṇavatyoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhānāyākhyāyikā prastutetyāha-rasatameti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2835: prāṇamudgīthamityatrāpyudgīthakartā prāṇa upāsya iti vyākhyāyatāmityata āha-tatra yadyudgītheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2836: oṅkāropāstyupakramasaṅga udgīthapade kartṛlakṣaṇā ceti doṣadvayaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2837_0: nanu siddhānte 'pi tatpade 'vayavalakṣaṇā svīkāryā tato varaṃ kartṛlakṣaṇā śrutyantarānugrahāttathā
GSP33brssgo3u:2842: evaṃ chāndogye oṅkāra upāsya ukta itaratra tu prāṇa ityupāsyabhedādvidyābheda ityāha-vājeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2844: tatrodgītha upāsyatayā noktaḥ kintu prāṇasyopāsyasya guṇatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2847: sa udgātā vāgviśiṣṭaprāṇenaudgātraṃ kṛtavāniti śruterasaṃbhavo 'pi netyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2850: ekatrodgātā prāṇa upāsyo 'nyatroṅkāra ityantaraṅgopāsyarūpabhede spaṣṭe sati bahiraṅgārthavādasāmyamātreṇa nopāsanaikyaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2852_0: 'vi vā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya havirniruptaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2852_1: purastāccandramā abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye dātre
GSP33brssgo3u:2852_2: puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ kuryādye sthaviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ ye 'ṇiṣṭhāstānviṣṇave
GSP33brssgo3u:2853_2: candramāśca paścādabhyudeti tametaṃ yajamānaṃ kālavyatyayāparādhāttadeva niruptaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2853_3: haviḥ prajādinārdhayati viyojayati śatruṃ cāsya vardhayati yasmātkālabhrāntimānyajamānaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2854_0: ye madhyamādibhāvena tredhā bhūtāstaṇḍulā dadhyādisahitā niruptāstānvibhajedagnyādibhyo
GSP33brssgo3u:2854_1: viyojayadviyojya ca dātṛtvādiguṇakānagnyādibhyo darśadevābhinnebhyo nirvapediti dadhan
GSP33brssgo3u:2855_0: atra kālāparādhe devāntarayuktaṃ prāyaścittarūpaṃ darśādbhinnaṃ karma vidhīyata iti
GSP33brssgo3u:2855_1: prāpte taṇḍulatredhātvādyanuvādena vibhajediti haviṣaḥ prakṛtadevaviyogena tasminneva
GSP33brssgo3u:2857_0: paśukāmavākye tu yadyapi ye sthaviṣṭhāstānagnaye sanimate 'ṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedye
GSP33brssgo3u:2857_1: madhyamāstān viṣaṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścarumiti
GSP33brssgo3u:2858_0: tathāpi yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syātso 'māvāsyāmiṣṭvā vatsānapākuryāditi nityaṃ darśakarma
GSP33brssgo3u:2858_2: nābhyudayavākyenārthaikyamiti tathā prakṛte 'pi nirdeśasāmyaṃ na vidyaikyaprayojakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2861: para iti sakārāntaṃ parasmāt paraścāsau varācca varatara iti parovarīyānityekaṃ padam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2863: ākāśātmanā hiraṇyaśmaśrupuruṣātmanā codgīthopāstisāmye 'pi vidyābhedavadihāpi bheda ityarthaḥ //7//
GSP33brssgo3u:2867: saṃjñātaś cet tad uktam asti tu tad api / BBs_3,3.8 /
GSP33brssgo3u:2870: uktaṃ hyetat - 'na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat' (bra. sū. 3.3.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2871: tadeva cātra nyāyyataraṃ śrutyakṣarānugataṃ hi tatsaṃjñaikatvaṃ tu śrutyakṣarabāhyamudgīthaśabdamātraprayogāllaukikairvyahartṛbhirupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2873: tathā prasiddhabhedānāmapyagnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ kāṭhakaikagranthaparipaṭhitānāṃ kāṭhakasaṃjñakatvaṃ dṛśyate tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2874: yatra tu nāsti kaścidevañjātīyako bhedahetustatra bhavatu saṃjñaikatvādvidyaikatvaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyādiṣu // 8 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2880: asati bādhake saṃjñaikyamapi mānaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyeti saṃjñaikyātsarvaśākhāsu tadvidyaikyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2888: ityatrākṣarodgīthaśabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye śrūyamāṇe 'dhyāsāpavādaikatvaviśeṣaṇapakṣāṇāṃ pratibhāsanātkatamo 'tra pakṣo nyāyyaḥ syāditi vicāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2891: yathā nāmni brahmabuddhāvadhyasyamānāyāmapyanuvartata eva nāmabuddhirna brahmabuddhyā nivartate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2894: apavādo nāma yatra kasmiṃścidvastuni pūrvaniviṣṭāyāṃ mithyābuddhau niścitāyāṃ paścādupajāyamānā yathārthā buddhiḥ pūrvaniviṣṭāyā mithyābuddhernivartikā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2902: viśeṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvavedavyāpina omityetasyākṣarasya grahaṇaprasaṅga audgātraviśeṣasya samarpaṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2905: evametasminsāmānādhikaraṇyavākye vimṛśyamāna ete pakṣāḥ pratibhānti tatrānyatamanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvādanirdāraṇaprāptāvidamucyate - vyāpteśca samañjasamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2907: tadiha kṣayaḥ pakṣāḥ sāvadyā iti paryudasyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:2909: tatrādhyāse tāvadyā buddhiritaratrādhyasyate tacchabdasya lakṣaṇāvṛttitvaṃ prasajyeta tatphalaṃ ca kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2910: śrūyata eva phalam 'āpayitā ha vai kāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:2922: nāpyekatvapakṣaḥ saṃgacchate niṣprayojanaṃ hi tadā śabdadvayoccāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2924: naca hautraviṣaya ādhvaryavaviṣaye vākṣara oṅkāraśabdavācya udgīthaśabdaprasiddhirasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2929: sarvavyāpyakṣaramiha mā prasañjītyata udgīthaśabdenākṣaraṃ viśeṣyate kathaṃ nāmodgīthāvayavabhūta oṅkāro gṛhyeteti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2934: adhyāsapakṣe hyarthāntarabuddhirarthāntare nikṣipyata iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā viśeṣaṇapakṣe pravṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣvapi pravartamānā dṛṣṭāḥ paṭagrāmādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2943: pūrvamudgātṛkarmātmakodgīthāvayavatvamoṅkārasya dhyeyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ siddhavatkṛtya dhyeyabhedādvidyābhedaḥ siddhāntitaḥ sa na yukta ityākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2944: atra pūrvapakṣe pūrvoktasiddhāntāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti matvā siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-caśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2946: yasyodgīthasya buddhiroṅkāre 'dhyasyate tadvācakodgīthaśabdasyoṅkāre lakṣaṇā syāttadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇaparatvāttathā saṃbandho 'pyasiddhaḥ kalpanīyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2947: pratīkopāsteḥ phalaṃ ca kalpyamiti gauravaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2950: 'oṅkāra āptiḥ samṛddhiriti' 'ya upāste sa kāmānāpnoti'iti śrutaṃ phalaṃ nādhyāsasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2952: bhrāntiścet nivarteta na tu nivartata ityabhrantirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2953: kiñca tattvabodhakādvākyādbhrāntyapavādo bhavati nedaṃ vākyaṃ tattvaparamityāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2957: 'omityakṣaramupāsīta'ityukte sarvavedavyāpyoṅkāra ihopāstau prasajyeta tannirāsārthamudgīthāvayavatvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ samañjasamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2958: adhyāsapakṣe tadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇayogarūpaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpya iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā avayavalakṣaṇā tu saṃnikṛṣṭā avayavāvayavisaṃbandhasya kḷptatvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:2959: paṭāvayave dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti loke prayogācca /
GSP33brssgo3u:2960: nāmādau brahmaśabdasya tvagatyā brahmabuddhigrāhyatvaguṇalakṣaṇāśritā tatra pratīkopāstervivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2961_0: iha tu pratīkopāstividhikalpane āptyādiguṇakoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhāne ca vākyabhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2967: vājināṃ chandogānāṃ ca prāṇasaṃvāde śraiṣṭhyaguṇānvitasya prāṇasyopāsyatvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2968: vāgādayo 'pi hi tatra vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇānvitā uktāḥ te ca prāṇe punaḥ pratyarpitāḥ - 'yadvā ahaṃ vasiṣṭho 'smi tvaṃ tadvasiśṣo 'si' (bṛ. 6.1.14) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2969: anyeṣāmapi tu śākhināṃ kauṣītaki prabhṛtīnāṃ prāṇasaṃvādeṣu athāto niḥśreyasādānam 'etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānāḥ' (kau. 2.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:2970: ityevañjātīyakeṣu prāṇasya śraiḥṣṭamuktaṃ na tvime vasiṣṭhatvādayo 'pi guṇā uktāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2971: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime vasiṣṭhatvādayo guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatrāpyasyerannuta nāsyeranniti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2974: 'atho ya evaṃ vidvānprāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā' iti tatratatraivaṃśabdena vedyaṃ vastu nivedyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2975: evaṃśabdaśca saṃnihitāvalambano na śākhāntaraparipaṭhimevañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ śaknoti nivedayitum /
GSP33brssgo3u:2977: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - asyetanniyame guṇāḥ kvaciduktā vasiṣṭhatvādayo 'nyatrāpi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2981: abhede ca vijñānasya kathamime guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatra nāsyeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:2982: nanvevaṃśabdastatra tatra bhedenaivañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ vedyatvāya samarpayatītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2983_1: tasminneva vijñāne vājasaneyibrāhmaṇagatenaivaṃśabdena tatsaṃśabditamiti na paraśākhāgatamapyabhinnavijñānāvaruddhaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2985: ekasyāmapi hi śākhāyāṃ śrutā guṇāḥ śrutā eva sarvatra bhavanti guṇavato bhedābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2986: nahi devadattaḥ śauryādiguṇatvena svadeśe prasiddho deśāntaraṃ gatastaddeśyairavibhāvitaśauryādiguṇo 'pyatadguṇo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2999: te ca guṇāḥ prāṇasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ niścitya vāgādibhistasminnarpitā iti śākhādvayasaṃmator'thaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3006: yathā vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaśraiṣṭhyaṃ siddhamatho tathā ya evaṃ śraiṣṭhyaguṇaṃ vidvānupāste sa prāṇe śraiṣṭhyaṃ viditvā śreṣṭho bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3007: evaṃ jātīyakavidyaikyātprāptamārthikaṃ vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātamevaṃśabdo na gṛhṇāti śrutāvalambitvāditi prāpte siddhāntayati-asyeranniti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3008: vājasaneyibrāhmaṇe tāvadevaṃśabdena vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātasya prāṇavidyāsaṃbandhaḥ siddhaḥ saiva vidyā kauṣītakiśrutau pratyabhijñāyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:3015: aparigaṇitā api guṇāḥ śrutā evetyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3022: brahmasvarūpapratipādanaparāsu śrutiṣvānandarūpatvaṃ vijñānaghanatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvātmatvamityevañjātīyakā brahmaṇo dharmāḥ kvacitkecicchrūyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3023: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimānandādayo brahmadharmā yatra yāvantaḥ śrūyante tāvanta eva tatra pratipattavyāḥ kiṃvā sarve sarvatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3024: tatra yathāśrutivibhāgaṃ dharmapratipattau prāptāyāmidamucyate - ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya brahmaṇo dharmāḥ sarve sarvatra pratipattavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3027: sarvatra hi tadevaikaṃ pradhānaṃ viśeṣyaṃ brahma na bhidyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3029: nanvevaṃ sati priyaśirastvādayo 'pi dharmāḥ sarvatra saṃkīryeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:3030: tathāhi - taittirīyaka ānandamayamātmānaṃ prakramyāmnāyate - 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3040: brahmaṇastu nirviśeṣatvātsvaśākhāgatapadaireva pramitisiddhervyarthaḥ padāntaropasaṃhāra iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3043: tāni ca samānādhikaraṇāni padāni viruddhadharmatyāgena sarvādhiṣṭhānabhūtāmekāmakhaṇḍavyaktiṃ kṣayanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3044: na caikenaiva padena lakṣyasiddheḥ padāntaraṃ vyarthamiti vācyaṃ,
