GSP33brssgo3u:3046: yadyapi padadvaye 'pi lakṣaṇāvatarati tathāpyānando brahmetyukte duḥkhatvālpatvabhrantinirāse 'pyasattvajaḍatvādibhramo bhavedatastannirāsārthaṃ satyajñānādipadāni prayoktavyāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:3049: tacca viśeṣadarśanaṃ yāvadbhiḥ padairbhavati tāvanti padānyupasaṃhartavyānīti bhāvaḥ //11//
GSP33brssgo3u:3055: priyaśirastvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ taittirīyaka āmnātānāṃ nāstyanyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3056: yatkāraṇaṃ priyaṃ modaḥ pramoda ānanda ityete parasparāpekṣayā bhoktrantarāpekṣayā copacitāpacitarūpā upalabhyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3062: apica parasminbrahmaṇi cittāvatāropāyamātratvenaite parikalpyante na draṣṭavyatvena /
GSP33brssgo3u:3065: sa ca nyāyo 'nyeṣu niściteṣu brahmadharmeṣūpāsanāyopadiśyamāneṣu netavyaḥ saṃyadvāmādiṣu satyakāmādiṣu ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:3066: teṣu hi satyapyupāsyasya brahmaṇa ekatme prakramabhedādupāsanābhede sati nānyonyadharmāṇāmanyonyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3067: yathā ca dve nāryāvekaṃ nṛpatimupāsate chatreṇaikā cāmareṇānyā tatropāsyaikatve 'pyupāsanābhedo dharmavyavasthā ca bhavetyevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3068: upacitāpacitaguṇatvaṃ hi sati bhedavyavahāre saguṇe brahmaṇyupapadyate na nirguṇe parasminbrahmaṇi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3069: ato na satyakāmatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kvacicchrutānāṃ sarvatra prāptirityarthaḥ // 12 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3070: brahmaikyāccedānandatvādidharmāṇāṃ sarvatra prāptistarhi saguṇabrahmavidyāgatadharmaprāptirapi syāditi śaṅkānirāsārthaṃ sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-priyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3071_0: putradarśanasukhaṃ priyaṃ tadvārtādinā modastasya vidyādyatiśaye pramoda ityevaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3071_1: tāratamyavanto dharmāstvadvaye jñeye na prāpnuvanti teṣāmabrahmasvarūpāṇāṃ brahmajñānānupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3072: teṣāṃ brahma dharmatvaṃ cāsiddhamityāha-na caita iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3084_1: brahmaṇo dharmiṇa ekatvātsarve sarvatra pratīyeranniti vaiṣamyaṃ pratipattimātraprayojanā hi ta iti // 13 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3092: kāṭhake hi paṭhyate - 'indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3094: ityārabhya 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' (ka. 3.11 ) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3095: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime sarva evārthādayastatastataḥ paratvena pratipādyanta uta puruṣa evaibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ pratipādyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3096: tatra tāvatsarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ paratvena pratipādanamiti bhavati matiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3099: nanu bahuṣvartheṣu paratvena pratipipādayiṣiteṣu vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3104: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - puruṣa eva hyebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ pratipādya iti yuktaṃ na pratyekameṣāṃ paratvapratipādanam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3107: nahītareṣu paratvena pratipanneṣu kiñcitprayojanaṃ dṛśyate prayojanaṃ mokṣasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3109: apica parapratiṣedhena kāṣṭhāśabdena ca puruṣaviṣayamādaraṃ darśayanpuruṣapratipattyarthaiva pūrvāparapravāhoktiriti darśayati - ādhyānāyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3117: utsūtrasiddhāntaṃ pratijñāya sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-puruṣa eveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3118: phalavattve satyapūrvatvātpuruṣasyaiva prādhānyena pratipādyatvamaphalārthādīnāṃ paratvaṃ tu taccheṣatvenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3119_0: kiñca 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā'iti vedaḥ paraniṣedhaliṅgena sarvabādhāvadhitvaliṅgena
GSP33brssgo3u:3120: arthādīnāmatroktirādhyānāya tattatparatvādhyānapūrvakaṃ puruṣadarśanāyaiva svataḥ prayojanābhāvāditi sūtraṃ yojayati-ādhyānāyeti //14//
GSP33brssgo3u:3126: yatkāraṇam 'eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3130: tasyaiva ca durvijñānatāṃ saṃskṛtamitigamyatāṃ ca darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3134: evamanekaprakāra āśayātiśayaḥ śruteḥ puruṣe lakṣyate netareṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:3136: ityukte kiṃ tadadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamityasyāmākāṅkṣāyāmindriyādyanukramaṇātparamapadapratipattyartha evāyamāyāma ityavasīyate // 15 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3139: puraṣānna paraṃ kiñcit'ityupakramopasaṃhārayoraikarūpyātkḷptaphalavadekapuruṣaparatvenaikavākyatvaniścaye sati vākyabhedaphalabhedakalpanā na yuktā gauravādityāha-apiceti //15//
GSP33brssgo3u:3145: aitareyake śrūyate - 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīnnānyatkiñcana miṣatsa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā' (ai. 1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3147: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ para evātmaśabdenābhilapyata utānyaḥ kaściditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3151: nanu vākyānvayaḥ sutarāṃ paramātmaviṣayo dṛśyate prāgutpatterātmaikatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3155: paramātmani hi sraṣṭari parigṛhyamāṇe mahābhūtasṛṣṭirādau vaktavyā lokasṛṣṭistvihādāvucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3159: smṛtirapi 'sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥsa vai puruṣaḥ ucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3160: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3161: aitareyiṇo 'pi athāto retasaḥ prajāpate reto devāḥ ityatra pūrvasminprakaraṇe prajāpatikartṛkāṃ vicitrāṃ sṛṣṭimāmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3162: ātmaśabdo 'pi tasminprayujyamāno dṛśyate - ātmaivedamagra āsītpuruṣavidhiḥ' (bṛ. 1.4.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:3165: apica tābhyo gāmānayattābhyo 'śvamānayattābhyoḥ puruṣamānayattā abruvannityevañjātīyako bhūyānvyāpāraviśeṣo laukikeṣu viśeṣavatsvātmasu prasiddha ihānugamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3167: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - 'para evātmehātmaśabdena gṛhyata itaravat /
GSP33brssgo3u:3168: yathetareṣu sṛṣṭiśravaṇeṣu tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3170: yathā cetarasmiṃllaukikātmaśabdaprayoge pratyagātmaiva mukhya ātmaśabdena gṛhyate tathehāpi bhavitumarhati yatra tu 'ātmaivedamagra āsīt' (bṛ. 1.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3172: ityevamādi viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ śrūyate bhavettatra viśeṣata ātmano grahaṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3173: atra punaḥ paramātmagrahaṇānuguṇameva viśeṣaṇamapyuttaramupalabhyate 'sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā iti' (ai. 1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3195_1: prajāpate reto devā iti pūrvasmātprajāpativākyādbhedaprasaṅgādātmā vā ityādivākyasya
GSP33brssgo3u:3201: ambho marīcīrmaramāpa iti sūtrayitvā svayameva śrutirvyācaṣṭe-pareṇa divaṃ divaḥ parastāddivi pratiṣṭhitaścandrāmbhasā vyāpto yo lokaḥ tadambhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3213: kiñca prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tāḥ prati bhogārthaṃ gāmānayallokasraṣṭā tathāśvamānayat /
GSP33brssgo3u:3214: tāstu gavāśvaprāptyā na tṛptāstataḥ puruṣaśarīre ānīte tā abruvaṃstṛptāḥ sma iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3215: ayaṃ ca vyavahāro lokasraṣṭuḥ prajāpatitve liṅgamityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3216: ātmaśabdasya cidātmani mukhyatvānmukhyagrahe bādhakābhāvāduttarasyekṣaṇāderanukūlatvātparamātmagrahaṇamiti siddhāntayati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3221: anvayād iti cet syād avadhāraṇāt / BBs_3,3.17 /
GSP33brssgo3u:3233: śrutyantaraprasiddho hi samānaviṣayo viśeṣaḥ śrutyantareṣūpasaṃhartavyo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3234: yo 'pyayaṃ vyāpāraviśeṣānugamastābhyo gāmānayadityevamādiḥ so 'pi vivakṣitārthāvadhāraṇānuguṇyenaiva grahītavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3235: nahyayaṃ sakalaḥ kathāprabandho vivakṣata iti śakyate vaktuma,
GSP33brssgo3u:3238_0: tathāhyamabhaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ lokānāṃ lokapālānāṃ cāgnyādīnāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ śiṣṭāvā karaṇāni
GSP33brssgo3u:3238_1: karaṇāyatanaṃ ca śarīramupadiśya sa eva sraṣṭā 'kathaṃ nvidaṃ madṛte syāt' (ai. 3.11
GSP33brssgo3u:3238_2: iti vīkṣyedaṃ śarīraṃ praviveśeti darśayati - 'sa etameva sīmānaṃ vidāryaitayā dvārā
GSP33brssgo3u:3241: iti vīkṣya 'sa etameva puruṣaṃ brahma tatamamapaśyat' (ai. 3.13)
GSP33brssgo3u:3244: ityādinā samastabhedajātaṃ saha mahābhūtairamukramya 'sarvaṃ tatprajñānetraṃ prajñāne pratiṣṭhitaṃ prajñānetro lokaḥ prajñā pratiṣṭhā prajñānaṃ brahma' (aita. 5.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:3248: vājasaneyake 'katama ātmeti yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 4.3.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:3250: tathāhyupasaṃharati - 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto 'bhayo brahma' (bṛ. 4.4.25) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3254: tatra saṃśayaḥ - tulyārthatvaṃ kimanayorāmnānayoḥ syādatulyārthatvaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3269: yaduktamupakramānvayādupakrame cātmaśabdaśravaṇābhāvānnātmagṛhītiriti tasya kaḥ parihāra iti cetso 'bhidhīyate syādavadhāraṇāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3275: anyathā hi yo 'yaṃ mikhya ātmā sa na vijñāta iti naiva sarvavijñānaṃ saṃpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:3276: tathā prāgutpatterekatvāvadhāraṇaṃ jīvasya cātmaśabdena parāmarśaḥ svāpāvasthāyāṃ ca tatsvabhāvasaṃpattikathanaṃ paricodanāpūrvakaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:3280: sāmānyopakramaśca na vākyaśeṣagatena viśeṣeṇa virudhyate viśeṣākāṅkṣitvātsāmānyasya /
GSP33brssgo3u:3281: sacchabdārtho 'pi ca paryālocyamāno na mukhyādātmano 'nyaḥ saṃbhavatyato 'nyasya vastujātasyārambhaṇaśabdādibhyo 'nṛtatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3284: tasmādevañjātīyakeṣu vākyeṣu pratipādanaprakārabhede 'pi pratipādyārthābheda iti siddham // 17 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3292: etameva sīmānaṃ mūrdhnaḥ keśavibhāgāvasānaṃ vidārya chidraṃ kṛtvā etayā brahmarandhrākhyayā dvārā liṅgaviśiṣṭaḥ praviṣṭavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3293: māṃ vinā yadi vāgādibhiḥ svasvavyāpāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3294: atha tadāhaṃ ka iti tvaṃpadārthaṃ vicārya svayametadeva śodhitamātmānaṃ brahma tatamaṃ vyāptatamamapaśyat /
GSP33brssgo3u:3296: prajñā cidātmā netraṃ nīyate 'neneti niyāmakaṃ yasya tat prajñānetraṃ cidātmaniyamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3303: padānāṃ jātau śaktigrahātsacchabdo 'pi sattājātivācītyupakramasya niścitārthatvādasaṃjātavirodhyupakramabalena tādātmyopadeśaḥ saṃpattiparatayā neya iti pūrvapakṣaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3304: pūrvatra vākyaikyādarthādiparatvaṃ tyaktvā vidyaikyamuktamiha tu sadātmaśabdābhyāṃ jātyātmavācibhyāmupakramabhedādvākyabhede sati vidyābheda iti pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3314: suptau jīvaḥ satā saṃpannau bhavatīti kathanaṃ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3315: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatviti paricodanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3318: tathā copakrame sattāśrayasāmānyoktau ka āśraya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ vākyaśeṣādātmeti niścīyata ityāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3319: sacchabdasyātmānātmasādhāraṇyamupetyoktaṃ tadapi nāsti ātmapadavatsatpadasya vyaktivācitvādvyaktiśca bādhāyogya cidātmaiveti na vācichandogayorūpakramavaiṣamyamityāha-sacchabdeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3321_0: vājivākye tvamarthasya tadarthaparyantasya lakṣyasya pratipādanaṃ chāndogyavākye
GSP33brssgo3u:3321_1: tu tadarthasya tvamarthaparyantasya pratipādanamiti prakārabhede 'pi vākyārthaikyādvidyaikyamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:3327: chandogā vājasaneyinaśca prāṇasaṃvāde śvādisaṃvāde śvādimaryādaṃ prāṇasyānnamāmnānya tasyaivāpo vāsa āmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3328: anantaraṃ ca chandogā āmananti -'tasmādvā etadaśiṣyantaḥ purastāccoṣṭāccādbhiḥ paridadhāti' (chā. 5.2.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3329: vājasaneyinastvāmananti - 'tadvidvāṃsaḥ śrotriyā aśiṣyanta ācāmantyaśitvācāmantyetameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyante' (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:3331: tatra tvācamanamanagnatācintanaṃ ta prāṇasya pratīyate tkimubhayamapi vidhīyata utācamanamevotānagnatācintanameveti vicāryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3337: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nācamanasya vidheyatvamupapadyate kāryākhyānāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3342: sāmānyaviṣayā hi smṛtiḥ puruṣamātrasaṃbaddhaṃ prāyatyārthamācamanaṃ prāpayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3349: tasmātprāptamevāśisiṣatāmaśitavatāṃ cobhayata ācamanamanūdya 'etameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyante' (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:3354: nacaivaṃ satyekasyācamanasyobhayārthatābhyupagatā bhavati prāyatyārthatā paridhānārthā cheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3355: kriyāntaratvābhyupagamāt kriyāntarameva hyācamanaṃ nāma prāyatyārthaṃ puruṣasyābhyupagamyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:3356: tadīyāsu tvapsu vāsaḥsaṃkalpanaṃ nāma kriyāntarameva paridhānārthaṃ prāṇasyābhyupagamyata ityanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3357: apica 'yadidaṃ kiñcāśvasya ā kṛmibhya ā kīṭapataṅgebhyastatte 'nnam (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:3360: sarvaṃ tu prāṇasyānnamitīyamannadṛṣṭiścodyate tatsāhacaryāccāpo vāsa ityatrāpi nāpāmācamanaṃ codyate prasiddhāsvevatvācamanīyāsvapsu paridhānadṛṣciścodyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3365: avaśyavidheye tvanyatarasminvāsaḥkāryākhyānādapāṃ vāsaḥsaṃkalpanamevāpūrvaṃ vidhīyate nācamanaṃ pūrvavaddhi tadityupapāditam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3366: yadapyuktaṃ vispaṣṭā cācamane vidhivibhaktiriti tadapi pūrvavattvenaivācamanasya pratyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3367: ata evācamanasyāvidhitsitatvādetameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyanta ityatraiva kāṇvāḥ paryavasyanti nāmananti tasmādevaṃvidityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3368: tasmānmādhyandinānāmapi pāṭha ācamanānuvādenaivaṃvittvameva prakṛtaprāṇavāsovittvaṃ vidhīyata iti pratipattavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3369: yo 'pyayamabhyupagamaḥ kvacidācamanaṃ vidhīyate kvacidvāsovijñānamiti so 'pi na sādhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3370: āpo vāsa ityādikāyā vākyapravṛtteḥ sarvatraikarūpyāt tasmādvāsovijñānameveha vidhīyate nācamanamiti nyāyyam // 18 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3372: 'me kimannaṃ kiṃ vāsaḥ'iti prāṇena pṛṣṭā vāgādayaḥ ūcuḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3373_0: 'yadidaṃ kiṃ cāśvabhya ā kṛmibhyastatte 'nnamāpo vāsaḥ'iti sarvaprāṇibhirbhujyamānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3373_1: yadidaṃ prasiddhaṃ śvādiparyantamannaṃ tatprāṇasya tavānnamāpa ācchādanamityupāsakena
GSP33brssgo3u:3376: kiṃ tat, bhojanātpūrvamūrdhvaṃ cācāmantīti yattadadbhiḥ prāṇaṃ paridadhatyācchādayantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3378: tat tasmādityuktārthaṃ yataḥ pūrve vidvāṃso 'śanātprāgūrdhvaṃ cācāmanta etamevānāṃ prāṇaṃ tattenācamanenānagnamācchāditaṃ kurvanto manyante cintayanti,
GSP33brssgo3u:3381: saṃdigdhasadupakramasya vākyaśeṣānnirṇayavadācāmantīti padasya vidhitvasaṃdehe ācāmediti vākyaśeṣādvidhitvanirṇaya iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3383_1: siddhānte tasyāvidheyatvānnāṅgatvenopasaṃhāra iti vivekaḥ ubhayavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3384: praśastaṃ hīdamācamanaṃ yasmādanena prāṇamanagnaṃ manyanta iti stutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3387: smṛtyā śudyarthaṃ kāryatvena vihitasakalakarmāṅgatayā prāptācamanānuvādenāpūrvamanagnatādhyānameva vidhīyata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3388: smārtamācamanaṃ śrutyā nānūdyate kiṃ tvanayā śrutyā vihitaṃ samṛtyānūdyata iti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3393: apsu prāṇavāsastvadhyānākhyaḥ saṃkalpaḥ prāṇavidyāṅgatvena vidhīyata ityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3395: śudyarthaṃ viniyuktasyācamanasya prāṇācchādanārthatvaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkyāha-na caivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3397_0: kiñca yathā pūrvavākye prāṇasyānnadhyānamaṅgaṃ vihitaṃ tathātrāpsu vāsodhyānaṃ vidhīyate
GSP33brssgo3u:3398: bhakṣayediti śabdābhāvācchvādyannasya sarvasya manuṣveṇepāsakena bhoktumaśakyatvācca na pūrvavākye kriyāvidhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3400: anagnaṃ manyanta ityatra vāsastvadhyānamapi na vidheyaṃ doṣasāmyaditi śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3401: ubhayorapyanuvādatve vaiphalyādavaśyamekānuvādenaikaṃ vidheyaṃ tacca vidheyaṃ vāsodhyānameva vāsaḥ kāryasyānagnatvasyākhyānādapūrvatvācceti samādhānārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3403: ācāmediti na vidhiḥ kintu viṣṇurūpāṃśu yaṣṭavya itivadanuvāda ityatra liṅgamāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3405: tarhi pāṭhabalānmādhyandine ācamanavidhiḥ kāṇve dhyānavidhiriti kasyacinmataṃ nirākaroti-yo 'pīti //18//
GSP33brssgo3u:3412_0: tatra ca guṇāḥ śrūyante - sa ātmānamupāsīta manamayaṃ prāṇaśarīraṃ bhārūpam ityevamādayaḥ.
GSP33brssgo3u:3412_1: tasyāmeva śāstrāyāṃ bṛhadāraṇyake punaḥ paṭhyate - 'manomayo 'yaṃ puruṣo bhāḥ satyasminnantarhadaye
GSP33brssgo3u:3412_2: yadā vrīhirvā yavo vā sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvamidaṃ praśāsti yadidaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3413: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimiyamekā vidyāgnirahasyabṛhadāraṇyakayorguṇopasaṃhāraścota dve ime vidye guṇānupasaṃhāraśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3417: bhinnāsu hi śākhāsvadhyetṛbhedātpaunaruktasyaparihāramālocya vidyaikatvamadhyavasāyaikatrātiriktā guṇā itaratropasaṃhriyante prāṇasaṃvādādiṣvatyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3418: ekasyāṃ punaḥ śākhāyāmadhyetṛveditṛbhedābhāvādaśakyaparihāre paunaruktye na viprakṛṣṭadeśasthaikā vidyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3420: tadā hyatiriktā eva guṇā itaratretaratra cāmnāyeranna samānā api tūbhayatrāmnāyante manomayatvadayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3422: evaṃ prāpte brūmahe - yathā bhinnāsu śākhāsu vidyaikatvaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraśca bhavatyevamekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3430: ekaṃ hyāmnānaṃ vidyāvidyāvidhānārthamaparaṃ guṇavidhānārthamiti na kiñcinnopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3431: nanvevaṃ sati yadupaṭhimagnirahasye tadeva bṛhadāraṇyake paṭhitavyam sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3432: yattu paṭhitameva manomaya ityādi cenna paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3435: masānaguṇāmnānena hi viprakṛṣṭadeśāṃ śāṇḍilyavidyāṃ pratyabhijñāpya tasyāmīśānatvādyupadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3437: apicāprāptāṃśopadeśenārthavati vākye saṃjāte prāptāṃśaparāmarśasya nityānuvādatayāpyupapadyamānatvānna tadbalena pratyabhijñopodituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3445: iha tvekaśākhāyāṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśasthavākyayorekasya vidhitvamanyasyānuvādatvamityaniścayāddvayorapi vidyāvidhitvamiti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3447: tadvidyāntaramiti na vyāptiḥ prāṇapañcāgnyādividyāsu vyabhicāradityāśaṅkya śākhābhede punaruktirasiddhetyuktamityāha-bhinnāsviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3449: 'dadhnā juhoti'iti vākye guṇavidhistathātrāpyastu na vidyāmeda ityāśaṅkyāha-nacātraikamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3451: uktaguṇoktirna vṛthā katipayaguṇaviśiṣṭopāsyābhedapratyabhijñānārthatvādata upāsyarūpābhedādbhinnaśākhāsviva samānaśākhāyāmapi vidyaikyamiti siddhāntasūtraṃ yojayati-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3453: yatra bahavo guṇāḥ śrutāstatra pradhānavidhiranyatra tadanuvādena guṇavidhiriti niścayādagnirahasye pradhānavidhivaduttaratra guṇavidhiriti bhāvaḥ //19//
GSP33brssgo3u:3460: ityukramya 'tadyattatsatyamasau sa ādityo ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 55.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:3461: iti tasyaiva satyasya brahmaṇo 'dhidaivatamadhyātmaṃ cāyatanaviśeṣamupadiśya vyāhṛtiśarīratvaṃ ca saṃpādya dve upaniṣadāvupadiśyete /
GSP33brssgo3u:3464: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimavibhāgenaivobhe apyupaniṣadāvubhayatrānusaṃgātavye uta vibhāgenaikādhidaivamekādhyātmamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3466: yathā śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ vibhāgenāpyadhītāyāṃ guṇopasaṃhāra ukta evamanyatrāpyevañjātīyake viṣaye bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3477_0: taduktaṃ yatsatyaṃ tat sa yo 'sāvādityaḥ kiṃ maṇḍalaṃ na tatra sthāne puruṣaḥ karaṇātmakaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3477_1: sa evādhyātmamakṣisthānastha ityupadiśya 'tasya bhūriti śiro bhuva iti bāhuḥ svariti
GSP33brssgo3u:3477_2: pādau'iti vyāhṛtirūpaṃ śarīramuktvā dve upaniṣado rahasyadevatānāmanī upadiśyete
GSP33brssgo3u:3478: idaṃ nāmadvayaṃ viṣayastatra nāminaḥ satyākhyasya brahmaṇa ekatvātsthānabhedokteśca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3479: pūrvapakṣe pratisthānaṃ nāmadvayānuṣṭhānaṃ siddhānte yathāśrutyaikaikanāmānuṣṭhānamiti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3483: ādityaraśmīnāṃ cakṣuṣa cakṣuṣaścāditye pratiṣṭhānāditi vyatiṣaktapāṭho mithaḥ saṃśleṣapāṭhastābhyāṃ vidyaikyasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3485: vidyaikye 'pi sthānabhedādupaniṣadorasaṃkaraḥ syādityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena pariharati-yo hīti //20//
GSP33brssgo3u:3495: kathaṃ sthānaviśeṣopanibandha ityucyate - 'ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 5.5.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:3496: iti hyādhidaivakaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛtya tasyopaniṣadahariti śrāvayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3502: nanveka evāyamadhidaivatamadhyātmaṃ ca puruṣa ekasyaiva satyasya brahmaṇa āyatanadvayapratipādanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3505: asti cāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ satyapyācāryasvarūpāpānapāye yadācāryasyāsīnasyanuvartanamuktaṃ na tattiṣṭhato bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3507: grāmāraṇyayostvācāryasvarūpānāpāyāttatsvarūpānubuddhasya ca dharmasya grāmāraṇyakṛtaviśeṣābhāvādubhayatra tulyavadbhāva ityadṛṣṭāntaḥ saḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3510: tathā cākṣistho 'hariti nāmavān satyabrahmatvādādityasthavaditi prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃyojayati-naveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3512: tasyo 'paniṣadaharahamiti ca vākyadvayena tacchabdaparāmṛṣṭayoḥ saṃnihitasthānaviśiṣṭayoḥ puruṣayornāmasaṃbandhapareṇopasaṃhārānumānaṃ bādhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3515: pratidṛṣṭāntasya svarūpasaṃbandhitvādviśiṣṭe dhyeye prakṛte dṛṣṭāntaṃ nāstītyāha-grāmeti //21//
GSP33brssgo3u:3520: api caivañjātīyakānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavastheti liṅgadarśanaṃ bhavati - 'tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yāvamuṣya geṣṇau tau geṣṇau yannāma tannāma' (chā. 1.7.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3525: vidyaikyādevopasaṃhārasiddhāvatideśo vṛthā syāttasmādekavidyāyāmapi sthānabhedenoktaguṇānāṃ vinātideśamanupasaṃhāra iti siddham //22//
GSP33brssgo3u:3531: brahmajyeṣṭhā viryā saṃbhṛtāni brahmāgre jyeṣṭhaṃ divamātatāna ityevaṃ rāṇāyanīyānāṃ khileṣu vīryasaṃbhṛtidyuniveśaprabhṛtayo brahmaṇo vibhūtayaḥ paṭhyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3533: tāsu brahmavidyāsu tā brahmavibhūtaya upasaṃhriyeranna veti vicāraṇāyāṃ brahmasaṃbandhādupasaṃhāraprāptāvevaṃ paṭhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3536: tathāhi śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ hṛdayāyatanatvaṃ brahmaṇa uktam - 'eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye' (chā. 3.14.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3537: tadvadeva daharavidyāyāmapi 'daharaṃ puṇḍarīke veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' (chā. 8.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3538: upakosalavidyāyāṃ tvakṣyāyatanatvam 'ya eṣo 'kṣaṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā. 4.15.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3539: evaṃ tatra tatrat tadādhyātmikamāyatanametāsu vidyāsu pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3540: ādhidaivikyastvetā vibhūtayaḥ saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptiprabhṛtayastāsāṃ kuta etāsu prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3542: 'eṣa u eva bhāmanīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.4)
GSP33brssgo3u:3543: 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite' (chā. 8.1.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:3545: santi cānyā āyatanaviśeṣahīnā apīha brahmavidyāḥ ṣoḍaśakalādyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3548: samānaguṇāmnānena hi pratyupasthāpitāsu viprakṛṣṭadeśāsvapi vidyāsu viprakṛṣṭadeśā guṇā upasaṃhriyeranniti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3549: saṃbhṛtyādayastu śāṇḍilyādivākyagocarāśca manomayatvādayo guṇāḥ parasparavyāvṛttasvarūpatvānna pradeśāntaravartividyāpratyupasthāpanamityucyate vidyābhede 'pi tadupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3550: ekamapi hi brahma vibūtibhedairanekadhopāsyata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3557: brahmaiva jyeṣṭhaṃ kāraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni brahmajyeṣṭhāni,
GSP33brssgo3u:3560: tāni ca vīryāṇi saṃbhṛtāni nirvighnaṃ samṛddhāni,
GSP33brssgo3u:3562: tacca jyeṣṭhaṃ brahmāgne devādyutpatteḥ prāgeva divaṃ svargamātatāna vyāptavatsadā sarvavyāpakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3566: anārabhyādhītabrahmavibhūtīnāṃ brahmasaṃbandhena sarvabrahmavidyāsu pratyabhijñānādupasaṃhāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3568: saṃbhṛtiśca dyuvyāptiśca saṃbhṛtidyuvyāpti tadapi sarvatra nopasaṃhartavyamupaniṣadoriva vyavasthāpakaviśeṣayogāditi sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3569: ādhyātmikāyatanaviśeṣayuktāsu vidyāsvādhidaivikavibhūtīnāṃ pratyabhijñāne hetvabhāvānna prāptirityukte hetuṃ śaṅkate-nanvetāsviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3571: uktahetudvayaṃ na guṇaprāpakamādhidaivikavidyānāṃ śāṇḍilyadaharādīnāmāyatanahīnavidyāyāṃ ca mithoguṇasāṃkaryaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:3573_1: mitho bhedena rūpabhedātsaṃbhṛtyādīnāṃ nopasaṃhāra ityuktanyāyātideśatvādasya na
GSP33brssgo3u:3573_3: tathaikasminnapi brahmaṇi vidyābhedopapatteḥ brahmapratyabhijñā na guṇaprāpiketyāha-parovarīyastvādivaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3580: asti tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca rahasyabrāhmaṇe puruṣavidyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3585: taittirīyakā api kañcitpuruṣayajñaṃ kalpayanavti - 'tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī' (nārā. 80)
GSP33brssgo3u:3587: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ ya itaratroktāḥ puruṣayajñasya dharmāste taittirīyakeṣūpasaṃhartavyāḥ kiṃvā nopasaṃhartavyā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3592: yathaikeṣāṃ śākhināṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣavidyāyāmāmnānaṃ naivamitareṣāṃ taittirīyāṇāmāmnānamasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3594: yadapi savanasaṃpādanaṃ tadapītaravilakṣaṇameva 'yatprātarmadhyandinaṃsāyaṃ ca tāni' (nārā. 80) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3595: yadapi kiñcinmaraṇāvabhṛthatvādisāmyaṃ tadapyalpīyastavādbhūyasā vailakṣaṇyenābhibhūyamānaṃ na pratyabhijñāpanakṣamam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3597: viduṣo yajñasyeti hi nacaite samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyau vidvāneva yoyajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3599: vyadhikaraṇe tvete ṣaṣṭhyau viduṣo yo yajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3601: satyāṃ ca gatau mukhya evārtha āśrayitavyo na bhāktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3602: ātmā yajamāna iti ca yajamānatvaṃ puruṣasya nirbruvanvaiyadhikaraṇyenaivāsya yajñasaṃbandhaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3603: apica tasyaivaṃviduṣaiti siddhavadanuvādaśrutau satyāṃ puruṣasya yajñabhāvamātmādīnāṃ ca yajamānādibhāvaṃ pratipitsamānasya vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3604: apica saṃsanyāsāmātmavidyāṃ purastādupadiśyānantaraṃ tasyaivaṃviduṣa ityādyanukramaṇaṃ phasyantaḥ pūrvaśeṣa evaiṣa āmnāyo na svatantra iti pratīmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3607: āyurabhivṛddhiphalo hyasau 'sa ha --ṣoḍaśaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvati ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.16.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:3611_0: 'puruṣo vāva yajñastasya yāni caturviśati varṣāṇi tatprātaḥ savanamatha yāni catuścatvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi
GSP33brssgo3u:3611_1: tanmādhyandinaṃ savanamatha yānyaṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi tattṛtīyaṃ savanam'iti prasiddhayajñasāmyārthaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3612_0: 'sa yadaśiśiṣati yatpipāsati yanna ramate tā dīkṣā atha yadaśnāti yatpibati yadramate
GSP33brssgo3u:3612_1: tā upasadaḥ atha yaddhasati yajjakṣati yanmaithunaṃ carati tāni stutaśastrāṇi atha
GSP33brssgo3u:3612_2: yattapodānādi sā dakṣiṇā maraṇamevāvabhṛthaḥ vasvādirūpā me prāṇā idaṃ savanatrayaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3618: iha tvasādhāraṇamaraṇāvabhṛthaguṇaviśiṣṭapuruṣayajñarūpaikyapratyabhidhānādvi dyaikyamiti pratyudāharaṇena prāpte siddhāntayati-nopasaṃhartavyā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3619_0: tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī śarīramidhmamuro vedirlomāni
GSP33brssgo3u:3619_1: barhirvedaḥ śikhā hṛdayaṃ yūpaḥ kāma ājyaṃ manyuḥ paśustapo 'gnirdamaḥ śamayitā dakṣiṇā
GSP33brssgo3u:3619_2: vāgghotā prāṇa udgātā cakṣuradhvaryurmano brahmā'iti bahutaradharmavailakṣaṇyānna
GSP33brssgo3u:3623: yanmaraṇaṃ tadavabhṛtho yadramate tadupasada iti tittiriśrutau sārūpyamapi bhātītyata āha-yadapi kiñciditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3625: kiñca chāndogye puruṣayajñayoraikyaṃ śrutamatra tu bheda iti vairūpyāntaramāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3627_1: pratīyate tasyāṃ satyāṃ viśeṣyasyāṅāgānāṃ ca pṛthagvidhivādinastava vākyabhedadoṣaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3628_0: kiñca satyādibhyo nyāsa evāpare ca yaditi saṃnyāsamuktvā sarvaiḥ sarvamidaṃ jagadityevaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3628_1: tamātmānaṃ jñātvā bhūyo na mṛtyumupayāti vidvāniti saṃnyāsasādhyātmavidyāṃ purastātprājāpatyānuvāke
GSP33brssgo3u:3637: astyātharvaṇikānāmupaniṣadārambhe mantrasamāmnāyaḥ - 'sarvaṃ pravidhya hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjya śiro 'bhipravṛjyatridhā vipṛktaḥ' ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3640: kaṭhānāṃ taittirīyāṇāṃ - 'śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ' (tai. 1.1.1) ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3641: vājasaneyināṃ tūpaniṣadārambhe pravargyabrāhmaṇaṃ paṭhyate - 'devā ha vai niṣeduḥ' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3642: kauṣītakināmapyagniṣṭomabrāhmaṇam - 'brahma vā agniṣṭomo brahmaiva tadaharbrahmaṇaiva te brahmopayanti te 'mṛtatvamāpnuvanti ya etadaharupayanti' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3643: kimime sarve pravidhyamādayo mantrāḥ pravargyādīni ca karmāṇi vidyāsūpasaṃhriyerankiṃvā nopasaṃhriyeranniti mīmāṃsāmahe /
GSP33brssgo3u:3644: kiṃ tāvannaḥ pratibhāti upasaṃhāra evaiṣāṃ vidyāsviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3651: nanu naiṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayaṃ kiñcitsāmarthyaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3652: kathaṃ ca pravargyādīni karmāṇyanyārthatvenaiva viniyuktāni santi vidyārthatvenāpi pratipadyemahīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3654: sāmarthyaṃ tāvanmantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayamapi kiñcicchakyaṃ kalpayituṃ hṛdayādisaṃkīrtanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3655: hṛdayādīni hi prayeṇopāsaneṣvāyatanādibhāvenopadiṣṭāni taddvāreṇa ca hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāmupapannamupāsanāṅgatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3658: tathā pravargyādīnāṃ karmaṇāmanyatrāpi viniyuktānāṃ satāmaviruddho vidyāsu viniyogo vājapeya iva bṛhaspatisavasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3663: hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ hi mantrāṇāṃ yer'thā hṛdayavedhādayo bhinnā anabhisaṃbaddhāsta upaniṣaduditābhirvidyābhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3667: hṛdayamātrasaṃkīrtanasya hyevamupayogaḥ kathañcidutprekṣyeta naca hṛdayamātramatra mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3668: hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjyetyevañjātīyako hi na sakalo mantrārthe vidyābhirabhisaṃbadhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3669: ābhicārikaviṣayo hyeṣor'thastasmādābhicārikeṇa karmaṇā sarvaṃ pravidhyetyetasya mantrasyābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3671: evamanyeṣāmapi mantrāṇāṃ keṣācilliṅgena keṣāñcidvacanena keṣāñcitpramāṇāntareṇātyevamarthāntareṣu viniyuktānāṃ rahasyapaṭhitānāmapi satāṃ na saṃnidhimātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3672: durbalo hi saṃnidhiḥ śrutyādibhya ityuktaṃ prathame tantre 'śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ samavāye pāradaurbalyamarthaviprakarṣāt' (jai. sū. 3.3.13) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:3675: vājapeye tu bṛhaspatisavasya spaṣṭaṃ viniyogāntaram - 'vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeta' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3676: api caiko 'yaṃ pravargyaḥ sakṛdutpanno balīyasā pramāṇenānyatra viniyukto na durbalena pramāṇenānyatrāpi viniyogamarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3677: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatve hi pramāṇayoretadevaṃ syānnatu balavadabalavatoḥ pramāṇayoragṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatā saṃbhavati balavadabalavattvaviśeṣādeva /
GSP33brssgo3u:3678: tasmādevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ vā na saṃnidhipāṭhamātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvamāśaṅkitavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3682: he devate, madripoḥ sarvamaṅgaṃ pravidhya vidāraya viśeṣataśca hṛdayaṃ bhindhi dhamanīḥ śirāḥ pravṛñjaya troṭaya śiraścābhito nāśaya,
GSP33brssgo3u:3683: evaṃ tridhā vipṛkto viśliṣṭo bhavatu me śatrurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3686: uccaiḥ śravāḥ śveto 'śvo yasyendrasya sa tvaṃ haritamaṇivannīlo 'sītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3688_0: agniṣṭomo brahmaiva sa yasminnahani kriyate tadapi brahma tasmādya etadahaḥ sādhyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3688_1: karmopayantyanutiṣṭhinti te brahmaṇaiva sādhanena brahmopayanti te ca krameṇāmṛtatvamāpnuvantīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3691: nanu teṣāṃ śeṣatve mānābhāvānnopasaṃhāra iti śaṅkate-nanveṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3695: aphalamantrādīnāṃ phalavaccheṣatvabodhanaṃ saṃnidherarthavattvaṃ tatsaṃbhave satyakasmādarthaśūnyatvenāsau saṃnidhirāśrayituṃ nahi yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3696: nañpāṭhetvakasmāddhetuṃ vināsāvartho nāśrayituṃ nahi yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3698: purastādupasadāṃ pravargyeṇa pracarantīti vākyena pravargyasya kratuśeṣatvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3699: agniṣṭomādeśca tattadvākyena svargādyarthatvamato na vidyārthatvamityāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3701: upāstiṣu mantraprayogaḥ kvāpi na dṛṣṭa ityata āha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3702: putrasya dīrghāyuṣyārthaṃ chāndogye trailokyasya keśātvenopāstiruktā tatra piturayaṃ prārthanāmantraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3703: tatrāmuneti putrasya trirṇāma gṛhṇāti amunā putreṇa saha bhūritīmaṃ lokamamuṃ ca prapadye na me putraviyogaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3704: tattadvākyenānyatra viniyuktānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃnidhinā vidyāsu viniyogo na virudhyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-vājapeya iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3706_2: vidhīyata iti na viniyuktasya viniyoga iti bhaṭṭagurutantradvayasiddhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3707: yathāpi yathā nityāgnihotrasyāśvamedhaprakaraṇe vāgyatasyaitāṃ rātrimagnihotraṃ juhotīti nāmnā pratyabhijñā,
GSP33brssgo3u:3708_1: padena pratyabhijñānaṃ vākyena vidhānaṃ tathātrāpi bṛhaspatisavapadena pratyabhijñānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3709: naca sādhyabhāvārthavidhāyakākhyātaparatantraṃ nāmapadaṃ na siddhakarmapratyabhijñākṣamamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3711: nacaivaṃ sati kuṇḍapāyisatre 'pyaṅgatvena nityāgnihotrasyaiva vidhiḥ syāditi vācyaṃ, iṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3714: tasmādekasyaiva bṛhaspatināmakasya dhātvarthasya brahmavarcase viniyuktasyāpi vājapeyāṅgatayā viniyoga iti bhagavatpādatātparyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3715: astica viniyuktasya viniyoge sarvasaṃmatamudāharaṇaṃ khādiratvādikaṃ tasya kratau viniyuktasya vīryādiphale 'pi viniyogāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3716: tathā mantrakarmaṇāmanyatra viniyuktānāṃ vidyāśeṣatvamiti prāpte siddhāntayati-naiṣāmityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3717: vidyāsu hṛdayādisaṃbandhe 'pi vedhādyarthānāmasaṃbandhātkṛtsnamantrārthānāmabhicārādisaṃbandhaliṅgena saṃnidherbalīyasābhicārādāveva mantrāṇāṃ viniyoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3718_1: juhoti karmaṇaḥ purastātsavane savane juhoti'iti vākyādvājapeye karmaviśeṣe saṃbandho
GSP33brssgo3u:3721: nanu liṅgādibharanyatra viniyuktānāmapi saṃnidhinā vidyāsvapi viniyogo 'stvavirodhādityuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3727_0: ayamāśayaḥ-ekatra viniyuktasya nirākāṅkṣatvādanyatra viniyogo viruddha eva parantu
GSP33brssgo3u:3727_2: viniyuktaviniyogaḥ svīkriyate 'yathā khādiro yūpo bhavati''khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya
GSP33brssgo3u:3727_3: yūpaṃ kuryāt'iti vākyābhyāṃ kratau viniyuktasya khādiratvasya vīryaphale viniyogaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3728: yatra tu pramāṇayoratulyatvaṃ tatra na svīkriyate prabalapramāṇena durbalaviniyogabādhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3729_0: yathā 'kadācana starīrasi'ityasyā ṛca aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata iti tṛtīyāvibhaktiśrutyānyanirapekṣatayā
GSP33brssgo3u:3730: liṅgaṃ hi na sākṣāccheṣatvaṃ bodhayati kintvindraprakāśanamātraṃ karoti,
GSP33brssgo3u:3731: tena ca liṅgenānena mantreṇa indra upasthāpayitavya iti śrutiḥ kalpanīyā,
GSP33brssgo3u:3732: tayā śeṣatvabodha iti śrutivyavadhānena śeṣatvabodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ jhaṭiti svārthabodhakaśrutyā bādhyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3733: tathā liṅgena vākyaṃ bādhyaṃ yathā 'syo 'naṃ te sadanaṃ karomi ghṛtasya dhārayā kalpayāmi',
GSP33brssgo3u:3734_0: 'tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamānaḥ'iti mantrābhāgayoḥ pratyekaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3734_1: sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca tatprakāśanasāmarthyaliṅgena śrutidvārā viniyoge sati
GSP33brssgo3u:3735_1: ca liṅgaṃ kalpayitvā śrutikalpanayobhayatra kṛtsnamantraviniyogabodhane dvābhyāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3737: asamarthasya viniyogāyogāt ata eva gaṅgāpadasya tīrabodhaviniyoge lakṣaṇārūpaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3738: tathā vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyaṃ yathā sāhnaprakaraṇāmnātadvādaśopasadāṃ dvādaśāhīnasyeti vākyenāhīnāṅgatva bodhakena prakaraṇaprāptasāhnāṅgatvabādhādutkarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3741_2: saṃnidheḥ prakaraṇādikalpakatvena kḷptaprakaraṇāddurbalatvāt tathā saṃnidhinā samākhyā bādhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3742_0: tathāhi-pauroḍāśikasamākhyāke kāṇḍe āgneyapuroḍāśādikarmaṇāṃ krameṇa mantrā āmnātāstatra
GSP33brssgo3u:3742_2: samākhyābalenāsya mantrasya puroḍāśapātraśundhanaśeṣatvaṃ prāptaṃ saṃnidhinā bādhitvā
GSP33brssgo3u:3744: evaṃ virodhe sati śrutirbādhikaiva samākhyā bādhyaiva,
GSP33brssgo3u:3745: madhyasthānāṃ tu caturṇāṃ pūrvabādhyatvaṃ parabādhakatvaṃ ceti śrutiliṅgasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3746: tasmālliṅgādinānyatra viniyuktānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ durbalasaṃnidhinā na vidyāsu viniyoga iti siddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:3748: karmaṇāṃ vidyopakāratve tābhiḥ sahaikaphalatve ca mānaṃ kiñcinnāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3750: nanu tarhi vedhādivākyānāmupaniṣadbhiḥ saha pāṭhasya kā gatistāmāha-araṇyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3756: hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt kuśāc chandaḥstutyupagānavat tad uktam / BBs_3,3.26 /
GSP33brssgo3u:3757: asti tāṇḍānāṃ śrutiḥ - 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rāhormukhātpramucya dhūtvā śarīramakṛtaṃ kṛtātmā brahmalokamabhisaṃbhavāmi' (chā. 8.13.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3758: tathātharṇikānāma 'tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3759: tathā śāṭyāyaninaḥ paṭhanti 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti sihṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3760: tathaiva kauṣītakinaḥ 'tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute tasya priyā jñātayaḥ sukṛtamupantyapriyā duṣkṛtam' (kau. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3761_0: tadiha kvacitsukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ śrūyate kvacittayoreva vibhāgena priyairapriyaiścopāyanaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3761_1: kvacittūbhayamapi hānamupāyanaṃ ca tadyatrobhayaṃ śrūyate tatra tāvanna kiñcidvaktavyamasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3762: yatrāpyupāyanameva śrūyate na hānaṃ tatrāpyarthādeva hānaṃ saṃnipatati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3764: yatra tu hānameva śrūyate nopāyanaṃ tatropāyanaṃ sanipatedvā na veti vicikitsāyāmaśravaṇādasaṃnipātaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3766: apicātmakartṛkaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ parakartṛkaṃ tūpāyanaṃ tayorasatyāvaśyakabhāve kathaṃ hānenopāyamākṣipyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:3777: itthaṃ mahābhāgā vidyā yatsāmarthyādasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte saṃsārakāraṇabhūte vidhūyate te cāsya suhṛdviṣatsu niviśete itai /
GSP33brssgo3u:3778: stutyarthe cāsminsaṃkīrtane hānānantarabhāvitvenopāyasya kvacicchrutatvādanyatrāpi hānaśrutāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ manyate stutiprakarṣalābhāya /
GSP33brssgo3u:3781: kathaṃ hīhaikaviṃśatādityasyābhidhīyatānapekṣyamāṇer'thavādāntare dvādaśa māsāḥpañcartavastraya ime lokā asāvāditya ekaviṃśaḥ ityetasmin /
GSP33brssgo3u:3782: tathā triṣṭubhau bhavataḥ sendriyatvāya ityevamādiṣu indriyaṃ vai triṣṭup ityevamādyarthavādāntarāpekṣā dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3783: vidyāstutyarthatvāccāsyopāyanavādasya kathamanyadīye sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyairupeyete iti nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3784: upāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāditi tu śabdaśabdaṃ samuccārayanstutyarthameva hānāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3788_0: tadyathā bhāllavinām - 'kuśā vānaspatyāḥ stha tā mā pāta' ityetasminnigame kuśānāmaviśeṣeṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:3788_1: vanaspatiyonitvena śravaṇe śāṭyāyanināmaudumbarāḥ kuśā iti viśeṣavacanādaudumbaryaḥ kuśā āśrīyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3789: yathāca kvaciddevāsuracchandasāmaviśeṣeṇa paurvāparyaprasaṅge 'devacchandāṃsi pūrvāṇi' iti paiṅgyāmnānātpratīyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3790: yathāca ṣoḍaśustotre keṣāñcitkālāviśeṣaprāptau 'samayādhyuṣite sūrye' ityārcaśruteḥ kālaviśeṣapratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3792: yathaiteṣu kuśādiṣu śrutyantaragataviśeṣairanvaya evaṃ hānāvapyupāyanānvaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3793: śrutyantarakṛtaṃ hi viśeṣaṃ śrutyantare 'nabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatraiva vikalpaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3795: taduktaṃ dvādaśalakṣaṇāyām - 'api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3799: na hānaṃ vidhūnanamabhidhīyate 'dhañ kampane' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3800: dodhūyante dhvajāgrāṇīti ca vāyunā cālyamāneṣu dhvajāgreṣu prayogadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3802: cālanaṃ tu suṣkṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ kañcitkālaṃ phalapratibandhanādityevaṃ prāpayya prativaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3806: yadyapīdaṃ parakīyayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ parairupāyanaṃ nāñjasaṃ saṃbhāvyate tathāpi tatsarntanāttāvattadānuguṇyena hānameva vidhūnanaṃ nāmeti nirṇetuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3807: kvacidapi cedaṃ vidhūnanasaṃnidhāvupāyanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ kuśāchandastutyupagānavadvidhanūnaśrutyā sarvatrāpekṣāmāṇaṃ sārvatrikaṃ nirṇayakāraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3810: aśvaśca romāṇi vidhūnvānastyajanrajaḥ sahaiva tena romāṇyapi jīrṇāni śātayati 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam' (chā. 8.13.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3815_0: yathāśvo rajoyuktāni jīrṇaromāṇi tyaktvā nirmalo bhavati tathāhamapi pāpaṃ vidhūya
GSP33brssgo3u:3815_1: kṛtātmā nirmalīkṛtacittaḥ san yathā vā rāhugrastaścandro rāhumukhātpramucya spaṣṭo
GSP33brssgo3u:3815_2: bhavati tathā śarīraṃ dhūtvā tyaktvā dehābhimānānmuktaḥ sannakṛtaṃ kūṭasthaṃ brahmātmakaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3816: yathā nadyaḥ samudraṃ prāpya nāmarūpe tyajanti tathā vidvānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3822: yatra tu tyāga eva śrutaḥ tatra hānopāyanayoḥ sahabhāvasyāvaśyakatvānāvaśyakatvābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha-yatra tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3823: atra pūrvapakṣe stutiprakarṣāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3824_0: yadyapi tāṇḍyātharvaṇaśrutyornirguṇavidyārthayoḥ karmahānameva śrutaṃ nopāyanaṃ tathāpi
GSP33brssgo3u:3827: aśvaromadṛṣṭāntena vidhūtayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ paratrāvasthānasāpekṣatvātparairūpādānaṃ vācyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3828: vidyābhede guṇānupasaṃhāra iti vyavasthānuṣṭhānaviṣayā na stutiviṣayetyāha-yaducyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3832: nanvarthavādasya vidhinā saṃbandhaḥ prasiddho nārthavādāntareṇetyata āha-prasiddhā ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3835: yajñasya puruṣarūpakalpanāyāṃ sendriyatvāya triṣṭubhau bhavata ityuktaṃ bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe,
GSP33brssgo3u:3838: vidvanniṣṭhayoreva tayoḥ phalaṃ pare prāpnuvanti vidyāsāmarthyādityupayantipadenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3843: naca yathā putrakṛtaśrāddhasya pitṛṣu phalaṃ tathātreti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3844: yasya phalamuddiśya yatkarma vihitaṃ tasya tatphalamiti nyāyena pitṛṇāṃ tṛptyuddeśena kṛtakarmaṇo vyadhikaraṇaphalatve 'pi viduṣaḥ karmakāle 'nuddiṣṭavyadhikaraṇaphalāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3845: kiñca viduṣo dehapāte karmaṇo 'sattvādyāvajjīvaṃ vidvatsevakasya taddveṣiṇo vā phalaṃ syādityata āha-nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3846: vidvatsevādveṣābhyāṃ vidvanniṣṭhapuṇyapāpatulye puṇyapāpe sevakadveṣiṇorjāyete jātayoḥ phalataḥ svīkāra upāyanamiti parihārasya sulabhatvādanāgraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3848: upāyanavivakṣāyāmupāyanasyaivopasaṃhāraṃ sūtrakāro brūyādataḥ śabdasya taṃ brūvanstutiṃ sūcayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3849: vidyāvicārātmake pāde stutivicārasya kā saṃgatirityata āha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3850: śākhāntarastho viśeṣaḥ śākhāntare 'pi grāhya ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-kuśeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3853: yūyaṃ vānaspatyāḥ vanasthamahāvṛkṣo vanaspatiḥ tatprabhavāḥ stha tā itthaṃbhūtā yūyaṃ mā pāta māṃ rakṣateti yajamānaprārthanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3854: atra tā iti strīliṅganirdeśādaudumbarya iti bhāṣyācca śalākāsu kuśaśabdasya strītvaṃ mantavyaṃ darbhaviṣayasya na strītvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3857: navākṣarāṇi chandāṃsi āsurāṇyanyāni daivāni teṣāṃ kvacchindobhiḥ stuvata ityatrāviśeṣaprāptau paiṅgivākyādviśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3859: ātirātre ṣoḍaśino grahasyāṅgabhūtaṃ stotraṃ kadeti chandogādīnāmākāṅkṣāyāmudayasamayāviṣṭe sūrye ṣoḍaśinaḥ stotramityārcaśruteḥ kālaviśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3862: 'ṛtvija upagāyanti'ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ 'nādhvaryurūpagāyati'iti śrutyantarādadhvaryubhinnā ṛtvija upagāyantīti viśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3865: sāmānyaviśeṣayorekavākyatārūpāyāṃ gatau satyāṃ vākyabhedaṃ kṛtvā nādhvaryuriti niṣedhādaviśeṣaśruteścādhvaryurupagāyati nopagāyati cetyevaṃ sarvatra vikalpo na yuktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3872: evaṃ vrīhivākyepi catvāro doṣā ityevaṃ duṣṭavikalpaparihārāya bhinnaśākhaśrutyorapyekavākyatā jaiminisaṃmatetyāha-taduktamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3874: iti śrutaṃ 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt'iti cānyatra śrutaṃ tatra yadi nadīkṣitavākyaṃ homapratiṣedhakaṃ syāttadā kratvarthatvānniṣedho 'nuṣṭheyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3875: yāvajjīvavidhinā homo vānuṣṭheya iti vikalpaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:3877: api tu yāvajjīvavākyaṃ prati nadīkṣitavākyasya śeṣatvānnakāra itaraparyudāsārthakaḥ syāddīkṣitānyalakṣakaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:3881: miśraistu paryudāsādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtraṃ 'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāyyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt'iti sthitamatrārthataḥ paṭhitamityuktaṃ taccintyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3882: sūtrārthastu yajñamātre yeyajāmahe iti prayoktavyamiti śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3884: tatra nakārasya niṣedhakatve 'pyatirātre ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇayorivānuyājeṣu yajñatvāviśeṣātprayoktavyaṃ niṣedhānna prayoktavyamiti vikalpaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:3887: tathā cānuyājabhinneṣu yāgeṣu yeyajāmaha iti prayoktavyamityekavākyateti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3892: vidhūnanasya hi phaladvayamaśvaromādiṣu dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvasvabhāvāt cyutiranyatra saṃkrāntiśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3894: tatra vidhūnanaśabdasya kampanaṃ mukhyārtha iti tāvatsarvasaṃmatam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3896: atastayoryaḥ svabhāvaḥ phaladātṛtvaśaktistataścālanaṃ vidyayā pratibandhāccyutiḥ sā lakṣaṇīyā na hāniramūrtayoranyatra saṃkrāntyayogādanyasāpekṣatvācceti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3899: naca yatra dhunoterūpāyanaśabdasāṃnidhyaṃ tatra hānirlakṣyate na kevaladhunoterhāniścānyatra viduṣaḥ sevakādau tulyakarmasaṃkrāntiriti nāsaṃbhava iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3900: kevaladhunoterapi mukhyārthāsaṃbhavenānyatra lakṣyatayā buddhisthahānilakṣaṇāyā eva yuktatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3901: upāyanasyāmukhyatvānna kvāpi hānilakṣaṇābījatvamiti śaṅkitvā puṇyapāpayoḥ phalataḥ svīkārātmakamupāyanaṃ hāniṃ vinānupapannaṃ sallakṣaṇānirṇāyakamiti pariharati-yadyapītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3902: yathānyatraśrutamaudumbaratvādikaṃ kuśādinirṇāyakaṃ tathedamupāyanaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatve niścāyakamityāha-kvacidapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3905: tathāpi hānaṃ kathaṃ lakṣyata ityāśaṅkya mukhyasaṃbandhādityāha-aśvaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3906: anupapattisaṃbandhau lakṣaṇābījarūpāmuktvā lakṣakaṃ padaṃ nirdiśati-aśva iveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3907: vidhūyeti padaṃ dṛṣṭānte hānaparyantaṃ saddārṣṭāntike 'pi hānalakṣakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3908: yadvā hānavācakamevāstu naca dhūñ kampana iti dhātupāṭhavirodhastasyopalakṣaṇārthatvādityāha-aneketi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3909: śākhāntarasthamupāyanaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatvaniścāyakamityatra jaiminisūtraṃ taduktamiti gṛhītapūrvaṃ vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3910: evaṃ vidhṛnanasya hānitvisiddheḥ kevalahānāvupāyanopasaṃhāra iti siddham //26//
GSP33brssgo3u:3915: sāṃparāye tartavyābhāvāt tathā hy anye / BBs_3,3.27 /
GSP33brssgo3u:3916_0: devayānena pathā paryaṅ kasthaṃ brahmābhiprastitasya vyadhvani sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorvibhāgaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3916_1: kauṣītakinaḥ paryaṅ kavidyāyāmamananti 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ pantānamāsādyāgnilokamāgacchati' (kau. 1.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:3917: ityupakramya 'sa āgacchati virajāṃ nadīṃ tāṃ manasaivātyeti tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute' (kau. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3918: tatkiṃ yathāśrutaṃ vyadhvanyeva viyogavacanaṃ pratipattavyamāhosvidādāveva dehādapasarpaṇa iti vicāraṇāyāṃ śrutiprāmāṇyādyathāśruti pratipattiprasaktau paṭhati - sāṃparāya itai /
GSP33brssgo3u:3919: sāṃparāye gamana eva dehādapasarpaṇa idaṃ vidyāsāmarthyātsukṛtaduṣkṛtahānaṃ bhavatīti pratijānīte /
GSP33brssgo3u:3921: nahi viduṣaḥ saṃparetasya vidyayā brahma saṃprepsato 'ntarāle sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāṃ kiñcitprāptavyamasti yadarthaṃ katicitkṣaṇānakṣīṇe te kalpeyātām /
GSP33brssgo3u:3922: vidyāviruddhaphalatvāttu vidyāsāmarthyena tayoḥ kṣayaḥ sa ca yadaiva vidyā phalābhimukhī tadaiva bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3924: tathā hyanye 'pi śikhinastāṇḍinaḥ śāṭyāyaninaśca prāgavasthāyāmeva sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānamāmananti 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam' (chā. 8.13.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3925: iti, 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti ca // 27 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3928: pūrvoktaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatvamupajīvya hānasya nadītaraṇānantaryaśruteraśvaiva romāṇi ityādau dehatyāgātprākkālatvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-tatkimiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3930: ityatra taditisarvanāmaśrutyāstenetyarthatayā saṃnihitanadītaraṇasya karmahānihetutvokterardhapathe karmakṣaya iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3934: saṃparetasya mṛtasya kañcitkālaṃ karmasattve phalābhāvāddevayānamārgapraveśāyogāccādāveva kṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3943_0: yadi ca dehādapasṛptasya devayānena pathā prasthitasyārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣayo
GSP33brssgo3u:3947: kiñca mṛtasya chandato yathākāmaṃ vidyānuṣṭhānānupapatterubhyorvidyākarmakṣayayoḥ śruto hetuphalabhāvo virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3948: kiñca sati puṣkalahetau na kāryavilamba iti nyāyopetatāṇḍyādiśrutivirodhastava syādasmatpakṣe tvavirodha ityāha-chandata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3954: gater arthavattvam ubhayathānyathā hi virodhaḥ / BBs_3,3.29 /
GSP33brssgo3u:3956: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ hānāvaviśeṣeṇaiva devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃnipateduta vibhāgena kvacitsaṃnipatet kvacinneti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3958: gaterdevayānasya pathor'thavattvamubhayathā vibhāgena bhavitumarhati kvacidarthavatī gatiḥ kvacinneti nāviśeṣeṇa /
GSP33brssgo3u:3963: gantavyaṃ ca paramaṃ sāmyaṃ na deśāntaraprāptyāyattamityānarthakyamevātra gatermanyāmahe // 29 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3964: gaterarthavattvaṅkvacitsaguṇavidyāyāṃ mārgaḥ śrūyate nirguṇavidyāyāṃ na śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3965: tatra hānasaṃnidhau mārgasya śrutatvādanapekṣitatvācca saṃśaye dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-yathā tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3979: yatra hi paryaṅ kārohaṇaṃ paryaṅ kastena brahmaṇā saṃvadanaṃ viśiṣṭagandhādi prāptiścetyevamādi bahu deśāntaraprāptyāyattaṃ phalaṃ śrūyate tatrārthavatī gatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3982: lokavaccaiṣa vibhāgo draṣṭavyo yathā loke grāmaprāptau deśāntaraprāpaṇaḥ panthā apekṣyate nārogyaprāptāvevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3984: nanu tarhi saguṇavidyāyāmapi mārgo vyartha ityata āha-upapanna iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3985: sā gatirlakṣaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyārthasya sa tallakṣaṇārthaḥ //30//
GSP33brssgo3u:3991: saguṇāsu vidyāsu gatirarthavatī na nirguṇāyāṃ paramātmavidyāyāmityukhtam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3992: saguṇāsvapi vidyāsu kāsucidgatiḥ śrūyate yathā paryaṅ kavidyāyāmupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ daharavidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3993: nānyāsu yathā madhuvidyāyāṃ śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ ṣoḍaṣakalavidyāyāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3994: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ yāsvevaiṣā gatiḥ śrūyate tāsveva niyamyetotāniyamena sarvābhirevañjātīyakābhirvidyābhirabhisaṃbadhyateti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3998: yadyanyatra śrūyamāṇāpi gatirvidyāntaraṃ gacchecchrutyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ hīyeta sarvasya sarvārthatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3999: apicārcirādikaikaiva gatirupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tulyavatpaṭhyate tatsarvārthatve 'narthakaṃ punarvacanaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4000: tasmānniyama ityevaṃ prāpte paṭhati - aniyama iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4005: iti pañcāgnividyāvatāṃ devayānaṃ panthānamavatārayantī 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' (chā. 5.10.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4010: nahi kevalābhyāṃ śraddātapobhyāmantareṇa vidyābalameṣā gatirlabhyate 'vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4011: na tatra dakṣiṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' iti śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4013: vājasaneyinastu pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'dhīyate - 'ya evametadvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' (bṛ. 6.2.15) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4014: tatra śraddhalavo ye satyaṃ brahmopāsata iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4017: 'atha ya etau panthānau na viduste pataṅgā yadidaṃ dandaśūkam' (bṛ. 6.2.16)
GSP33brssgo3u:4020: samṛtirapi - 'śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hyete jagataḥ śāśvate mate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4022: yatpunardevayānasya patho dvirāmnānamupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tadubhayatrāpyanucintanārtham /
GSP33brssgo3u:4028: atrāpyarcirādimārga eva viṣayastatra vidyāviśeṣaprakaraṇādaviśeṣaśruteśca saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4029: saguṇanirguṇavidyāsu mārgasya bhāvābhāvavyavasthāvatsaguṇāsvapi vyavastheti dṛṣṭāntena prāptau siddhānte vyavasthāpavādādgatiniyamo 'niyama ubhayatra phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4034: aviśeṣaśrutyādinā prakaraṇabādho na doṣa ityāha-naiṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4035: tattatra adhikṛtānāṃ madhye ya itthaṃ pañcāgnīnvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate śraddhātapaupalakṣitaṃ brahma dhyāyanti te 'rciṣamabhisaṃbhavantītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4037: aviduṣāṃ gatiniṣedhācchraddhātapaḥśabdābhyāṃ tatsādhyabrahmavidyālakṣaṇeti pariharati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4046: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ'ityaviśeṣeṇopasakānāmarcirādigatimuktvopasaṃhārasmṛteśca teṣāṃ tatprāptirityāha-smṛtiriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4051: tatraikayā śuklayā punarāvṛttivarjaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gacchati anyayā svarge gatvā punarāyātītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4056: yeṣāṃ na śruto mārgaste mārgadhyānaṃ vināpi vidyāsāmarthyānmārgaṃ labhanta iti jñāpanārthā punaruktirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4063: viduṣo vartamānadehapātānantaraṃ dehāntaramutpadyate na veti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4064: nanu vidyāyāḥ sādhanabhūtāyāḥ saṃpattau kaivalyanirvṛttiḥ syānna veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4066: nahi pākasādanasaṃpattāvodano bhavenna veti cintā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4069: tathāhyapāntaratamā nāma vedācāryaḥ purāṇarṣirviṣṇuniyogātkalidvāparayoḥ saṃdhau kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ saṃbabhūveti smaranti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4070: vasiṣṭhaśca brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putraḥ sannimiśāpādapagatapūrvadehaḥ punarbrahmādeśānmitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ saṃbabhūveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4071: bhṛgvādināmapi brahmaṇa eva mānasaputrāṇāṃ vāruṇe yajñe punarutpattiḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4072: sanatkumāro 'pi brahmaṇa eva mānasaḥ putraḥ svayaṃ rudrāya varapradānātskandatvena prādurbabhūva /
GSP33brssgo3u:4073: evameva dakṣanāradaprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūyasī dehāntarotpattiḥ kathyate tena tena nimittena smṛtau /
GSP33brssgo3u:4075: te ca kecitpatite pūrvadehe dehāntaramādadatte kecittu sthita eva tasminyogaiśvaryavaśādanekadehādānanyāyena /
GSP33brssgo3u:4077: tadeteṣāṃ dehāntarotpattidarśanātprāptaṃ brahmavidyāyāḥ pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamahetutvaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4081_0: yathāsau bhagavānsavitā sahsrayugaparyantaṃ jagato 'dhikāraṃ caritvā tadavasāna udayāstamayavarjitaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4081_1: kaivalyamanubhavati 'atha tata ūrdhvaṃ udetya naivodetā nāstametaikala eva madhye
GSP33brssgo3u:4083: 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā. 6.14.2) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4084: evamapāntaramaprabhṛtayo 'pīśvarāḥ parameśvareṇa teṣu teṣvadhikāreṣu niyuktāḥ santaḥ satyapi samyagdarśane kaivalyahetāvakṣīṇakarmāṇo yāvadadhaikāramavatiṣṭhante,
GSP33brssgo3u:4086_0: sakṛtpravṛttameva hi te phaladānāya karmāśayamativāhayantaḥ svātantryeṇaiva gṛhādiva
GSP33brssgo3u:4087: nacaite jātismarā ityucyante 'ta evaite' iti smṛtiprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4088: yathāhi sulabhā nāma brahmavādinī janakena vivaditukāmākhyudasya svaṃ dehaṃ jānakaṃ dehamāviśya vyudya tena paścātsvameva dehamāviveśeti smaryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4089_0: yadi hyapayukte sakṛtpravṛtte karmaṇi karmāntaraṃ dehāntarārambhakāraṇamāvirbhavettato
GSP33brssgo3u:4089_1: 'nyadapyadagdhabījaṃ karmāntaraṃ tadvadeva prasajyeteti brahmavidyāyāḥ pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamahetutvaṃ vāśaṅkyeta,
GSP33brssgo3u:4093: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (muṇḍa. 2.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4099: jñānadagdhaistathā kleśairnātmā saṃpadyate punaḥ' iti caivamādyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4107: tathāca śrutiraviśeṣeṇaiva sarveṣāṃ jñānānmokṣaṃ darśayati 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇām' (bṛ. 1.4.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4109: te paścādaiśvaryakṣayadarśanena nirviṇṇāḥ paramātmajñāne pariniṣṭhāḥ kaivalyaṃ prāpurityupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4111: parasyānte kṛtātmānaḥ praviśanti paraṃ padam' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4113: karmaphale hi svargādāvanubhavānārūḍhe syādāśaṅkā bhavedvā na veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4117: nahi 'tattvamasi' ityasya vākyasyārthastattvaṃ mṛto bhaviṣyasītyevaṃ pariṇetuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4119: iti ca samyagdarśanakālameva tatphalaṃ sarvātmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4122: FN: ūrdhvo vilakṣaṇaḥ brahmarūpaḥ san udgamya /
GSP33brssgo3u:4133: pūrvapakṣe jñānānmuktiśrutīnāṃ jñānastutimātratvena jñānasya muktiphalatvābhāve sati brahmalokaphalatvāviśeṣādarcirādimārgopasaṃhāraḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4137: vasiṣṭha urvaśīputre jāta ityevamartho bahvṛcārthavāda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4145: tataḥ paścādūrdhvo vilakṣaṇaḥ kevalaḥ brahmasvarūpaḥ san udetyodgamya dehaṃ tyaktveti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:4148: nanu jñānināmapi janmāntaraṃ cetkathaṃ muktirityata āha-sakṛtpravṛttamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4149: yadi jñānināṃ prārabdhātiriktakarmādhīnāṃ janmāntaraṃ syāttadā jñānānmuktyabhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4151: kintu bahujanmaphalāya sakṛdudbhūtaṃ prārabdhaṃ te kṣapayanti,
GSP33brssgo3u:4152: janmagrahaṇe 'pi jñānayogabalānna śocanti prārabdhasamāptau mucyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4160: ādhikārikāstu pūrvanāmānaḥ svatantrā nirabhimānā iti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4161: tena janakena saha vyudya vivādaṃ kṛtvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4163: nimittābhāve naimittikābhāva iti nyāyānugṛhītānāṃ jñānānmuktiśrutīnāṃ na stutimātratvamitimamarthamupapādayati-yadi hyupayukta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4167: viduṣo dehapātāvadhiśruteranubhavācca jñānasyāvarakājñānāṃśanivartakasya prārabdhavikṣepasthityanukūlājñānāṃśanivartanasāmarthyābhāvasiddherbhogenaiva prārabdhakṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4179: vājasaneyake śrūyate - 'etadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantyasthūlamanaṇvahrasvamadīrghamalohitamasneham' (bṛ. 3.8.8) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4184_0: tāsāṃ viśeṣapratiṣedhabuddhīnāṃ kiṃ sarvāsāṃ sarvatra prāptiruta vyavastheti saṃśaye
GSP33brssgo3u:4184_2: sarvatrāvaroddhavyāḥ sāmānyatadbhāvābhyām - samāno hi sarvatra viśeṣanirākaraṇarūpo
GSP33brssgo3u:4185: tadeva ca sarvatra pratipādyaṃ brahmābhinnaṃ pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4186: tatra kimityanyatra kṛtā buddhayo 'nyatra na syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4189: tatra vidhirūpāṇi viśeṣaṇāni cintitānīha pratiṣedharūpāṇīti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4192: yathā jāmadagnye 'hīne puroḍāśinīṣūpasatsu coditāsu puroḍāśapradānamantrāṇām agnerverhetraṃ veradhvaram ityevamādīnāmudgātṛvedotpannānāmapyadhvaryubhirabhisaṃbandho bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4195: taduktaṃ prathame kāṇḍe - 'guṇamukhyavyatikrame tadarthatvānmukhyena vedasaṃyogaḥ' (jai. sū. 3.3.8) ityatra // 33 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4202: yadi na lakṣyante tadā sarvadvaitaniṣedhāsiddhernirviśeṣapramityabhāvadoṣa iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4203: akṣare dharmiṇi dvaitaniṣedhadhiyo 'kṣaradhiyastaddhetavaḥ śabdā iti yāvat,
GSP33brssgo3u:4205: śeṣibrahmaṇāḥ sarvaśākhāsu bhāvāttatpramiteḥ samānatvāccheṣāṇāmusaṃhāraḥ iti cettarhi nyāyasāmyātpunaruktitāvadavasthyamityata āha-prapañcārtha iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4209: ahīnaścatūrātraḥ kratustasminpuroḍāśinya upasado bhavantīti puroḍāśasādhyā iṣṭayastaittirīyake vihitāḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4211: verdevagaṇasya hotraṃ adhvaraṃ ca karmāgnestvatta evetyagnyāmantraṇamantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4214: viniyogavidhanādhvaryuṇā prayoga iti guṇamukhyayorvyatikrame virodha sati mukhyena balīyasā mantrātmakavedasyādhvaryuṇā saṃprayoga utpatterviniyogārthatvāditi jaiminisūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4215_1: svaraprayogaḥ 'ya evaṃ vidvānvāravantīyaṃ gāyati yajñāyajñīyaṃ gāyati vāmadevyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4215_2: gāyati'ityādhāne teṣāṃ viniyogavidhinā yājuṣeṇa yājuṣasyopāṃśusvarasya prayoga iti
GSP33brssgo3u:4225: tathā kaṭhāḥ 'ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33brssgo3u:4226: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañcāgnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ' (ka. 3.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4234: ṛtaṃ pibantāvityatrobhayorapi bhoktṛtvameva dṛśyate tadvedyarūpaṃ bhidyamānaṃ vidyāṃ bhindyādityevaṃ prāpte bravīti vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4239: dvā suparṇā ityatra tāvat anaśnannanyo abhicākaśīti ityaśanāyādyatītaḥ paramātmā pratipādyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4240: vākyaśeṣe 'pi ca sa eva pratipādyamno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4242: ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra tu jīve pibatyaśanāyādyatītaḥ paramātmāpi sāhacaryācchatrinyāyena pibatītyupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4245: tadviṣaya eva cātrāpi vākyaśeṣo bhavati 'yaḥ seturījānānāmakṣaraṃ brahma yatparam' (ka. 3.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4249: apica triṣvapyeteṣu vedānteṣu paurvāparyalocane paramātmavidyaivāvagamyate tādātmyavivakṣayaiva jīvopādānaṃ nārthāntaravivakṣayā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4259: iha tu vedyabhedānnopasaṃhāra iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4262: kintu pibatpadasya mukhyārthatvāya svataḥ kalpanayā ca pānakṛtyāśrayau buddhijīvau pibantau grāhyau,
GSP33brssgo3u:4271: tatra saṃśayaḥ - vidyaikatvaṃ vā syādvidyānānātvaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4275: tasmādyathābhyāsātkarmabheda evamabhyāsādvidyābheda ityevaṃ prāpte pratyāha - antarāmnānāviśeṣātsvātmano vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4276: sarvāntaro hi svātmobhayatrāpyaviśiṣṭaḥ pṛcchyate ca pratyucyate ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:4280: yathāca pañcabhūtasamūhe dehe pṛthivyā āpontarā adbhyastejo 'ntaramiti satyapyāpekṣike 'ntaratve naiva mukhya sarvāntaratvaṃ bhavati tathehāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4282: yathā 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' (śve.
GSP33brssgo3u:4283: 6.11) ityasminmantre samasteṣu bhūtagrāmyeṣveka eva sarvāntara ātmāmnāyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4293: tanme vyācakṣvetyuṣastapraśne yājñavalkyena prāṇādiprerako dṛṣṭyādisākṣī pratipāditaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4294: tathaiva 'yadeva sākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā sarvāntarastanme vyācakṣva'iti kaholapraśne 'śanāyādyatītaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4305: anyathā bhedānupapattir iti cen nopadeśāntaravat / BBs_3,3.36 /
GSP33brssgo3u:4309: yathā tāṇḍināmupaniṣadi ṣaṣṭhe prapāṭhake - 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvekateto' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:4310: iti navakṛtvo 'pyupadeśe na vidyābhedo bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4311: kathaṃ na navakṛtvo 'pyupadeśe vidyābhedo na bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4319: iti dvitīye praśna evakāraṃ prayuñjānaḥ pūrvapraśnagatamevārthamuttaratrānukṛṣyamāṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4324: nanu anyathā vidyaikyāṅgīkāre abhyāsānupapattiriti ceducyate-sa evābhyāsaḥ karmabhedako yo nirarthakaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4325: iha tūṣastabrāhmaṇoktātmana evāśanāyādyatyayarūpaviśeṣakathanārthatvādabhyāso 'nyathāsiddho na vidyābhedaka iti samudāyārthaḥ //36//
GSP33brssgo3u:4331: tathā - 'tadyo 'haṃ so 'sau yo 'sau so 'ham' ityādityapuruṣaṃ prakṛtyaitareyiṇaḥ samāmananti,
GSP33brssgo3u:4332: tathā jābālāḥ tvaṃ vā ahamasmi bhagavo devate 'haṃ vai tvamasi' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4333: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimiha vyatihāreṇobhayarūpā matiḥ kartavyotaikarūpaiveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4336: yadi caivaṃ cintayitavyo viśeṣaḥ parikalpyeta saṃsāriṇastāvadīśvarātmamīśvarasya saṃsīryātmatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4337: tatra saṃsāriṇastāvadīśvarātmatva utkarṣo bhavedīśvarasya tu saṃsāryātmatve nikarṣaḥ kutaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4342: tathāhi viśiṃṣanti samāmnātāra ubhayoccāraṇena 'tvamahamasmyahaṃ ca tattvamasi' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4351: kiṃ tarhi vyatihāreṇeha dvirūpā matiḥ kartavyā vacanaprāmāṇyānnaikarūpetyetāvadupapādayāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4353: yathādhyānārtho 'pi satyakāmādiguṇopadeśe tadguṇa īśvaraḥ prasiddhyati tadvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:4354: tasmādayamādhyātavyo vyatihāraḥ samāne ca viṣaya upasaṃhartavyo bhavatīti // 37 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4360: utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭirnikṛṣṭe kṛtā phalavatīti nyāyācca saṃśaye jīve īśvaratvamatireva kāryā uktanyāyāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:4362: tatra lāghavaṃ phalaṃ liddhānte tu śrutyarthavattvamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4363: ekenaiva tvamahamasmītyuccāraṇenaikatvamateḥ kṛtatvādahaṃ tvamasi iti vṛthā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4368: brahmaṇi manomayatvādivajjīvātmatvasya dhyānārthamārope 'pi nikarṣaprasaktyabhāvāditi pariharati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4369: brahmaṇi nikarṣaṃ hitvā jīvatādātmyadhyāne maduktamevāgatamiti śaṅkate-nanvevamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4370: materdvirūpatvaṃ tvadanuktamasmābhirucyate dhyānaparaṃ vākyamidamekatvaṃ tu mānāntarāvirodhātsidhyatīti samādhatte-na vayamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4377: 'sa yo haitaṃ mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda brahma' (bṛ. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4378_1: sa ādityo ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 5.5.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4379: tatra saṃśayaḥ -' kiṃ dve ete satyavidye kiṃvaikaiveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4391: yatra tu vispaṣṭātkāraṇāntarādvidyābhedaḥ pratīyate tatraitadevaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4392: atra tūkṣayā saṃbhave tadyattatsatyamiti prakṛtākarṣaṇātpūrvavidyāsaṃbaddameva satyamuttaratrākṛṣyata ityekavidyātvaniścayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4395: apicārthavādādeva phale kalpayitavye sati vidyaikatve cāvayaveṣu śrūyamāṇāni bahūnyapi phalānyavayavinyāmeva vidyāyāmupasaṃhartavyāni bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4396: tasmātsaiveyamekā satyavidyā tena tena viśeṣaṇopetāmnātetyataḥ sarva eva satyādayo guṇā ekasminneva prayoga upasaṃhartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4398: chāndogye ca - 'atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā. 1.6.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:4402: chāndogye hi jyotiṣṭomakarmasamabandhinīyamudgīthavyapāśrayā vidyā vijñāyate tatra hyadimadhyāvasāneṣu hi karmasaṃbandhacihnāni bhavanti 'iyamevargagniḥ sāma' (chā. 1.6.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4413: sa yaḥ kaścidadhikārī mahadvyāpakaṃ yakṣaṃ pūjyaṃ bhautikeṣu prathamajametatsacca tyacceti sattyaṃ brahma hiraṇyagarbhākhyaṃ vedopāste tasya lokajayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4416: madhyasthamakṣaramanṛtamubhayataḥ satyena saṃpuṭitatvātsattyaprāyameva bhavatīti nāmākṣaropāsanā satyavidyāṅgatvenoktā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4418: so 'sāvādityamaṇḍale 'kṣiṇi ca puruṣastasyāharityahamiti ca nāmadvayajñānātpāpakṣayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4423: tathātra phalaśrutibhedādvidyābheda iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-dve iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4429: evaṃ vidyābhede 'pyetadupāsyaikyajñānaṃ syādatra tūbhayathāsaṃbhave vidyaikyanānātvasaṃśaye satyamityupāsyarūpaikyajñānādvidyaikyaniścaya ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4432: kiñca yatra pradhānavidhāvevaṅkāma iti phalaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4434: iha tu prathamaja satyaṃ brahmeti vedeti pradhānavidyāvidhisthatvaṃ lokajayaphalasyābhyupetyāsmābhirnāmarūpāṅgasya phalaśruteḥ stutitvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4435_1: pradhāne tadaṅge vā yatkiñcitphalaṃ śrutaṃ tasya sarvasyāpi śrutatvāviśeṣājjāteṣṭiphalanyāyena
GSP33brssgo3u:4441: puruṣa udgītha ityevaṃ vidvānudgātā karmaphalasamṛddhisamartha iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4449: atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ (chā. 8.1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4450: iti prastutya chandogā adhīyate 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyurviśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ' (chā. 8.1.5) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4451: tathā vājasaneyinaḥ - sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu ya eṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśastasmiñchete sarvasya vaśī (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4452: tatra vidyaikatvaṃ parasparaguṇayogaśca kiṃ vā neti saṃśaye vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4456: yadetaccāndogye hṛdayākāśasya satyakāmatvādiguṇajātamulabhyate taditaratra vājasaneyake vaśitvādyupalabhyate tadapītaratra chāndogye eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā (chā. 8.1.5)
GSP33brssgo3u:4459: samānaṃ hyubhayamatrāpi hṛdayamātanaṃ samānaśca vedya īśvaraḥ samānaṃ ca tasya setutvaṃ lokāsaṃbhedaprayojanamityevamādi bahu sāmānyaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4461: ñapi dṛśyate chāndogye hṛdayākāśasya guṇayogo vājasaneyake tvākāśāśrayasya brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4466: saguṇā hi brahmavidyā chāndogya upadiśyate 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyānkāmān' (chā. 8.1.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:4468: vājasaneyake tu nirguṇameva paraṃ brahmopadiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate 'ata ūrdhvaṃ vimokṣāya brūhi' (bṛ. 4.3.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:4471: vaśitvādi tu tatstutyarthameva guṇajātaṃ vājasaneyake saṃkīrtyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4474: guṇavatastu brahmaṇa ekatvādvibhūtipradarśanāyāyaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraḥ sūtrito nopāsanāyeti draṣṭavyam // 39 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4476_0: saguṇanirguṇavidyayoḥ śrutāḥ satyakāmādayo vaśitvādayaśca guṇā mitha upasaṃhartavyā
GSP33brssgo3u:4476_1: na vetyupasaṃhārasya phalabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃdehe satyavidyāyā ekatvādguṇasāṃkarye
GSP33brssgo3u:4479: bhinnāvidyāsthānāmapi guṇānāmāyatanādisāmyena nirguṇasthale buddhisthānāṃ stutyarthamupasaṃhāro yuktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4482_0: yadyapi saguṇasthasatyakāmādiṣu nirguṇasthaguṇā antarbhūtā eva tathāpi nopasaṃhāroktervaiyarthyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4488: chāndogye vaiśvānaravidyāṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - 'tadyadbhaktaṃ prathamamāgacchettaddhomīyaṃ sa yāṃ prathamāmāhutiṃ juhuyāttāṃ juhuyātprāṇasya svāhā' (chā. 5.19.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4490: tāsu ca parastādagnihotraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ 'ya etadevaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti' (chā. 5.24.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:4493: tatredaṃ vicāryate - kiṃ bhojanalope lopaḥ prāṇāgnihotrasyotālopa itai /
GSP33brssgo3u:4499: yathā ha vai svayamahutvāgnihotraṃ parasya juhuyādevaṃ tat' ityatithibhojanasya prāthamyaṃ ninditvā svāmibhojanaṃ prathamaṃ prāpayantī prāṇāgnihotra ādaraṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4500: yā hi na prāthamyalopaṃ sahate netarāṃ sā prāthamyavato 'gnihotrasya lopaṃ sahateti manyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4512: nanu yadbhaktamiti yacchabdena bhojanākṣiptaṃ bhaktamanūdya yaddhomīyamiti homasaṃyogavidhinādākṣepakabhojanalope tadākṣiptabhaktāśritahomalopa iti siddhāntī śaṅkate-tadyaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4513: nirguṇasyopāstilope 'pi stutyarthaguṇasthairyavadbhojanalope 'pi prāṇāgnihotrasyādareṇa stutinirvāhārthamalopa iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣasūtreṇa pariharati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4517: ato bhaktavidherapavādārthatvādbhojanalope bhaktākhyaguṇasyāṅgasya lope 'pi na mukhyasyāgnihotrasya lopaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4520_0: ādhāne santi pavamāneṣṭyastatrāgnaye pavamānāya puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapediti
GSP33brssgo3u:4520_2: vihitāgnihotra havaṇyatideśena prāpta ādhānakāle cāgnihotrābhāvāttasyā guṇabhūtāyā
GSP33brssgo3u:4520_3: lope 'pi mukhyasya nirvāpasya na lopa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4532: tā aprayojakalakṣaṇāpannāḥ satyaḥ kathaṃ bhojanalope dravyāntaraṃ pratinidhāpayeyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4534: kuṇḍapāyināmayane hi māsāgnihotraṃ juhotīti vidhyuddeśagato 'gnihotraśabdastadvadbhāvaṃ vidāpayediti yuktā taddharmaprāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4542: ata eva cehāpi sāṃpādikānyevāgnihotrāṅgāni darśayati - 'ura eva vedirlomāni bahurhṛdayaṃ gārhapatyo mano 'nvāhāryapacana āsyamāhavanīyaḥ' (chā. 5.18.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4557: āśritya vihitāhutīnāmāśrayalope lopa eva na dravyāntarākṣepakatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4558: yathā kratuprayuktātpraṇayanāśritasya godohanasya kratulope lope na tvāśrayāntaraprayojakatvaṃ tatheti phalitamāha-tā itiyaduktamagnihotraśabdāddravyāntaraprāptiriti,
GSP33brssgo3u:4564: mukhyāgnihotrāṅgāni saṃpādyante cetkathaṃ tadanaṅgaṃ vediratra saṃpādyate tatrāha-vediśrutiśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4569: nanu svāmibhojanasyottarakālatvaṃ śrutyādivihitaṃ kathaṃ pūrvo 'tidhibhyo 'śnīyāditivacane bādhyate tatrāha-na hyastīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4580: kiṃ tāni nityānyeva syuḥ karmasu parṇamayītvādivadutānityāni godohanādivaditi vicārayāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4584: yattveṣāṃ svavākyeṣu phalaśravaṇam 'āpayitā ha vaikāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:4586_0: tasmādyathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti ityevamādīnāmaprakaraṇapaṭhitānāmapi
GSP33brssgo3u:4588: yānyetānyudgīthādikarmaguṇayāthātmyanirdhāraṇāni rasatama āptiḥ samṛddhirmukhyaprāṇa āditya ityevamādīni naitāni nityavatkarmasu niyamyeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:4590: tathāhyaniyatatvamevañjātīyakānāṃ darśayati śrutiḥ - 'tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda' (chā. 1.110)
GSP33brssgo3u:4592: prastāvādidevatāvijñānavihīnānāmapi prastotrādīnāṃ yājanādhyavasānadarsanāt 'prastotaryā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā tāṃ cedavidvānprastoṣyasi' (chā. 1.10.9)
GSP33brssgo3u:4595_0: api caivañjātīyakasya karmavyapāśrayasya vijñānasya pṛthageva karmaṇaḥ phalamupalabhyate
GSP33brssgo3u:4596: nānā tu vidyā cāvidyā ca yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4597: tatra nānā tviti vidvadavidvatprayogayoḥ pṛthakkaraṇādvīyarvattaramiti ca tarappratyayaprayogādvidyāvihīnamapi karmaviryavaditi gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4601: tathā lokasāmādiṣu pratiniyatāni pratyupāsanaṃ phalāni śiṣyante 'kalpante hāsmai lokā ūrdhvāścāvṛttāśca' (chā. 2.2.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:4606: prayājādiṣu tvitikartavyatākāṅkṣasya kratoḥ prakṛtatvāttādarthye sati yuktaṃ phalaśruterarthavādatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4612: vākyenaiva tu juhvādyāśrayatāṃ vivakṣitvā phale 'pi vidhiṃ vivakṣato vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4613: upāsanānāṃ tu kriyātmatvādviśiṣṭavidhānopapatterudgīthādyāśrayāṇāṃ phale vidānaṃ na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4615: ata eva ca kalpasūtrakārā naivañjātīyakānyupāsanāni kratuṣu kalpayāñcakruḥ // 42 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4618: yathānārābhyādhītaparṇamayītvaṃ juhūdvārā kratvaṅgatayā karmasu nityaṃ prayujyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:4620_1: prayujyate yathā vā paśvaṅgayūpāśrayaṃ bailvatvamannādyaphalatvādanityaṃ tathā karmasamṛdyādiphalakatvādupāsanānyanaṅgatvenānityānīti saṃśayārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4626: tathā cāṅgatayā prayogavidhinā nityena prayujyanta iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-yānītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4627: udgīthādayaḥ karmaṇāṃ guṇāḥ aṅgāni teṣāṃ yāthātmayaṃ rasatamatvādikaṃ tannirdhāraṇānyupāsanāni yāni tāni karmasu nityaparṇamayītvādivanna niyamyerannityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4628: eṣāṃ karmāṅgatve taddhīnasyāviduṣaḥ karma na syādaṅgalopāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:4631: tāṃ cedavidvānprastoṣyasi mūrdhā te vyapatiṣyatīti cākrāyaṇenartvijāmākṣiptatvādanupāsakānāmapi karmaprayogo 'stītyāha-prastāvādīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4633: tenomityakṣareṇa yaścaitadakṣaramevaṃ rasatamatvādirūpeṇa vedopāste yaśca na veda tāvubhau karma kuruta eva yadyapi tu vidyāvidyayornānātvaṃ bhinnaphalatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4634: dṛṣṭaṃ hi maṇivikraye jñānājñānābhyāṃ vaṇikśabarayoḥ phalavaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4635: tasmādyadeva karma vidyayodgīthādyupāstyā śraddhayāstikyabuddhyopaniṣadā rahasyadevatādhyānena karoti tadeva karma phalātiśayavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4636: karmaṇo vīryavattvaṃ nāma phalavattvaṃ vidyāhīnasyāpi gamyamānaṃ vidyāyā anaṅgatve liṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4638: asmai viduṣe kalpante bhogāya samarthā bhavanti bhūmerūrdhvā lokā āvṛttā adhastanāścetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4644: yadyapi parṇamayītvādīnāmaṅgatvabodhakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ nāsti tathāpi teṣu phalaśruteḥ stutitvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4647: yadapaḥ praṇayettat paśukāmasya sato godohanena brahmavarcasakāmasya kaṃsnyeti phalārthavidhireva nārthavādaḥ godohanādeḥ kratvanākāṅkṣitatvenāṅgatvābhāvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:4649: tathā khādiratvena nirākāṅkṣakratvaṅgayūpamāśritya bailvamannādyakāmasya khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti phalārthavidhirevārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4650: parṇamayītvādiṣu phalavidhiḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-na tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4653_1: vidheyaḥ paścānnirākāṅkṣajuhūmāśritya tasyaiva prakṛtidravyasya phalasaṃyogo vidheya
GSP33brssgo3u:4665: ityatrādhyātmaṃ vāgādīnāṃ śreṣṭho 'vadhārito 'dhidaivatamagnyādīnāṃ vāyuḥ tathā chāndogye - 'vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ' (chā. 4.3.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4668: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ pṛthagevemau vāyuprāṇāvupagantavyau syātāmapṛthagveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4671: darśayati ca śrutiradhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca tattvābhedam - 'agnirvāgbhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśat' (ai. 2.4)
GSP33brssgo3u:4673: tathā 'ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarvo 'nantāḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.13)
GSP33brssgo3u:4675: tathānyatrāpi tatra tatrādhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca bahudhā tattvabhedadarśanaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4676: kvacicca 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ iti spaṣṭameva vāyuṃ prāṇaṃ caikaṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4682: tathā chāndogye 'pi parastāt 'mahātmanaścaturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jāgara bhuvanasya gopāḥ' (chā. 4.3.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:4683: ityekameva saṃvargaṃ gamayati na bravītyeka ekeṣāṃ caturṇāṃ saṃvargo 'paro 'pareṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4693: 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evametāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.22)
GSP33brssgo3u:4698: bhagnavratāni hi vāgādīnyuktāni 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4702: iti cektvā 'teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati (bṛ. 1.5.23)
GSP33brssgo3u:4706: tathā 'tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau vāyureva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu' (chā. 4.3.4)
GSP33brssgo3u:4707: iti bhedena vyapadiśati 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' (chā. 4.3.8)
GSP33brssgo3u:4712: ato vacanādindrābhedācca sahapradānāśaṅkāyāṃ rājādiguṇabhedādyājyānuvākyavyatyāsavidhānācca yathānyasameva devatāpṛthaktvātpradānapṛthaktvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4714: taduktaṃ saṃkarṣe 'nānā vā devatā pṛthagjñānāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4715: tatra tu dravyadevatābhedādyāgabhedo vidyate naivamiha vidyābhedo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4717: vidyaikasthe 'pi tvadhyātmādhidaivabhedātpravṛttibhedo bhavati agnihotra iva sāyaṃprātaḥkālabhedāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4721: astu karmāṅgānāṃ tatsaṃbaddhopāstīnāṃ ca phalabhedānnityatvānityatvarūpaḥ prayogabhedaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4724: 'yataścodeti sūryastaṃ vada'iti praśne sūtrātmakavāyurvācyo vāyusthāne prāṇaṃ vadannekatvaṃ tayordarśayatītyāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4725: kiñca yadi vāyuprāṇayoḥ pṛthagdhyānaṃ syāttarhi dhyānāṅgavratabhedo 'pi syādiha tu prāṇāpānanirodhātmakavrataikyaśruterdhyānaikyamityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4727: kiñca vāyuprāṇo saṃvargau bhedenopakramya parastādvākyaśeṣe saṃvargadevaikyaśruteḥ prayogaikyamityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4729: caturaścatuḥ saṃkhyākānagnisūryodakacandrānaparāṃśca vākcakṣuḥśrotramanorūpāneko devaḥ kaḥ prajāpatiḥ jagāra gīrṇavānupasaṃhṛtavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4731_1: sāyaṃprātaḥkālabhedena prayogabhedastathā 'annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda'ityutpannāyāḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4732: 'tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau'ityupāsyabhedavākyasya prayogabhedaparatvādvākyādeva bhedasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4735: tato 'dhyātmādhidaivāvasthābhedenoktasya dhyeyabhedasya nirāse 'yataścodeti'iti ślokasya na śaktirityāha-śloketi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4738: nanvevakārādvāyuvratanivṛtteḥ prāṇa evaiko dhyeyo bhātītyata āha-ekameveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4739: vadanadarśanādīni vākcakṣurādīnāṃ vratāni śramarūpamṛtyunā bhagnānītyuktvā prāṇasyābhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4740: tathā jvalanatāpādīnyagnyādityādīnāṃ vratāni bhagnānītyuktvā vāyorabhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4741: 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ sthiravrata evametāsāṃ devanāṃ vāyurlocanti hyanyā devatā na vāyuḥsaiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyiḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4742: ato bhagnavatanirāsārtha evakāro na vāyuvratanivṛttyartha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4745: tena vratena vāyoḥ sāyujyaṃ samānadehatvaṃ salokatāṃ ca jayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4748: saṃprati pūrvoktaṃ pṛthagupadeśaṃ vivṛṇoti-tathā tau vā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4750: trayaḥ puroḍāśā asyāṃ santīti tripuroḍāśinīṣṭistasyāṃ kiṃ sahapradānamuta bhedeneti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-sarveṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4753: yadvā sarvadevārthaṃ yugapadavadānaṃ kāryamityatra heturacchaṃvaṭkāramiti avyarthatvāyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4754: ekārthamavatte haviṣi śeṣo yāgānarhatayā vṛthā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4755: evaṃ sahāvadānaśruterdevaikyācca puroḍāśānāṃ sahaprakṣepe prāpte pṛthakprakṣepa iti siddhāntamāha-rājeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4757: kiñcādhvaryuṇā yajeti praiṣe kṛte hotrā yo mantraḥ paṭhyate sā yājyā,
GSP33brssgo3u:4759: tatrāsyāmiṣṭau prathamapuroḍāśapradāne yā kḷptā yājyā sa dvitīyapradāne puronuvākya,
GSP33brssgo3u:4767: karmotpattivākyasthadevatābhedaḥ karmabhede heturiha tvannādo bhavati ya evaṃ vedetyutpattāvekatvena jñātavidyāyāḥ paścācchrutavāyuprāṇabhedo na bhedakaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4776: vājasaneyino 'gnirahasye - 'naiva idamagre sadāsīt' ityetasminbrāhmaṇe mano 'dhikṛtyādhīyate 'tatṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano 'gnīnarkānmanomayāmanaścitaḥ' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4777: tathaiva 'vākcitaḥ prāṇacitaścakṣuścitaḥ śrotracitaḥ karmacito 'gnicitaḥ' iti pṛthagagamanīnāmananti sāṃpādikān /
GSP33brssgo3u:4778: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimete manaścidādayaḥ kriyānupraveśinastaccheṣabhūtā uta svatantrāḥ kevalavidyātmakā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4779: tatra prakaraṇākriyānupraveśe prāpte svātantryaṃ tāvatpratijānīte liṅgabhayastvāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4780: bhūyāṃsi hiliṅgānyasminbrāhmaṇe kevalavidyātmakatvameṣāmupodbalayanti dṛśyante tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ iti,
GSP33brssgo3u:4781: 'tānhaitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti caivañjātīyakāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:4785: utpatteḥ prāgidaṃ sarvaṃ naiva sadāsīnnāpyasadityupakramya manaḥ sṛṣṭimuktvā tanmana ātmānamaikṣatetīkṣaṇapūrvakamagnīnapaśyaditi mano 'dhikṛtya paṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4787: tābhiriṣṭakātvena kalpitābhirmanasaiva saṃpāditā agnayo manaścitasthānarkānpūjyānmanovṛttiṣusaṃpāditānātmanaḥ svasya saṃbandhitvena mano 'paśyat,
GSP33brssgo3u:4789_0: prāṇo ghrāṇaṃ karmendriyeṇa hastādinā citaḥ karmacitaḥ agnistvak pūrvatrāgnicayanaprakaraṇātkimete
GSP33brssgo3u:4792: iha tu manaścidādyagnīnāṃ prakaraṇātkarmāṅgatvenaikaprayogatvamiti prāpayya siddhāntamupakramate-tatretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4793: pūrvapakṣe bhāvanāgnīnāṃ kratvaṅgatvamiṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ vikalpaḥ samuccayo vāstu /
GSP33brssgo3u:4795: tattatra sarvaprāṇimanovṛttibhirmama sadāgnayaḥ cīyanta iti dhyānadārḍhye sati sarvabhūtāni yatkiñcit manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmevāgnīnāṃ sā kṛtiḥ karaṇamityekaṃ liṅgaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4797: evaṃvide svapate jāgrate 'pi tadīyāgnīnbhūtāni sarvadā cinvantīti liṅgāntaraṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4805: pūrvasya kriyāmayasyāgneḥ prakaraṇāttadviṣaya evāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ syānna svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4811: anyārthadarśanaṃ cāsatyāmanyasyāṃ prāptau guṇavādenāpyupapadyamānaṃ na prakaraṇaṃ bādhitumutsahate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4814: yathā daśarātrasya dasaṇe 'hanyavivākye pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudrasya somasya prajāpataye devatāyai guhyamāṇasya grahaṇāsādanahavanāharaṇopahvānabhakṣaṇāni mānasānyevāmnāyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:4815: sa ca mānaso 'pi grahakalpaḥ kriyāprakaraṇātkriyāśeṣa eva bhavatyevamayamapyagnikalpa ityarthaḥ // 45 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4819_0: pūrvasyeṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinuta ityuktasya sa eṣa tviṣṭakāgniriti saṃnihitasyāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4826: nanu akriyārūpāgnīnāṃ dhyānamayānāṃ kathaṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ tatrāha-mānasavaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4828: taddharmamāṇāmeva teṣvatideśāttasya madhyadaśarātrasya daśame 'hanyarthādekādaśe 'hani mānasagrahaḥ śrūyate-'anayā tvā pātreṇa samudraṃ rasayā prājāpatyaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhṇāti'iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4829: anayā rasayā pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudraṃ tvāṃ prajāpatidevatākaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhyate iti grahaḥ somarasaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4831: ata evartvijāṃ dhyāyitayā vividhavākyoccāraṇābhāvādavivākyasaṃjñā ahnaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4833: gṛhītasya svasthāne sthāpanamāsādanaṃ somasya homo havanaṃ hutaśeṣādānamāharaṇaṃ śeṣabhakṣaṇāyartvijāṃ mitho 'nujñānakaraṇamupahvānaṃ tato bhakṣaṇamityetāni mānasānyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4834: sa ca mānaso graho dvādaśāhādaharantaraṃ svatantramityāśaṅaḍkya dvādaśāhasaṃjñāvirodhānnāharantaraṃ kintu prakaraṇādavivākyasyāhno 'ṅgamiti siddhāntamāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4852: vidyātmakā evaite svatantrā manaścidādayo 'gnayaḥ syurna kriyāśeṣabhūtāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4853: tathāhi nirdhārayati - 'te haite vidyācita eva' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4854: vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavanti iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4866: nanu liṅgamapyasatyāṃmanyasyāṃ prāptāvasādhakaṃ kasyacidarthasyetyapāsya tatprakaraṇasāmarthyātkriyāśeṣatvamadhyavasitamityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -
GSP33brssgo3u:4874: tathā liṅm 'sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4876: 'vidyācita eva' iti hi sāvadhāraṇeyaṃ śrutiḥ kriyānupraveśe 'mīṣāmabhyupagamyamāne pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4879: tadabhiprāyatāyāṃ hividyocita itīyatā svarūpasamakīrtanenaiva kṛtatvādanarthakamavadhāraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo3u:4882: tathā 'svapate jāgrate caivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtānyetānyetānagniṃścinvanti' iti sātatyadarśanameṣāṃ svātantrye 'vakalpate /
