GSP33brssgo3u:4883: yathā sāṃpādike vākyaprāṇamaye 'gnihotre 'prāṇaṃ tadā vāci juhoti - vācaṃ tadā prāṇe juhoti' (kau. 2.5)
GSP33brssgo3u:4884: iti coktvocyate - 'ete anante āhutī jāgracca svapaṃśca satataṃ - juhoti' (kauṣī. 2.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4886: kriyānupraveśe tu kriyāprayogasyālpakālatvena na sātatyeṣāṃ prayogaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:4888: yatra hi vispaṣṭo vidhāyako liṅgādirupalabhyate yuktaṃ tatra saṃkīrtanamātrasyārthavādatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4889: iha hi vispaṣṭovidhyantarānupalabdheḥ saṃkīrtanādevaiṣāṃ vijñānavidhānaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4890: tacca yathāsaṃkīrtanameva kalpayituṃ śakyata iti sātatyadarśanāttathābhūtameva kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4892: etena tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ ityādi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4893: tathā vākyamapi evaṃvide iti puruṣaviśeṣasaṃbandhamevaiṣāmācakṣaṇaṃ na kratusaṃbandhaṃ mṛṣyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4903: sarvadā sarvabhūtāni madarthamagnīn cinvantīti dhyāyedityapūrvārthatayā vidhikalpanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4912_1: grahā agṛhyanta manasāstuvanmanasāśaṃsanyatkiñca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiñca yajñiyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4912_2: karma manasaiva teṣu tanmanomayeṣu manaścitsu manomayameva kriyate' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4914: naca pratyakṣāḥ kriyāvayavāḥ santaḥ saṃpadā lipsitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4916: nahyatra kriyāṅgaṃ kiñcidādāya tasminnado nāmādhyavasitavyamiti vadati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4917: ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi tu manovṛttibhedānādāya teṣvagnitvaṃ grahādīṃśca kalpayati puruṣayādivat /
GSP33brssgo3u:4918: saṃkhyā ceyaṃ puruṣāyuṣasyāhaḥsu dṛṣṭā satī tatsaṃbandhinīṣu manovṛttiṣvāropyata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4921: tathāhi - 'teṣāmekaika eva tāvānyānānasau pūrvaḥ' iti kriyāmayasyāgnermāhātmyaṃ jñānamayānāmekaikasyātidiśankiriyāyāmanādaraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4922: naca satyeva kriyāsaṃbandhe vikalpaḥ pūrveṇottareṣāmiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:4923: nahi yena vyāpāreṇāhanīyadhāraṇādinā pūrvaḥ kriyāyāmupakaroti tenottara upakartuṃ śaknuvanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4924: yattu pūrvapakṣe 'pyatideśa upodbalaka ityuktaṃ sati hi sāmānye 'tideśaḥ pravartata iti tadasmātpakṣe 'gnitvasāmānyenātideśasaṃbhavātpratyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4929: yathā prajñāntarāṇi śāṇḍilyavidyāprabhṛtīni svena svenānubadhyamānāni pṛthageva karmabhyaḥ prajñāntarebhyaśca svatantrāṇi bhavantyevamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4931: taduktaṃ prathame kāṇḍe - 'kratvarthāyāmiti cenna varṇatrayasaṃyogāt' (jai.sū. 11.4.7) iti // 50 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4934_0: saṃpadupāstyai manovṛttiṣu kriyāṅgānāṃ yojanamanubandhaḥ śrutyā kriyate tadanyathānupapattyāpyagnīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4935: te agnayaḥ, adhīyanta teṣāmādhānaṃ manasaiva kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4942: kiṃ bahūktyā yatkiñcidyajñe karmārādupakārakaṃ yajñiyaṃ yajñasvarūpotpādakaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ manomayaṃ kuryāditi śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4946: anādarārtho 'tideśo na bhavati kintu vikalpārtha ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4947: ekasminmādhye nirapekṣasādhanayorvikalpo bhavati yathā vrīhiyavayoratra tu kriyāgnerdhyānāgnīnāṃ sādhyabhedānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4953: artha iti śeṣaḥ manaścidādīnāṃ svātantraye kriyāprakaraṇādutkarṣaḥ syādityāśaṅkya sa iṣṭa ityāha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4954: ekādaśe cintitaṃ 'rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajeta'iti prakṛtyāveṣṭirnāma kācidiṣṭirāmnātā-'āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā',
GSP33brssgo3u:4958: śrūyate-'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutimāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ madhye nidadhyādyadi rājanyastadaindram'iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4960: tatrāgneyādicaruṣu aṅgānāṃ tantreṇa prayogo bhavati madhyenidhānaliṅgātprayogabhede madhye nidhānāyogādetayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayedityekavacanācca /
GSP33brssgo3u:4961: sa ca tantraprayogo rājasūyakratubāhyāyāmannādyakāmavarṇatrayakartṛkāyāmevāveṣṭau jñeyo na tu kratvantargatāyām /
GSP33brssgo3u:4962: nanu kimatra niyāmakaṃ kratvarthāyāmapyaveṣṭau tantraprayogaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo3u:4964: varṇatrayasaṃyuktānāṃ kāmyāyāmevāṅgatantraikyasādhakasya madhye nadhānādiliṅgasya sattvādato liṅgaikavacanābhyāṃ tantraikye sati hiraṇyādikā militaikaivā dakṣiṇādheyā,
GSP33brssgo3u:4967: atra caikaprayogaliṅgasya kratvartheṣṭāvasaṃbhavaṃ kāmyeṣṭau ca saṃbhavaṃ vadatānena sūtreṇa kāmyeṣṭeḥ kratvartheṣṭivilakṣaṇatvātkratuprakaraṇādutkarṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4981: yathā 'sa vā eṣa eva mṛtyurya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' iti 'agnirvai mṛtyuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.10)
GSP33brssgo3u:4983: yathā ca 'asau vāva loko gautamāgnistasyāditya eva samit' (chā. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4986: kratvarthatvapuruṣārthatvavaiṣamye 'pi mānasatvasāmānyaṃ na virudhyate viṣamayorapi sāmyadarśanādityarthaḥ //51//
GSP33brssgo3u:4990: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ / BBs_3,3.52 /
GSP33brssgo3u:4991: parastādapi 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścittaḥ' ityasminnanantare brāhmaṇe tāvadvadhyaṃ kevalavidyāvidhitvaṃ śabdasya prayojanaṃ lakṣyate na śuddhakarmāṅgavidhitvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4992: tatra hi -' vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4993: na tatra dakṣīṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' ityanena ślokena kevalaṃ karmanindanvidhyāṃ ca praśaṃsannidaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4994_0: tathā purastādapi yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati ityasminbrāhmaṇe vidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate
GSP33brssgo3u:4994_1: so 'mṛto bhavati mṛtyurhyasyātmā bhavati iti vidyāphalenaivopasaṃhārānna karmapradhānatā
GSP33brssgo3u:4995: bhūyāṃsastvagnyavayavāḥ saṃpādayitavyā vidyāyāmityetasmātkāraṇādagninānubadhyate vidyā na karmāṅgatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4997: kiñca pūrvottarabrāhmaṇayoḥ svatantravidyāvidhānāttanmadhyasthasyāpi brāhmaṇasya svatantravidyāvidhiparatvamityāha-pareṇa ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4998: cite 'gnau lokadṛṣṭividhānaṃ svatantramuttaratra gamyate pūrvatra maṇḍalapuruṣopāstistatsāṃnidhyānmadhye 'pi mānasāgnayaḥ svatantrā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4999: tarhi kriyāgninā saha pāṭhaḥ kimarthamityata āha-bhūyāṃsastviti //52//
GSP33brssgo3u:5006: nahyasati dehavyatiriktātmani paralokāścodanā upapajadyerankasya vā brahmātmatvamupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5007: nanu śāstrapramukha eva prathame pāde śāstraphalopabhogyasya dehāvyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5009: iha tu svayameva sūtrakṛtā tadastitvamākṣepapuraḥsaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5010: ita eva cākṛṣyācāryeṇa śabarasvāminā pramāṇalakṣaṇe varṇitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5011: ata eva ca bhagavatopavarṣeṇa prathame tantra ātmāstitvābhidhānaprasaktau śārīrake vakṣyamāḥ ityuddhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5012: iha cedaṃ codanālakṣaṇeṣūpāsaneṣu vicāryamāṇeṣvātmāstitvaṃ vicāryate kṛtsnaśāstraśeṣatvapradarśanāya /
GSP33brssgo3u:5013_1: varṇitaṃ ko 'sau puruṣo yadarthā ete manaścidādaya ityasyāṃ prasaktāvidaṃ dehavyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5015: ākṣepapūrvikā hi parihāroktirvivakṣiter'the sthūṇānikhanananyāyena dṛḍhāṃ buddhimutpādayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5016_1: samastavyasteṣu bāhyeṣu pṛthivyādiṣvadṛṣṭamapi caitanyaṃ śarīrākārapariṇateṣu bhūteṣu
GSP33brssgo3u:5016_2: syāditi saṃbhāvayantastebhyaścaitanyaṃ madaśaktivadvijñānaṃ caitanyaviśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣa iti cāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5017: na svargagamanāyāpavargagamanāya vā samartho dehavyatirikta ātmāsti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5019: yaddhi yasminsati bhavatyasati ca na bhavati tattaddharmatvenādhyavasīte yathāgnidharmāvauṣṇyaprakāśau /
GSP33brssgo3u:5020_1: upalabhyamānā bahiścānupalabhyamānā asiddhe dehavyatirikte dharmiṇi dehadharmā eva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5024: manaścidādīnāṃ puruṣārthatvamuktaṃ tadayuktaṃ dehātiriktapuruṣābhāvādityākṣipati-eka ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5026: pūrvapakṣe tu paralokārthakarmasu mokṣārthavidyāyāṃ cāpravṛttiriti vyatirekamukhena phalamāha-na hyasatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5027: vyatiriktātmavicārasya pūrvatantre kṛtatvātpaunaruktyamityāśaṅkya tatratyavicārasyāpīdameva sūtraṃ mūlaṃ jaiminisūtrābhāvādataḥ kva punaruktirityāha-nanu śāstretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5028: 'yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ svargaṃ lokameti'ityādivākyasya bhokturabhāvādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvita evākṛṣya bhokturvicāraḥ kṛta ityatra vṛttikāravacanaṃ liṅgamāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5035: dehātirikta ātmāsti na veti vādivipratipatteḥ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-atraika iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5036_0: yadyapi samasteṣu militeṣu bhūteṣu caitanyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ taptodakumbhasya jñānābhāvādvyasteṣu
GSP33brssgo3u:5036_1: tu nāstyeva tathāpi dehātmakabhūteṣu syāditi tebhyo bhūtebhyaścaitanyaṃ saṃbhāvayanto
GSP33brssgo3u:5037: yathā mādakadravyeṣu tāmbūlapatrādiṣu pratyekamadṛṣṭāpi madaśaktistatsaṃghātājjāyate tadvadityārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5038: nanu dehaḥ svayaṃ na cetanaḥ ghaṭavadbhautikatvāt kintu cetanaḥ kaścitsvargādibhoktāsti tatsāṃnidhyāddehasya caitanyavibhrama ityata āha-na svargeti //53//
GSP33brssgo3u:5046: yadi dehabhāve bhāvāddehadharmatvamātmadharmāṇāṃ manyeta tato dehabhāve 'pyabhāvādataddharmatvamevaiṣāṃ kiṃ na manyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5049: prāṇaceṣṭādayastu satyapi dehe mṛtāvasthāyāṃ na bavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5051: apica sati hi tāvaddehe jīvadavasthāyāmeṣāṃ bhāvaḥ śakyate niścetuṃ natvasatyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5054: kimātmakaṃ ca punaridaṃ caitanyaṃ manyate yasya bhūtebhya utpattimicchatīti paraḥ paryanuyoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5057: tarhi viṣayatvātteṣāṃ na taddharmatvamaśnuvīta svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5060: nahi bhūtabhautikadharmeṇa satā caitanyena bhūtabhautikāni viṣayīkriyeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:5064: upalabdhisvarūpa eva ca na ātmetyātmano dehavyatiriktatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5068: yattūktaṃ śarīre bhāvāccharīradharma upalabdairiti tadvarṇitena prakāreṇa pratyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5071: evaṃ sati deha upalabdhirbhavatyasati ca na bhavatīti na dehadharmau bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5073: nacātyantaṃ dehasyopalabdhāvupayogo 'pi dṛśyate niśceṣṭe 'pyasmindehe svapne nānāvidhopalabdhidarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5075_0: manuṣyo 'haṃ jānāmiti dehasya jñātṛtāyāḥ pratyakṣatvādātmadharmatvena prasiddhānāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5078: tathāca jñānādayo dehavyatiriktāśrayā dehasattve 'pyasattvādvyatirekeṇa deharūpādivadityāha-vyatireka evāsyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5080: guṇatvasākṣādvyāpyajātyavacchedena asattvasya vivakṣitatvāt dehe 'vasthite sadā rūpatvāvacchinnamastyeva /
GSP33brssgo3u:5081: jñānatvāvacchinnaṃ tu nāstīti na jñānaṃ dehadharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5083: kiñca dehavyatirike teṣāmabhāvasya saṃdigdhatvānna dehadharmatvaniścaya ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5089: dehātmakabhūtānāṃ caitanyaṃ prati viṣayatvātkartṛkarmavirodhena viṣayasya kartṛtvā yogānna bhūtakartṛkatvaṃ caitanyasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5092: yā dehātiriktā sadrūpopalabdhiḥ sa evātmā cedanityaḥ syādupalabdheranityatvādityata āha-nityatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5093: ghaṭaḥ sphurati paṭaḥ sphuratīti sarvatra sphūrterabhedānnityatvaṃ viṣayoparāganāśe tu nāśabhrama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5095: kiñca jāgratsvapnayordehabhede 'pyātmaikatvapratyabhijñānādātmabhede cānyānubhūte 'nyasya smṛtīcchānupapatteḥ svapnasmṛtyādimānātmā dehādbhinna ityāha-ahamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5101: ata eva tanvabhāve 'pi svapnavadyogināṃ bhogaṃ sūtrakṛdvakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5103: tasmāduktānumānugṛhītānmama śarīramiti bhedānubhāvādahaṃ manuṣya ityabhedajñānaṃ bhrama ityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi //54//
GSP33brssgo3u:5108: aṅgāvabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam / BBs_3,3.55 /
GSP33brssgo3u:5114_0: 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścitaḥ' ityevamādyā ya udgīthādikarmāṅgāvabaddhāḥ pratyayāḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:5118: iti hi sāmānyavihitānāṃ viśṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ saṃnikṛṣṭenaiva svaśākhāgatena viśeṣaṇākāṅkṣādinivṛtteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5126: svaśākhāvyavasthāyāṃ hyudgīthamupāsīteti sāmnyaśrutiraviśeṣapravṛttā satī saṃnidhānavaśena viśeṣe vyavasthāpyamānā pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5138: nanūdgīthādīnāṃ sarvaśākhāsvekatvādupāstayaḥ sarvatreti vedyaikyānniścaye kathaṃ saṃśaya ityata āha-pratiśākhaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5139_0: yathā dehātmanorbhedādātmadharmā dehe na saṃbhavanti tathā prativedamudgīthādīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5141: sāmānyaśruteḥ saṃnihitavyaktigrahākhyasaṃkocastatra kartavyo yatra vyaktimātragraho nopapadyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:5142: yathā śuklaṃ gāmānayetyatra gośruteḥ saṃnihitaśuklavyaktiparatayā saṃkocaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:5151: tathāhi mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ guṇānāṃ ca śākhāntarotpannānāmapi śākhāntara upasaṃgraho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5152_0: yeṣāmapi hi śākhināṃ kuṭarurasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate
GSP33brssgo3u:5152_1: kukkuṭarasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate kukkuṭo 'sītyaśmādānamādatte kudarurasīti veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5153: yeṣāmapi samidādayaḥ prayājaḍā nāmnātasteṣāmapi teṣu guṇavidhirāmnāyate - ṛtavo vai prayājāḥ samānatra hotavyāḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5154: tathā yeṣāmapi ajo 'gnīṣomīyaḥ iti jātiviśeṣopadeśo nāsti teṣāmapi tadviṣayo mantravarṇa upalabhyate - chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'nurbrūhi iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5155: tathā vedāntarotpannānāmapi 'agnerverhetraṃ veradhvaram' ityevamādimantrāṇāṃ vedāntare parigraho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5156: tathābahvṛcapaṭhitasya sūktasya yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān (ṛ.saṃ 2.6.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:5157: ityasya adhvaryave sajanīyaṃ śasyam ityatra parigraho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5159: pūrvaṃ śākhāntaravihitopāstīnāṃ śākhāntarasthāṅgasaṃbandhe yaḥ pratīto virodhastamaṅgīkṛtya saṃbandha uktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:5162: yajurvedināṃ kukkuṭo 'sīti mantro 'sti kuṭarurasīti nāsti tathāpi taṇḍulapeṣaṇārthāśmādāne mantradvayasya vikalpena viniyogātso 'pi prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5166: phsamānatratulyakarmasthale hotavyā iti pañcatvaguṇavidhānādguṇinaḥ śākhāntaravihitāḥ saṃbadhyanta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5168: yajurvedināmagnīṣomīyaḥ paśuḥ śruto nāja iti jātiviśeṣastathāpi praiṣamantraliṅgājjātiviśeṣasaṃgraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5171: tatheti 'sa janāsa indra'ityanenopalakṣitaṃ sūktaṃ sajanīyaṃ tasya yājuṣādhvaryukartṛkaprayoge śaṃsanaṃ dṛṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5172: yo jāto bāla eva prathamo guṇaiḥ śroṣṭho manasvānvivekavānsa indra evaṃvidho he jānaso janā iti śrutyarthaḥ //56//
GSP33brssgo3u:5177: bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyastvaṃ tathā hi darśayati / BBs_3,3.57 /
GSP33brssgo3u:5179: ityasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ vyastasya samastasya ca vaiśvānarasyopāsanaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5180: vyastopāsanaṃ tāvat 'aupamanyava kaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥsa iti devameva bhagavo rājanniti hovācaiṣa vai sutejā ātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥse' (chā. 5.12.1) ityādi /

GSP33brssgo3u:5560: iti caivañjātīyakā śrutiḥ samastavedārthavijñānavataḥ karmādhikāraṃ darśayati tasmādapi na vijñānasya svātantryeṇa phalahetutvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5564: guroḥ śuśrūṣārūpaṃ karma kurvannatiśeṣeṇāvaśiṣṭena kālena yathāvidhānaṃ vedamadhītyānantaramācāryasya kulādgṛhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5566: abhisamāvartanaṃ kṛtvā kuṭumbe gārhasthye sthitaḥ pratyahaṃ śucau deśe svādhyāyādhyayanaṃ kurvannanyāṃśca nityādidharmānanutiṣṭhanbrahmalokaṃ prāpnotīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5568: dṛṣṭer'thāvabodhākhye phale saṃbhavati adhyayanasyādṛṣṭārthatvāyogāditi pūrvatantre sthitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5569: tataśca brahmāpi vedārtha iti tadavabedhavataḥ karmavidhānamityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brssgo3u:5575: evaṃ tvayi nānyatheto 'sti na karma lipyate nare' (īśa. 2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5576: tathā 'etadvai jarāmaryaṃ satraṃ yadagnihotraṃ jarayā vā hyevāsmānmucyate mṛtyunā vā' ityevañjātīyakānniyamādapi karmaśeṣatvameva vidhyayā iti // 7 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5578: iha dehe karmāṇi kurvanneva śataṃ saṃvatsarāñjīvitumicchedevaṃ karmitvena jīvati tvayi nare karma pāpaṃ na lipyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5592: yadi saṃsāryevātmā śārīraḥ kartā bhoktā ca śarīramātravyatirekeṇa vedānteṣūpadiṣṭaḥ syāttato varṇitena prakāreṇa phalaśruterarthavādatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5594: naca tadvijñānaṃ karmaṇāṃ pravartakaṃ bhavati pratyuta karmāṇyucchinattīti vakṣyati 'upamardaṃ ca' (bra.sū. 3.4.16) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:5596: iti yanmataṃ bhagavato bādarāyaṇasya tattathaiva tiṣṭhati na śeṣatvaprabhṛtibhirhetvābhāsaiścālayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5597: tathāhi tamadhikaṃ śārīrādīśvaramātmānaṃ darśayanti śrutayaḥ - 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' (muṇḍa. 1.19)
GSP33brssgo3u:5603: yattu priyādisaṃsūcitasya saṃsāriṇa evātmano vedyatayānukarṣaṇam 'ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5605: 'yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ' (bṛ. 3.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:5608: iti caivamādi tadapi 'asya mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ' (bṛ. 2.4.10)
GSP33brssgo3u:5618: asya mahata iti vākyaśeṣātpriyasaṃsūcita ātmā para eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5620: tathākṣipuruṣo 'pyavasthāsākṣi parañjyotiriti vākyaśeṣātpara iti vibhāgaḥ jīvānukarṣaṇamabhedābhiprāyamityaṅgīkāre na virodha iti katham,
GSP33brssgo3u:5622: jñānaṃ karmāṅgamaphalatve sati karmaśeṣāśrayatvādityukto heturasiddha iti bhāvaḥ //8//
GSP33brssgo3u:5629: tathāhi śrutirbhavati - 'etadvā sma vai tadvidvāṃsa āhurṛṣayaḥ kāvaṣeyāḥ kimarthā vayamadhyeṣyāmahe kimarthāvayaṃ yakṣyāmahe /
GSP33brssgo3u:5630_0: etaddha sma vai tatpūrve vidvāṃso 'gnihotraṃ na juhavāñcakrire' 'etaṃ vai tamātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5630_1: viditvā brāhmaṇāḥ putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇayāśca lokaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5632: yājñavalkyādīnāmapi brahmavidāmarmaniṣṭhatvaṃ dṛśyate - 'etāvadare khalvamṛtatvamiti hoktvā yājñavalkyo vijahāra' (bṛ. 4.5.15)
GSP33brssgo3u:5646: brahmavidāṃ karmavatsaṃnyāsasyāpi darśanātteṣāṃ karmadarśanātmakaṃ liṅgaṃ lokasaṃgrahārthatvenānyathāsiddhamityāha-tulyaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5647: kiñca yasya karma sa na brahmavidityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5649: brahmavidāṃ lokasaṃgrahārthaṃ kriyamāṇamapi karma na bhavati abhimānābhāvenānadhikāritvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:5659: yathā śatamābhyāṃ dīyatāmityukte vibhajya dīyate pañcāśadekasmai pañcāśadaparasmai tadvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:5664: tatra saṃsāriviṣaye vidyā vihitā pratiṣiddhā ca parigṛhyate viśeṣābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5667: samanvārambhavacanasya mumukṣuviṣayatvamaṅgīkṛtya vidyā anyaṃ mumukṣuṃ muktatvenānvārabhata iti vibhāga uktaḥ sūtrakṛtāḥ vastutastu tannāstītyāha-nacedaṃ samanvārambhavacanamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5668: tatra saṃsāriviṣaye taṃ vidyetyādivākye yathāprāptānuvādini vidyādipadārthamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5680_0: na vayamadhyayanaprabhavaṃ karmāvabodhanamadhikārakāraṇaṃ vārayāmaḥ kiṃ tarhyeniṣadamātmajñānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5680_1: svātantryeṇaiva prayojanavatpratīyamānaṃ na karmādhikārakāraṇatāṃ pratipadyata ityetāvatpratipādayāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5681: yathāca na kratvantarajñānaṃ kratvantarādhikāreṇāpekṣyata evametadapi draṣṭavyamiti // 12 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5686: ityelamādiṣu niyamaśravaṇeṣu na viduṣa iti viśeṣo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5690: mātrapadamātmajñānasya vyāvartakaṃ na karmajñānasyetyāha-naiṣa doṣa iti //
GSP33brssgo3u:5697: ityatrāparo viśeṣa ākhyāyate yadyapyatra prakaraṇasāmarthyādvidvāneva kurvanniti saṃbadhyate tathāpi vidyāstutaye karmānujñānametaddraṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5701: yāvajjīvaṃ karma kurvatyapi viduṣi puruṣe hi vakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5703: yāvajjīvaṃ karma kurvatyapi viduṣupuruṣe na karma lepāya bhavati vidyāsāmarthyāditi tadevaṃ vidyā stūyate // 14 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5705: evaṃ karma kurvityapi tvayi nare neto vidyālabdhādbrahmabhāvādanyathāsti karmaṇā saṃsāro nāstīti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:5712: apicaike vidvāṃsaḥ pratyakṣīkṛtavidyāphalāḥ santastadavaṣṭabhyātphalāntarasādhaneṣu prajādiṣu prayojanābhāvaṃ parāmṛśanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5713: kāmakāreṇeti śrutirbhavati vājasaneyinām 'etaddha sma vai tatpūrve vidvāṃsaḥ prajāṃ na kāmayante kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssgo3u:5715: ato 'pi na vidyāyāḥ karmaśeṣatvaṃ nāpi tadviṣayāyāḥ phalaśruterayathārthatvaṃ śakyamāśrayitum // 15 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5717: tadetadbrahma yeṣāṃ no 'smākaṃ ayamaparokṣa ātmā ayameva lokaḥ puruṣārthaste vayaṃ kiṃ prajādinā kariṣyāma ityālocya karma tyaktavanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5718: nanvayaṃ loka iti jñānaphalasya pratyakṣatvoktirayuktā karmaphalavadadṛṣṭatvādityata āha-anubhaveti //15//
GSP33brssgo3u:5724: vedāntoditātmajñānapūrvikāṃ tu karmādhikārasiddhiṃ pratyāśāsanasya karmādhikārocchittireva prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5726: na kevalamanupayogājjñānasya karmānaṅgatvaṃ kintu karmanāśakatvāccetyāha-upamardaṃ ceti //16//
GSP33brssgo3u:5736: ūrdhvaretasa āśramā na śrūyante veda iti tadapi nāsti /

GSP33brssgo3u:5747: 'brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyo yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhya eva vā anṛṇaḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5749: anapākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu sevamāno vrajatyadhaḥ'iti smṛteśca prāptagārhasthyasyaiva nirastarṇatrayasya pārivrājyamityapi śaṅkā na kāryā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5758: ityādayo ye śabdā ūrdhvaretasāmāśramāṇāṃ sadbhāvāyodāhṛtā na te tatpratipādanāya prabhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5759: yataḥ parāmarśameṣu śabdeṣvāśramāntarāṇāṃ jaiminirācāryo manyate na vidim /

GSP33brssgo3u:5768: nanu gārhasthyamapi sahaivordhvaretobhiḥ parāmṛṣṭaṃ yajño 'dhyayanaṃ dānamiti prathama iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5769: satyamevaṃ tathāpi tu gṛhasthaṃ pratyevāgnihotrādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ vidhānācchrutiprasiddhameva hi tadastitvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5771: apicāpavadati hi pratyakṣā śrutirāśramāntar 'vīrahā vā eṣa devānāṃ yo 'gnimudvāsayate',
GSP33brssgo3u:5781: nanu brahmacaryādeva pravrajeditivispaṣṭamidaṃ pratyakṣaṃ privrājyavidhānaṃ jābālānām /
GSP33brssgo3u:5783: anapekṣya tvetāṃ śrutimayaṃ vicāra iti draṣṭavyam // 18 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5785: ūrdhvaretaḥ śabditaṃ pārivrājyamanuṣṭheyaṃ na veti mānabhrāntimūlatvābhyāṃ saṃdehe bhrāntimūlatvānnānuṣṭheyamityāha-traya iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5790: yastu vedasya grahaṇāntaṃ brahmacaryaṃ carati sa brāhmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5794: gṛhastho 'pi caturvidhaḥ vārtāko yāyāvaraḥ śālīno ghorasaṃnyasikaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5798: uddhṛtaparipūtābhiradbhiḥ kāryaṃ kurvanpratyahaṃ kṛtoñchavṛttirgrāmavāsī ghorasaṃnyasika ityucyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:5800: vānaprastho 'pi caturvidhaḥ vaikhānasa audumbaro vālakhilyaḥ phenapaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5802: yastu prātaruthāya yāṃ diśaṃ paśyati tatratyaudumbarabadarīnīvāraśyāmākaiḥ karmaparaḥ sa audumbaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5803: yastu jaṭāvalkaladhārī aṣṭau prātasānvṛttyupārjanaṃ kṛtvā cāturmāsye saṃgṛhītāśī kārtikyāṃ saṃgṛhītapuṣpaphalatyāgī sa vālakhilyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5804: phenapāstu śīrṇaparṇaphalavṛttayo yatra kvacidvasantaḥ karmaparā iti /

GSP33brssgo3u:5807: bahūdakāstu tridaṇḍinaḥ śikyajalapavitrapādukāsanaśikhāyajñopavītakaupīnakāṣāyaveṣadhārāstīrthānyaṭanto bhaikṣaṃ caranta ātmānaṃ prārthayante /

GSP33brssgo3u:5809: paramahaṃsāstvekadaṇḍadharā muṇḍā ayajñopavītinaḥ tyaktasarvakarmāṇa ātmaniṣṭhā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5810: atra pūrvapakṣe saṃnyāsābhāvāñjñānasya svatantraphalatvāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tadbhāvāttatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5811: skandhā āśramāḥ ātmānaṃ śarīramācāryasya kule gṛhe karśayannaiṣṭhika ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:5852: tatra yajñādiliṅgo gṛhāśrama eko dharmaskandho nirdiṣṭo brahmacārīti ca spaṣṭa āśramanirdeśastapaityapi ko 'nyastapaḥpradhānādāśramāddharmaskandho 'bhyupagamyeta /

GSP33brssgo3u:5860: mānuṣakriyāsu dehārdhavastrabandhanākhyanivītasya saukaryārtatayā prāptatvāt pitrye karmaṇi prācīnāvītasyāpi vidhyantaraprāptatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5875: nanu vidhitvābhyupagama ekavākyatāpratītiruparudhyeta pratīyate cātraikavākyatā puṇyalokaphalāstrayo dharmaskandhā brahmasaṃsthātā tvamṛtatvaphaleti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5881: yathā 'adhastatsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo dhārayati' ityatra satyāmapyavirodhodhāraṇainaikavākyatāpratītau vidhīyata evoparidhāraṇamapūrvatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5884: yadāpi parāmarśa evāyamāśramāntarāṇāṃ tadapi brahmasaṃsthatā tāvatsaṃstavasāmarthyādavaśyaṃ vidheyābhyupagantavyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5885: sā ca kiṃ caturṣvāśrameṣu yasya kasyacidāhosvitparivrājakasyaiveti vivektavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5886_0: yadi ca brahmācāryanteṣvāśrameṣu parāmṛśyamāneṣu parivrājako 'pi parāmṛṣṭastaścaturṇāmapyāśramāṇāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5887: atha na parāmṛṣṭastataḥ pariśiṣyamāṇaḥ parivrāḍeva brahmasaṃstha iti saṃtsyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5890: nahi satyāṃ gatau vānaprasthaviśeṣaṇena parivrājako grahaṇamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5891: yathātra brahmacārigṛhamedhināvasādāraṇenaiva svena svena viśeṣaṇena viśeṣitāvevaṃ bhikṣuvaikhānasāvapīti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5895: catuṣṭhvena ca prasiddhā āśramāstritvena parāmṛśyanta ityanyāyyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5896: apica bhedavyapadeśo 'tra bhavati 'traya ete puṇyalokabhāja eko 'mṛtatvabhāk' iti /

GSP33brssgo3u:5900: tasmātpūrvo traya āśramiṇaḥ puṇyalokabhājaḥ pariśiṣyamāṇaḥ parivrāḍevāmṛtatvabhāk /
GSP33brssgo3u:5901: kathaṃ punarbrahmasaṃsthaśabdo yogātpravartamānaḥ sarvatra saṃbhavanparivrājaka evāvatiṣṭheta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5903: atrocyate - brahmasaṃstha iti hi brahmaṇi parisamptirananyavyāpāratārūpaṃ tanniṣṭhatvamabhidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5907: śamadamādistu tadīyo dharmo brahmasaṃsthatāyā upodbalako na virodhī /
GSP33brssgo3u:5908_0: brahmaniṣṭhatvameva hi tasya śamadamādyupabṛṃhitaṃ svāśramavihitaṃ karma yajñādīni
GSP33brssgo3u:5908_1: cetareṣāṃ tadvyatikrame ca tasya pratyavāyaḥ tathāca 'nyāsa iti brahmā brahmā hi
GSP33brssgo3u:5908_2: paraḥ paro hi brahma tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayat' (nārā. 78)
GSP33brssgo3u:5917: 'brahmacaryaṃ parisampya gṛhī bhavedgṛhī bhūtvā vanībhavedvanī bhūtvā pravrajet /

GSP33brssgo3u:5921: pṛthagnidhānāccānadhikṛtānāma 'atha punareva vratī vāvratī vā snātako vāsnātako votsannāgniranagniko vā' (jābā. 4) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5923: tacca darśayati - 'atha parivrāḍvivarṇavāsā muṇḍo 'parigrahaḥ śuciradrohī bhaikṣāṇo brahmabhūyāya bhavati' (jābā. 5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5927: idānīṃ vidhitvaṃ tasyā eva kalpyaṃ lāghavādityāha-vidhirveti /

GSP33brssgo3u:5934_2: hītyasyaikavākyatvabhāne 'pi daive home srugdaṇḍopari samiddhāraṇe vidhirevāpūrvatvāditi
GSP33brssgo3u:5935: evaṃ catvāra āśramā vidhīyanta iti pakṣa uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5938: nanu traya iti vākya āśramacatuṣṭayasyāprāpternirbījo 'yaṃ vicāra ityāśaṅkya tadvākye parivrājakaḥ parāmṛṣṭo na veti saṃdihyādye pūrvapakṣaprāptimāha-yadiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5939: nanvanāśramyeva brahmasaṃsthaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-anāśramitveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5943: vanasthasya hyasādhāraṇaṃ kṛcchrādikaṃ tapa iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:5946: sa ca stutisāmarthyāt saha brahmasaṃsthayā vidhīyata iti siddhāntayati-tadayuktamityādinā /

GSP33brssgo3u:6246: jalapānaṃ tu svecchātastaḍāgādau labhyata iti māṣān khāditvāvaśiṣṭāñjāyāyai dattavān /

GSP33brssgo3u:6248: sa ca tān khāditvā rājño yajñaṃ gatvā prastotrādīnākṣipya prāṇādikāṃ prāstāvādidevatāmupadīśya dhanaṃ prāpya sthita iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6249: atrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇajalatyāgātmakaśiṣṭācāraliṅgācchrautādanāpadi viduṣāpyabhakṣyaṃ na bhakṣaṇīyamiti sūcyata iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:6256: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6262: surāpānenāpi jīvanamāśaṅkya kadāpi tanna kāryamityāha-tathā madyaṃ nityaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6271: śabdaścānannasya pratiṣedhakaḥ kāmakāranivṛttiprayojanaḥ kāṭhakānāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ śrūyate - 'tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibet' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6276: kāmakāro yatheṣṭapravṛttiḥ so 'pi niṣedho 'pi upapannataro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6278: yadyayamapi vidhiḥ syāttarhi vihitapratiṣiddhatvātṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavatsurāpāne vikalpaḥ syātsa ca sarvasmṛtibhiḥ śiṣṭācāreṇa ca viruddha iti tātparyārthaḥ //31//
GSP33brssgo3u:6286: idānīṃ tu kimamumukṣorapyaśramamātraniṣṭhasya vidyāmakāmamayamānasya tānyanuṣṭheyānyutāho neti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6288: ityādināśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyāsādhanatvena vihitatvādvidyāmanicchataḥ phalāntaraṃ kāmayamānasya nityanyananuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:6289: atha tasyāpyanuṣṭheyāni na tarhyeṣāṃ vidyāsādhanatvaṃ nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6290: asyāṃ prāptau paṭhati - 'āśramamātraniṣṭhasyāpyamumukṣoḥ kartavyanyeva nityāni karmāṇi yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhoti' ityādinā vihitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6295: tasyā anityatvādyāvajjīvādividhinā tu nityatvaṃ ceti viruddhadharmadvayāpātādvividiṣāśruteḥ stutitvamiti phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe /
GSP33brssgo3u:6300: atha yaduktaṃ naivaṃ sati vidyāsādhanatveṣāṃ syādityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -
GSP33brssgo3u:6302: vidyāsahakārīṇi caitāni syurvihitatvādeva 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti' (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6307: vidhilakṣaṇaṃ hi sādhanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsādi svargaphalasiṣādhayiṣayā sahakārisādhanāntaramapekṣate naivaṃ vidyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6312: nitye hyekaḥ saṃyogo yāvajjīvādivākyakalpito na tasya vidyāphalatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6315: yathaikasyāpi khādiratvasya nityena saṃyogena kratvarthatvamanityena saṃyogena puruṣārthatvaṃ tadvat // 33 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6316: saha militvā śuddhidvārā vidyāṃ kurvantīti sahakārīṇi karmāṇi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6320: ato vihitāni karmāṇi avihitāyā na sahakāryaṅgāni mokṣasyāsādhyatvācca na karmāṇāṃ sahakāritvasaṃbhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6322: kāmanāyā anityatve 'pi karmaṇāṃ nānityatvaṃ nityavidhinā prayogasya nityatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6325: yathā 'khādiro yūpo bhavati'iti śrutyā khādiratvasya kratvarthatā khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti śrutyā puruṣārthatā ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6326: ataḥ sati vākyadvaye viniyuktaviniyogo na virudhyata ityarthaḥ //33//
GSP33brssgo3u:6331: sarvathāpyāśramakarmapakṣe vidyāsahakāritvapakṣe ca ta evāgnihotrādayo dharmā anuṣṭoyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6334: yathā kuṇḍapāyināmayane 'māsamagnihotraṃ jihoti' ityatra nityādagnihotrātkarmāntaramupadiśyate naivamiha karmabhedo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6338: iti siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuṅ kte natu juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6339: smṛtiliṅgamapi 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ' (6.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:6341: yasyaite 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśatsaṃskārā ityādyā ca saṃskāratvaprasiddhirvaidikeṣu karmasu tatsaṃskṛtasya vidyotpattimabhipretya smṛtau bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6343: nanu nityāgnihotrādibhyo bhinnā evāpūyarvajñādayo vividiṣāyāṃ viniyujyantāṃ tatra kuto viniyuktaviniyogastatrāha-sarvathāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6346: siddhakarmasu saṃskāratvaprasiddhirapi śuddhākhyasaṃskāradvārā jñānārthakakarmābhede liṅgamityāha-yasyaita iti //34//
GSP33brssgo3u:6351_1: rāgadibhiḥ kleśaiḥ 'eṣa hyātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate' (chā. 8.5.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6352: tasmādyajñādīnyāśramakarmāṇi ca bhavanti vidyāsahakārīṇi ceti niścitam // 35 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6359: vidhurādīnāṃ dravyādisaṃpadrahitānāṃ cānyatamāśramapratipattihīnānāmantarālavartināṃ kiṃ vidyāyāmadhikāro 'sti kiṃvā nāstīti saṃśaye nāstīti tāvatprāptam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6361: evaṃ prāpta idamāha - antarā cāpi tvanāśramitvena vartamāno 'pi vidyāyāmadhikriyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6367: anāśramiṇāṃ japādikarmasattvānninditatvācca saṃśaye sati āśramakarmaṇāmeva vidyāhetutvaśruteranāśramasya ninditatvāccānadhikāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6374: nanu liṅgamidaṃ śrutismṛtidarśanamipanyastaṃ kā nu khalu prāptiriti sābhidhīyate -
GSP33brssgo3u:6377: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'japyenaiva tu saṃsiddhyedbrāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6378: kuryādantra vā kuryānmantro brāhmaṇa ucyate' ityasaṃbhavadāśramakarmāṇo 'pi japye 'dhikāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6384: raikvādīnāṃ vidyāvattvaliṅgasya janmāntarāśramakarmaṇānyathāsiddheranāśramakarmaṇo vidyārthatvaprāpakaṃ mānāntaraṃ vācyamiti śaṅkate-nanu liṅgamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6387: nanvanāśramiṇāṃ karma bhavatu vidyāhetustathāpi teṣāṃ na śravaṇādāvadhikāraḥ saṃnyāsābhāvādityata āha-dṛṣṭārthā ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6389: saṃnyāso 'pi kadācitkṛto jñāna upakaroti śravaṇaṃ pratyanaṅgatvāditi bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brssgo3u:6393: atas tv itarajjyāyo liṅgāc ca / BBs_3,4.39 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6398: saṃvatsaramanāśramī sthitvā kṛcchramekaṃ caret' iti ca smṛtiliṅgāt // 39 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6401: atra puṇyakṛttvaliṅgādāśramitvaṃ jyāyaḥ puṇyopacaye śīghraṃ vidyālābhādanāśramasya ninditatvācceti bhāvaḥ //39//
GSP33brssgo3u:6406: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ / BBs_3,4.40 /

GSP33brssgo3u:6409: pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā vā rāgādivaśena vā pracyuto 'pi syādviśeṣābhāvāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6410: evaṃ prāpta ucyate - tadbhūtasya tu pratipannordhvaretobhāvasya na kathañcidapyatadbhāvo na tataḥ pracyutiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6413: iti 'araṇyamiyāditi padaṃ tato na punareyādityupaniṣat' iti 'ācāryeṇābhyanujñātaścaturṇāmekamāśramam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6414: ā vimokṣāccharīrasya so 'nutiṣṭhedyathāvidi' iti caivañjātīyake niyamaḥ pracyutyaprabhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6419: yattu pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā pratyavarohaṇamiti tadasat 'śreyānsvadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmātsvanuṣṭhitāt' (3.35)
GSP33brssgo3u:6422: yo hi yaṃ prati vidhīyate sa tasya dharmo natu yo yena svanuṣṭhātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6428: uttamāśramātpūrvāśramaṃ prāptasya pracyutasya karmāpi vidyāheturanāśramikarmavaditi saṃgatiḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:6430: siddhānte tu bhraṣṭasya karma na heturiti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6431: rāgādiprābalyātpracyutiniṣedhācca pracyutiḥ prāmāṇikī na veti saṃśayamāhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6435: tadiyādgacchediti padaṃ śāstramārgastatastasmātpārivrājyānna punareyānna pracyavediti uniṣadrahasyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6438: 'caṇḍālāḥ pratyavasitāḥ'iti smṛteśca patitānāṃ karma niṣphalamiti bhāvaḥ //40//
GSP33brssgo3u:6443: na cādhikārikam api patanānumānāt tadayogāt / BBs_3,4.41 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6444: yadi naiṣṭhiko brahmacārī pramādādavakīryeta kiṃ tasya 'brahmacaryāvakīrṇī nairṛtaṃ gardabhamālabhet' ityetatprāyaścittaṃ syāduta neti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6448: kiṃ kāraṇam - 'ārūḍho naiṣṭhikaṃ dharmaṃ yastu pracyavate pinaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6449: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śuddhyetsa ātmahā' ityapratisamādheyapatanasmaraṇācchinnaśirasa iva pratikriyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6454: atra pracyutasya prāyaścittaṃ syānnaveti upapātakatvātpatanasmṛteśca saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6455: pracyutasya yajñādikaṃ niṣphalamityuktaṃ tadvatprāyaścittamāpi niṣphalamiti pūrvapakṣayati-netyucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6456: atra kṛtaprāyaścittasya karma jñānaheturna bhavatīti phalaṃ siddhānte tu bhavatītidaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6458_1: brahmacāriṇaḥ prāyaścittapaśurgardabho laukikāgnau hotavya ityadhikāralakṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhādhyāye
GSP33brssgo3u:6458_2: nirṇītaṃ prāyaścittamādhikārikaṃ tadupakurvāṇasyaiva na naiṣṭhikasyeti prāpte siddhāntayati //41 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6462: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam / BBs_3,4.42 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6464: yannaiṣṭhikasya gurudārādibhyo 'nyatra brahmacaryaṃ viśīryeta na tanmahāpātakaṃ bhavati gurutalpādiṣu mahāpātakeṣvaparigaṇanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6468: ye hi prāyaścittasyābhāvamicchanti teṣāṃ na mūlamupalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6469: ye tu bhāvamicchanti teṣāṃ brahmacāryavakīrṇetyadaviśeṣaśravaṇaṃ mūlam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6474_0: evaṃ bhikṣuvaikhānasayorapi vānaprastho dīkṣābhede kṛcchraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ caritvā
GSP33brssgo3u:6477: 'prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi'iti darśanābhāvasmṛteḥ prāyaścittābhāvāparatvaṃ kalpayitvā tanmūlaśrutikalpanātprāgeva kḷptasādhāraṇaśrutyā prāyaścittasadbhāvasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6479: prāyaścittasya bhāvābhāvasiddhyoḥ samatve 'pi bhāvaprasiddhiḥ śrutimūlatvādādartavyetyatra saṃmatimāha-taduktamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6481: ataḥ kasya caruḥ kārya iti saṃdehe vṛddhaprayogasāmyātsamā tulyā vikalpena pratipattiḥ syāditi prāpte siddhāntaḥ-śāstramūlā pratipattirgrāhyā śāstranimittatvāddharmādijñānasya /
GSP33brssgo3u:6485: brahmacaryarakṣārthaṃ yatnādhikyaṃ kāryamiti jñāpanārthaṃ prāyaścittaṃ spaṣṭamapi na paśyāmītyuktaṃ bhagavadatriṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6487: kṛcchraṃ prājāpatyaṃ mahākakṣaṃ bahutṛṇakāṣṭhadeśaṃ jaladānādinā vardhayeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:6503: bahis tūbhayathāpi smṛter ācārāc ca / BBs_3,4.43 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6504: yadūrdhvaretasāṃ svaśramebhyaḥ pracyavanaṃ mahāpātakaṃ yadi vopapātakamubhayathāpi śiṣṭhaiste bahirkartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6506: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śudhyetsa ātmahā' iti 'ārūḍhapatitaṃ vipraṃ maṇḍalācca viniḥsṛtam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6507: udbaddhaṃ kṛmidaṣṭaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret' iti caivamādinindātiśayasmṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6511_0: kṛtaprāyaścittaistaiḥ saha kṛtaśravaṇādikaṃ jñānasādhanaṃ na veti saṃdehe teṣāṃ śuddhatvātsādhanamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:6511_1: prāpte prāyaścittātparaloke teṣāṃ śuddhatve 'pyatra śuddhabhāvānna sādhanamiti siddhāntayati-yadyūrdhveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6522: phalaṃ hi śrūyate - 'varṣati hāsmai varṣayati ha ya etadevaṃ vidvānvṛṣṭau pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste' (chā. 2.3.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6526: phalaṃ ca kartaryupāsanānāṃ śrūyate - 'varṣatyasmai ya upāste' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6527: nanvṛtvijo 'pi phalaṃ dṛṣṭam 'ātmane vā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tamāgāyati' (bṛ. 1.3.28) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6530: tasmātsvāmina eva phalavatsūpāsaneṣu kartṛtvamityātreya ācāryo manyate // 44 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6533_0: yaḥ kṛtaprāyaścittaḥ sa saṃvyavahārya ityutsargasya nindātiśayasmṛtyā naiṣṭhikādiṣu
GSP33brssgo3u:6533_1: bādhavadyo yadaṅgakartā sa tadāśritasya kartetyutsargasya kartuḥ phalaśrutyā bādha
GSP33brssgo3u:6534_0: atra kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoraikādhikaraṇyaṃ phalaṃ siddhānte tvaṅgāśritā ṛtvikkartṛkā
GSP33brssgo3u:6534_1: apyupāstayo yajamānagāmisvatantraphalāḥ kimu vācyaṃ svaniṣṭhabrahmavidyāyāḥ svātantryamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:6535: ataḥ pādasaṃgatiḥ hiṅkāraprastāvodgīthapratihāranidhanākhyapañcaprakāre sāmni vṛṣṭidhyāturvarṣasamṛddhiḥ phalamiti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6536: śrutaṃ phalaṃ ṛtviggataṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-tacceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6538: astu tasya phalaṃ tadgataṃ kartātvanyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-phalaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6546: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6553: tathāca 'taṃ ha bako dālbhyo vidāñcakāra sa ha naimiśīyānāmudgātā babhūva (chā. 1.2.13)
GSP33brssgo3u:6559: yāṃ vai kāñcana yajña ṛtvija āśiṣamāśāsata iti yajamānāyaiva tāmāśāsata iti hovāceti tasmādu haivaṃvidudgātā brūyātkaṃ te kāmamāgāyāni (chā. 1.7.8 - 9) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6563: tamudgīthākhyaṃ praṇavaṃ prāṇadṛṣṭyā dhyātavāndhyātvā ca naimiśīyānāṃ satriṇāmudgātāsīdityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6564: yajamānena svagāmiphalakasāṅgaprayogakaraṇāyartvijāṃ krītatvātkartṛtve 'pi na tatphalabhāktvamutsargasya bādhakābhāvādityuktatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6565: krayaṇadvārā kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ copapadyate bhṛtyakartṛke yuddhe rājā yudhyate jayati cetivaditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:6571: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.47 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6572: 'tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca monaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇaḥ' (bṛ. 3.5.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:6574: tatra saṃśayaḥ maunaṃ vidīyate na veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6577: nahyatha munirityatra vidāyakā vibhaktirupalabhyate tasmādayamanuvādo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6580: apicāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa ityatra tāvanna brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidhīyate prāgeva prāptatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6581: tasmādatha brāhmaṇa iti praśaṃsāvadastathaivātha munirityapi bhavitumarhati samānanirdeṣatvāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6590: nanu muniśabda uttamāśramavacano 'pi śrūyate 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham' ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:6593: itarāśramasaṃnidhānāttu pāriśeṣyāttatrottamāśramopādānaṃ jñānapradhānatvādutmāśramasyaṣa tasmādbālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6594: yattu bālya eva vidheḥ paryavasānamiti tathāpyapūrvatvānmunitvasya vidheyatvāmāśrīyate muniḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6598: tadadhikārāt 'ātmānaṃ viditvā putrādyeṣaṇābhyo vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6599: nanu sati vidyāvattve prāpnotyeva tatrātiśayaḥ kiṃ monavidhinetyata āha - pakṣeṇeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6603: yathā - 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta' ityevañjātīyake vidhyādau sahakāritvenāgnyanbādhānādikamaṅgajātaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6606_0: yasmātpūrve brāhmaṇā ātmānaṃ viditvā saṃnyasya bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti tasmādadyatano
GSP33brssgo3u:6606_1: 'pi brāhmaṇa āpātajñānarūpapaṇḍāvānpaṇḍitastasya kṛtyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ śravaṇaṃ tannirvidya
GSP33brssgo3u:6606_2: niścayena labdhvā bālyena śravaṇajajñānasya balabhāvena mananenāsaṃbhāvanānirāsena
GSP33brssgo3u:6606_3: bālasya bhāvena vā śuddhacittatvena sthātumicchedevaṃ mananaśravaṇe kṛtvādānantaraṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:6606_4: munirnididhyāsanakṛtsyādevamamaunaṃ ca maunādanyadbālyapāṇḍityadvayaṃ maunaṃ ca nididhyāsanaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:6606_5: labdhvā atha jñānasāmagrīpauṣkalyānantaraṃ brahmāhamiti sākṣātkāravān brāhmaṇo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6607: maunaśabdasya siddharūpe pārivrājye anuṣṭheye ca dhyāne prayogātsaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6608: yathā taṃ ha baka ityādivākyaśeṣādudgīthādyupāsanasyārtvijyatvanirṇayastadvadatha brāhmaṇa iti vidhihīnavākyaśeṣānmaunasyāpyavidheyatvaniścaya iti pūrvapakṣamāha-na vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6610: yadi maunaṃ pārivrājyaṃ tadā vākyāntaraprāptamanūdyate bālyavidhipraśaṃsārtham /
GSP33brssgo3u:6616: kiñcāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyeti śravaṇamananavadanuṣṭheyatvoktermaunasya vidheyatetyāha-nirvedanīyatveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6621: sūkṣmārthasākṣātkārasādhanatvena dhyānādeḥ ṣaḍjādau lokataḥ prāptiṃ śaṅkitvā niyamavidhimāha-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6622: nanu brahmavidyāpare vākye kathaṃ jñānāṅgamiti cetsaphalakratuparavākye 'ṅgavidhivadityāha-vidhyādivaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6624: tatra pradhānaḥ kraturvidhyādirata evāṅgaṃ vidhyanta ityucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6630: evaṃ bālyādiviśiṣṭe kaivalyāśrame śrutimati vidyamāne kasmācchāndogye gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ 'abhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe' (chā. 8.15.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:6636: bahulāyāsāni hi bahūnyāśramakarmāṇi yajñādīni taṃ prati kartavyatayopadiṣṭānyāśramāntarakarmāṇi ca yathāsaṃbhavamahiṃsendriyasaṃyamādīni tasya vidyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:6638: samāvartanānantaraṃ kuṭumbe sthito brahmalokaṃ prāpnoti naca punarāvartata ityupasaṃhārātsaṃnyāso nāstīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6644: yathā maunaṃ gārhasthyaṃ caitāvāśramau śrutimantāvevamitarāvapi vānaprasthagurukulavāsau /
GSP33brssgo3u:6645: darśitā hi purastācchrutiḥ- 'tapaḥ eva dvitīyo brahmacaryācāryakulavāsī tṛtīyaḥ' (chā. 2.23.1) ityādyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6660_0: tatra bālasya bhāvaḥ karma vā bālyamitiraddhite sati bālabhāvasya vayoviśeṣasyecchāyā
GSP33brssgo3u:6661: kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ kāmacāravādabhakṣaṇatā yathopapādamūtrapurīṣatvaṃ ca prasiddhataraṃ loke bālyamiti tadgrahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6668: aviruddhe hyanyasminbālyaśabdābhilapye labhyamāne na vidhyantaravyāghātakalpanā yuktā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6677: tathācoktaṃ smṛtikāraiḥ - 'yaṃ na santaṃ na cāsantaṃ nāśrutaṃ na bahuśrutam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6678: na suvṛttaṃ na durvṛttaṃ veda kaścitsa brāhmaṇaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:6683: tatra bālye viṣaye taddhitasya bhāvārthatvāsaṃbhavātkarmārthatvaṃ gṛhītvā tiṣṭhanmūtratvādikarmaṇo 'prarūḍhendriyatvādirūpabhāvaśuddheśca bālakarmatvāviśeṣātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6684: pūrvapakṣe vidyāṅgatvena tiṣṭhanmūtratvāderapyanuṣṭhānaṃ siddhānte bhāvaśuddhereveti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6685: pūrvatra maunaśabdasya jñānātiśaye dhyāne prasiddhatvāt dhyānaṃ vidheyamityuktam,
GSP33brssgo3u:6688: yathopapādaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ mūtrādi yasya tadbhāvastattvaṃ bālyavidhibalātpātityaśāstramanyaviṣayamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6690: na sa tatpadamāpnoti saṃsāraṃ cādhigacchati'ityādi śaucabhikṣādiniyamavidhiśāstrāviruddhasya bhāvaśuddhākhyabālyasya vidhisaṃbhavānna yatheṣṭaceṣṭāvidhiriti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6700: tatphalaṃ vidyā siddhyantī kimihaiva janmani siddhyatyuta kadācidamutrāpīti cnavtyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6705: naca kaścidamutra me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdhāya śravaṇādiṣu pravartate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6706: samāna eva tu janmani vidyājanmābhisaṃdhāyaiteṣu pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6709: evaṃ prāpte vadāmaḥ - aihikaṃ vidyājanma bhavatyasati prastutapratibandha iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6710: etadapaktaṃ bhavati - yadā prakrāntasya vidyāsādhanasya kaścitpratibandho na kriyata upasthitavipākena karmāntareṇa tadehaiva vidyotpadyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:6711: yadā tu khalu tatpratibandhaḥ kriyate tadāmutreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6713: yāni cākasya karmaṇo vipācakāni deśakālanimittāni tānyevānyasyāpīti na niyantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6715: śāstramapyasya karmaṇa idaṃ phalaṃ bhavatītyetāvati paryavasitaṃ na deśakālanimittaviśeṣamapi saṃkārtayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6717: nacāviśeṣeṇa vidyāyāmabhisaṃdhirnotpadyata ihāmutra vā me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdherniraṅ kuśatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6719: tathācaśrutirdurbodhatvamātmano darśayati - 'śravaṇāyāpi bahubhiryo na labhyaḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6720: āścaryo 'sya vaktā kuśalo 'sya labdhāścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ' (ka. 2.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6721: garbhasya eva ca vāmadevaḥ pratipede brahmabhāvamiti vadantī janmāntarasaṃcitātsādhanājjanmāntare vidyotpattiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6723: samṛtāvapi - 'aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati' (gī. 6.36)
GSP33brssgo3u:6724: ityarjunena pṛṣṭo bhagavānvāsudevaḥ 'nahi kalyāṇakṛtkaściddurgatiṃ tāta gacchati' (gī. 6.40)
GSP33brssgo3u:6725: ityuktvā punastasya puṇyalokaprāptiṃ sādhukule saṃbūtiṃ cābhidhāyānantaram 'tatra taṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadehikam' (gī.
GSP33brssgo3u:6729: aihikamapi saṃnyāsādibālyāntaṃ sādhanajātamuktvā tatsādhyavidyājanma vicāryata iti saṃgatiṃ vadan sādhanasya dvidhā phalasaṃbhavātsaṃśayamāha-sarvetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6732: śuddhidvārā yajñādibhiḥ śravaṇādiṣu sākṣādvidyāhetuṣu ghaṭiteṣu vidyāvilambo na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6733: dṛśyate ca vilambaḥ ataḥ śravaṇādervidyāhetutvamasiddhamiti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6734: pratibandhakavaśādvilambe 'pi hetutvasiddhiriti siddhānte phalaṃ matvā citrādivadaniyataphalaṃ śravaṇādikamiti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6735: nanu prārabdhakarmaviśeṣeṇa śravaṇādiphalapratibandhaḥ kimiti kriyate śravaṇādinaiva karmavipākapratibandhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-upasthitavipākatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6742: tathāpi karmaṇaiva śravaṇādipratibandho na vaiparītyamityatra ko hetustamāha-sādhaneti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6755: yathā mumukṣorvidyāsādhanāvalambinaḥ sādhanavīryaviśeṣādvidyalakṣaṇe phala aihikāmuṣmikaphalatvakṛto viśeṣapratiniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6758: na khalu muktiphale kaścidevaṃbhūto viśeṣapratiniyama āśaṅkitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6770: apica vidyāsādhanaṃ svavīryaviśeṣāsvaphala eva vidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamāsañjayenna vidyāphale muktau /
GSP33brssgo3u:6772: naca tasyāmapyutkarṣanikarṣātmako 'tiśaya upapadyate nikṛṣṭāyā vidyātvābhāvādutkṛṣṭaiva hi vidyā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6778: ityādyāsu guṇāvāpodvāpavaśādbhedopapattau satyāmupapadyate yathāsvaṃ phalabhedaniyamaḥ karmaphalavat /
GSP33brssgo3u:6779: tathāca liṅgadarśanam - 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6781: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇe pravadantyatulyatām' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6783: asati prārabdhakarmapratibandhe śravaṇādinehaiva vidyodayaḥ yajñādibhiḥ saṃcitapāpapratibandhasya nirastatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6784_0: sati tu bhogena tannirāsādamutreti vidyāyā aihikāmuṣmikatvaviśeṣaniyama uktastadvatphale
GSP33brssgo3u:6786: tasyāṃ vidyāvadviśeṣaniyamo 'sti na veti phalasyobhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6790: kiñca śravaṇāditāratamyādvidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamaṅgīkṛtya vidyālabhyamuktau nātiśaya ityāha-apica vidyāsādhanamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6793: vidyayābhivyaktatvena brahmānanda eva mukhyaphalamabhivyaktiravidyānivṛttirānandasvarūpasphūrtipratibandhakābhāvatayā vidyayā sādhyate sā cānirvācyeti na dvaitāpattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6803: kathaṃ tarhi pūrvādhikaraṇe vidyāyā viśeṣa uktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:6805: satyāmapi sāmagryāṃ jñāne vilamba ukto na tāratamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6806: tarhi satyapi jñāne muktau vilambaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-natviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6807: vāyvādipratibandhāddipotpattivilambe 'pyutpanne tamonivṛttivilambādarśanātsati jñāne nājñānanivṛttau vilamba iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6808: kiñca karmaṇāmupāsanānāṃ ca guṇabhedena tāratamyātphalatāratamyaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6815: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyā bhāṣyaratnaprabhāṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
